title: Humanexus
synopsis:
Humanexus is a reflection on mankind's long search for ways to connect each other, from cave drawings to tweeting. With significant changes in methods and tools, from very subtle processes of exchange, conversations, and to today's mass communication and shiny new technologies, the sharing of messages, ideas, and thoughts has become easier.

Piecing humankind's memories of searching, Humanexus tries to explore the nature of such journey. Are we promised with a perfect future? Or, all our adventures will lead to a disastrous and shattering destination? Humanexus tells a mysterious story by representing mankind's continued voyage to get connected and stay involved in the social web of expressions.

title: The Tale of The Day
synopsis:
Adapted from an ancient Chinese demonic story and revised from the artist’s previous work: “The White Snake,” “The Tale of The Day” tells of a tragic romance of human male and female snakes. In a rainy day, a young man encountered by the lake two snake demons in the disguised form of a beautiful lady in white and her maidservant in green. Falling for the young man, the white snake tried to seduce him, who, despite the demonic/animal nature of his lover, chose to enjoy the seduction and keep the relationships together with the maidservant. The days of lust did not last long. A pang of sudden fear struck him one day, and he fled as fast as he could.

“The Tale of The Day” is divided into three parts— encounter, enchantment, and epiphany— so as to express a shift from the obsession of lust to the transcendence and enlightenment. This shift corresponds to the metamorphosis of the characters in the animation. All the characters, except the male protagonist, can transform themselves. Such transformation in shape was not just the original theme of demonic stories. Instead, it suggests the idea of inconsistency— not merely the inconsistency in the physical existence of objects but also that of earthly desire, such as sexuality.

title: желание
synopsis: Маленький мальчик делает желание на свой день рождения. Он хочет, чтобы время, чтобы ускорить стать взрослым человеком.

title: Nós Somos Gomes Pipa
synopsis: Gomes Pipa, 23 years old, has dissolved into five different Gomes Pipas. Dissolution is: a democratic process by which the various people that constitute one person conquer Independence and assume Mind and Body in the External World. Life in Gomes Pipa’s tiny apartment becomes chaotic: one bed and one bathroom are not enough for them all and each must deal with quite unexpected physical and psychological idiosyncrasies. Inspired by the life and works of Fernando Pessoa.

title: Ona, to sam ja!
synopsis: The film is inspired by love verses from the poem „The Gardener“ by Rabindranath Tagore.
other_credits: Choreography: Aleksandra Bjelajac

title: Akdenizli
synopsis: The struggle of a Mediterranean Seal which tries to get away from a greedy fisherman who wants to catch it.

title: Сергей Александров
synopsis: Сергей Александров – единственный в России паралимпиец-горнолыжник, который занимается спортом без обеих ног в протезах. Его судьба – это судьба человека, который, несмотря на все препятствия в жизни, остался самим собой. Его борьба – это борьба со своим любимым спортом. Каждый раз, падая с вершины, он поднимается вновь, чтобы когда-нибудь войти в состав национальной сборной.
director_awards:
В 2012 году награждён дипломом за 2-е место в номинации «Преодоление» за короткометражный документальный фильм «Вода» на IV Международном фестивале спортивного кино и телевидения (г. Якутск). В 2012 году окончил Челябинскую государственную академию культуры и искусств по специальности: режиссёр телевизионных программ.
В 2012 г. принял участие в Международном кинофестивале «Сталкер» (г. Москва) с документальным фильмом «Философ». В 2013 году номинирован на национальную премию «Страна» (г. Москва) за документальный фильм «Вода».

title: The Secret World of Tim
synopsis: A previously hidden world is uncovered through examination of the processes that go into the creation of a circuit board. Printed circuit boards are integral to the functioning of modern life, but remain largely invisible to those employing their use. The Secret World of Tim will detangle and demystify the creation of circuit boards, revealing through this a world of previously undisclosed beauty, precision and intricacy that is an art form in itself.

title: Orugas
synopsis: Life is boring for Caterpillar. It wonders why the butterflies can fly and be free but doesnt quite get it. It tries to change the course of life in order to become a coccon and fly as soon as possible just to find himself burned out and full of broken dreams.But its time will arrive when it least expects it...

title: monolog
synopsis:
We observe a young man on his morning routine, getting up, having a smoke, shaving, putting on his bathing-trunks and goggles and jumping into his own bath.
He s now sitting there weighing in on his options on how to commit suicide.
He is not alone though, his other selves, the hippie, the cool guy and the old man are always with him.
Together they go on a metaphysical journey through the young man s life,
time and space don’ t matter anymore. We meet the young man as a boy-choir member, trying to run away from two very mean looking bullies.
We join a party, where all his ex-girlfriends (and boyfriends) do nothing but complain about him, we go on an esoterically fuelled self healing trip and although he doesn’ t achieve spiritual enlightenment, he at least got enough material for an audiobook out of it.

title: Diálogos de mi abuelo
synopsis: My grandfather's personal, terrenal and temporal dialogue.

title: Sólo Sabes Follar
synopsis: A romantic dinner, on an ordinary day. She is sitting at the table, waiting. Finally he appears. He arrives on time. He is perfectly punctual, in fact he arrives 10 minutes early: this is the straw that breaks the camel´s back. Sometimes you simply cannot stand the other´s perfectness. Sometimes, and only sometimes, good is bad and the other way around. Every little detail, every nice gesture, every delightful comment, end up ruining coexistence. Prepare yourself for a crazy-epic fight.

title: Tuck me in
synopsis: Alex asks his father to tuck him in, but that's not the only thing he asks for.

title: Navzdy spolu
synopsis:
True love is just one. And you know that by heart when it comes. The short movie Together Forever takes place at Christmas Eve, the soul of enamoured Peter is overflowing with tenderness as well as the melody of Dvorak’s From the New World symphony playing on a the turntable. Peter knows the day he met Barbora changed his life. Forever.
VIMEO version with Spanish subtitles is also available: http://vimeo.com/87420031, password: spanish

title: Redemption
synopsis: Night, a bottle of whiskey and two glasses on a table, as well as a pack of cuban cigars and tarot cards. There is a man in a white shirt sitting at the table, suffering as hell. You can feel his pain, hear his heavy breath. Meanwhile, radio news about a very dangerous offender wounded in a gunfight sound in the room… The movie was filmed entirely on an iPhone 5.

title: كله تمام
synopsis: we tend to pretend being another person in front of others. Through a psychological drama an abstract relationship between two people carrying symbols and connotations. The film digs in the depths of these relations.
director_awards: Writer and director of ( Male Muslim single ) , a short film which was granted the Best Actor Prize at cinemobile Film Festival 2012 which was sponsored by the Arabic Company for Production and Distribution Egypt - and  Chief  Festival committee was   Amir Ramses ( the Egyptian director ) .
other_credits: Actors: Heshan Wans - Haitham Ayad

title: Eterna Venganza
synopsis: A tainted woman seeks out the worst of men to satiate her thirst for revenge. She cannot forget her dark past, nor stop her desire to punish them.

title: Manganeso
synopsis: Manganese is the story of a family of three engulfed in a context of subsistence strenuous caused by a chronic economic crisis and energy shortage that covers it. So much so that one component of a battery, such as manganese, has become currency, new money. Lucia, along with his father and grandmother, has to cope with a future scenario in view of how things can be quite close. It is an urban drama where the reprimand of living beyond your means while it's not possible, but in this family not all look the same.

title: Self-Seeker
synopsis: Self-Seeker draws a distinction between ideas of an adult world with the childhood one. Basically it is a game of contrasts. The story of an adult stuck in his own routine, day by day, in a so mechanical way that he could forget better ways of living. As every person, our protagonist also had a childhood where there was simplicity, adventure and truthful dreams. Through their memories we will dive into a world of innocence, simplicity and creativity.

title: La Pietà del Vento
synopsis:
A film based on a dialogue that never took place between the Japanese poet Matsuo Bashō and the Italian architect Carlo Scarpa. Bashō’s voice takes us back to life in Scarpa's architecture, leaving us suspended in mystery between the journey of life and death.
The research of the traveler poet and the cold of cement meet each other in the wind, like a narrator, and its destiny is to whisper only to the cypress.

title: Última Sesión
synopsis: During the last picture show a young couple is meeting and an old couple is saying goodbye, at all before the light switch off and the doors close, and to come the silent into the cinema. "The Last Session" pays homage to cinema, to enjoy films on the big screen, and the end of 35mm film format.

title: Sepideh
synopsis: A mother has to move with her two young children to the United States for work. This decision affects Sepideh, the Arab woman who has always has taken care of the children. What can this woman do in order not to be separeted from the children?

title: La cantante
synopsis: Pepa and Rafael are married for 40 years.

title: Mental Party
synopsis: A group of friends celebrates a party. There we discover a strange guy, Ramán, who says to read minds. Guests challenge Ramán to show their skills, which will end up carrying unexpected consequences.

title: Low Cost
synopsis: An English/German couple decide to take a road-trip through the backroads of the Alicante (Spain), hoping to save their relationship from a seemingly inevitable break-up.

title: Drôle de Guerre
synopsis: As his ill mother is brought to the hospital, young Matis must stay at the house of his grumpy and introvert grandfather. To escape boredom and loneliness, he decides to play with some of his grandfather’s belongings he found: an old gun, and a French Resistance medal.

title: Олька
synopsis: Варя - москвичка, она очень точно знает, как устроена жизнь. Она запросто ведет бизнес, открывает кабинеты министров ногой, с личной жизнью тоже полный порядок. И все бы хорошо, если бы не очередная командировка в зимний, все еще сильно советский город на Волге. Варя снимает квартиру, чтобы какое-то время спокойно жить и работать. Однако, квартира таит в себе что-то неопознанное, но манящее, то, что в итоге разбивает представления Вари о самой себе, как о женщине.
director_awards: фестиваль "Кино-клик" за фильм "Утро Полины"
other_credits:
художник Елизавета Хаустович
в главной роли Ксения Чекина

title: Métamorphose
synopsis:
Un matin, après une nuit peuplée de rêves agités, un homme se réveille. Il comprend qu’il s’est métamorphosé. Sans surprise, ni peur, mais privé de parole et enfermé dans un corps qu’il ne connaît ni ne maîtrise, il tente néanmoins de rejoindre ses parents qui, inquiets, se pressent derrière la porte. Au prix d’interminables contorsions, il parvient à ouvrir,mais à sa vue, pris d’effroi et de dégoût, ses parents claquent la porte et l’enferment. Sa jeune sœur lui rend visite puis entreprend la réorganisation de la vie
de la famille. En l’absence du père, elle parvient à convaincre la mère de l’aider à vider la chambre de son frère. Le jeune homme tente alors de s’opposer à sa sœur. Alerté par le bruit de la lutte, le père revêt a chambre et se lance à la poursuite de son fils effrayé. Il s’arme d’une pomme et frappe le jeune homme, qui s’écroule inconscient. Les jours passent. Abandonné des siens, le jeune homme perd peu à peu ses forces. La blessure provoquée par le coup porté par son père s’infecte. Après son dernier coup d’éclat, ce dernier retourne à son abattement, laissant à sa fille la gestion du foyer. Elle décide d'engager une bonne pour faire le ménage dans la chambre du jeune homme. De plus en plus faible, ce dernier peine à rassembler ses forces pour observer l’intruse. Son extrême faiblesse amuse la bonne. Après une hésitante tentative d’intimidation, le jeune homme abandonne et s’isole finalement dans un coin. Un soir, la sœur se met à jouer du violon devant ses parents admiratifs. Ému par la musique et plein d’amour pour les siens,le jeune homme entreprend de les rejoindre dans le salon. Son arrivée provoque la colère de la sœur, qui voit dans cette intrusion la volonté du frère de remettre en cause son hégémonie au sein de la famille. Il n’ en est rien. Comprenant que toute possibilité de dialogue est désormais rompue avec sa sœur, le jeune homme lui offre la
possibilité de l’anéantir…; Short synopsys:
As he wakes up one morning, a man feels changed, as if he was not able to live among other beings anymore. His family members cannot bear his presence any longer and try to get rid of him for good.

title: Hello Mom!
synopsis: This is a story about a person's life who spent his life without single choice made by himself. A human being's life is much more complicated that it looks like.

title: Jerminación
synopsis: Juanita, a little girl from a rural school tries to learn how to grow a little bean seed. She wants to get her little star in the front, as a symbol of excelence. But in the educational system she is inmerged, the fathers stay away from the sons, the kids are hungry for skip the class, and the teachers only waits the end of period for a paycheck. In this scenario she will learn that imagination is the best tool to shape her dreams and become the person she want´s to be.

title: CREVETTE
synopsis: Paul, a 10 years old boy, is on holiday in the countryside with his big brother Matthew. In village ball, Paul would like to invite Wendy to dance, but he is too shy. Overmore, his big brother doesn't help to have confidence in him. How Paul will find the courage to grow up and to invit Wendy to dance ?

title: LE RISQUE ZERO
synopsis: A baby is communicating with his parents from inside his mother’s belly and starts to negociate his forthcoming birth. Facing his parents’ resistance, the baby decides to hire a notorious lawyer... Little by little, the mother starts to give in to despair whereas the father thinks he’s losing his mind when he realizes he’s being chased by some killer baby carriages.

title: Elmando
synopsis: Elmando is the story of a young Congolese child, born near the forest of Kivu. His peaceful life takes a tragic turn when his village is attacked and his mother is kidnapped. Inspired by true events, young Elmando is on an epic journey through a perilous yet beautiful Africa in search of her.

title: Onde o meu amigo pintou um quadro
title_en: Where my friend made a painting
synopsis: Short and simple story: My friend made a painting from a photograph about a manifestation against the economic crisis and I made a film from that painting. Between these two objects lies a path, which began in a casual photograph and ended in a poorly-lit garage. "Where My Friend Made a Painting" is, in order of importance, a short film about a place, a friend, a creative act, a painting and the silence of one manifestation.

title: Sombras na Esfera Celeste
synopsis: Wandering through the streets of a desolate city, a man finds the object of his fascination.

title: LIVE
synopsis: One who imitates life risks to be infected and to face challenges of life's meaning and purpose.

title: Реконструкция бессонницы
synopsis: Мать и дочь существуют в разных реальностях-- первая во снах, вторая в воспоминания о прошедшей  близости.
film_awards: Третье место на фестивале «Бульбамуві» в Варшаве, 2014 г.
director_awards: Третье место на фестивале «Бульбамуві» в Варшаве, 2014 г.
other_credits:
Актёры: Анастасия Минаева, Елена Огренич
Звукорежиссёр: Марина Филипович

title: Weichanmu
synopsis: Weichanmu in chdeungun, the indigenous Mapuche language, means "we are going to war."  It follows a group of Mapuche reclaiming their ancestral land in Huentelolen, in southern Chile.  In the midst of being evicted from the property by the forestry company Arauco and the police forces, the Mapuche question the advance of the forestry industry in their territory, the legitimacy of the state and the capitalist system whose advance is a direct threat to the survival of Mapuche culture, thought and way of life.

title: Maria
synopsis:
Maria, a Portuguese young girl, marries with the love of her life some hours before he is taken to the Colonial War in Africa. She has only time to say goodbye before she becomes a married girl left behind with the other women from the village.
In a family where love and fear are not spoken out loud, she is offered a new room for her marital bed. Clara, her middle sister, tries comfort her in her loneliness and protect her from Rosa, the provocative younger sister. The girls sleep together night after night exploring the sensations of their own bodies in the innocence of their ignorance. 
When the husband writes from Africa that he won’t come back, and the young José comes to invite Clara to the ball, Maria’s pride and jealousy speak louder than rational thought.

title: Zero à Esquerda
synopsis: Pedro, a hacker with communist ideals, dreams of an egalitarian Brazil. In the hopes of changing his country, Pedro invades the database of the Central Bank of Brazil and empties all accounts. Pedro`s mother, miss Elviria, not knowing that his son in responsible for all the havoc, uses her son`s computer giving his location away to the police

title: Alba
synopsis: The first part of the plan has accomplished successfuly: Pablo has kidnapped Mateo and has carried him to the warehouse where he works. However, in the moment of truth, Pablo realizes he can't kill him.

title: Fantasía apocalíptica
synopsis: A series of images taken at random. ¿Hallucination or Reality?

title: A Corda
synopsis: SEN (35) is a normal man without many aspirations, is facing a very strange place, there is nothing close by, he gradually finds objects that characterize their past and just remembering some things. Suffers a conflict in which your unconscious wants to remain in the same state, but are objects, memories, and especially the sounds you hear, that attempt to bring him back. At the end turns out to be conscious that it is in a surreal world created by your thoughts. Then understand why his attack him unconscious and now there's nothing left to do, unless regain conscience and waking.

title: Silêncios de um Gesto
synopsis: Capturing a moment, a gesture that inevitably the time will erase. I live my days in longing grabbed the camera to capture certain moments of my children who are not to be repeated. My daughter continues to grow and transform, unless I can capture a moment and eternalize it in my memory. A gesture is enough to satiate my hunger for the infinite.

title: ZOMBIE PONY
synopsis: Zombie Pony is a short film on how the pony became zombies and then were kill by a cowboy

title: Traumwäsche
synopsis: Rudolph Mayer can't fall asleep for 76 hours in a row. Scrappy nightmares are attacking him. Meanwhile, a tiny stewardess in the Association of Dreams Care is getting ready for the next business trip.
director_awards: 1 Prize and Prize for the best editing at DBA Short Film Festival Kiel, Germany for the Film "dream wash"
other_credits: Actors: Lilli Kronester, Luis Kronester, Valentina Ivanova

title: Chaque jour est une petite vie
title_en: Every day is a small life
synopsis: A council estate on the Mediterranean coast. Living in a modest caravan amongst the tower blocks, Rachel, 80 years old, dreams of returning to her native Algeria. Her son Simon doesn’t want to know anything about it. Stella, her grand-daughter, describes them as “A really awful family”. Fortunately they are surrounded by the good humour of Yazid, alias Gino, and the entire neighbourhood...

title: Tierra Animada
synopsis: Documentary about traditional movie film workshop developed in rural schools of the Andean area of northern Argentina. Starring native children in their relationship with environment where the audiovisual tool invites them to play. Show up how the children discover and (re)created their reality, leading it through stories to fantasy worlds full of legends.

title: La piedra del rayo
synopsis: Two shepherd kids begin a magical adventure when they find a stone struck by lightning. They discover that the stone has a special power that belongs to the god of lightning. A never petrified Trilobites and a wise old woman will be the guides of the adventure that will transit through different historical moments in the Andes.

title: Looking for Gromit
synopsis:
In 1871, at the release of the Siege of Paris and the "Commune de Paris", numerous Parisian buildings, such as aqueducts, are destroyed.
The price of the water become amazing, the most deprived families are in the incapacity to get it itself.
A rich English philanthropist, Sir Richard Wallace, decides to help the Parisian and offers to the city 50 public fountains to the what his name was given. The craze of the Parisian is such as the city decides to build it others. 
140 years later, hundred fountains Wallace are disseminated in the french  capital…

title: Espantavidas
synopsis: After a long time, Jaime has found a new job, now is a scarecrow.

title: Violet
synopsis: A factory worker woman protect her daughter who subjected to violence from her husband. Daughter's husband is a man of neurotic. Although he's very sorry and expressed his remorse repeatedly, finally he understand that the women who protect her daughter like a eagle with watchful claws won't step back even a step in her struggle.

title: 1/2 kg
synopsis: The short film „ ½ Kg“ portraits the daily life of a 62 year old woman, Ms. Eliana, who works selling material for recycling in São Paulo city. She dreams of having a computer, because she believes that, if she learns how to use it, she’ll be able to quit the hard life of carying weight everyday.

title: El Fiel de la Balanza
synopsis:
While LUPITA waits inside the old Buick Century,  JOEL and PASCUAL are inside a mansion perpetrating the last of a series of jewelry thefts to family houses. The two thefts jump over the fence to go back to the car, but have to face two cops in bicycles that intercept them. One of them is wounded by a bullet coming out of Lupita’s revolver. When the other one runs after them and tries to shoot at them, the Buick is already turning around the corner.
	Next morning, in the comfort of the apartment they use as a hide out, Joel, the boss,  assumes the task of dividing the jewelry loot.  One half for Pascual and Lupita and the other for himself. 
	Lupita and Pascual dance impelled by happiness: they are rich. Joel seems jealous of their love, but as a symbol of friendship, he offers them an expensive silver ring with a big grey pearl surrounded by brilliants. “His contribution to their happiness”.  As there is nothing to eat or drink to celebrate, Joel offers himself to go out and buy something to drink and eat. 
	While he waits for the man to prepare his tortas (mexican sandwiches) He overhears the conversation between two ladies about the need to act with firmness to face the bad behavior of their kids. He seems worried while he watches the tortero working. 
	A talkative hardware store attendant chats with him about the ingratitude of some children while he makes a blend of ingredients for a poisson capable of killing an army of rats. 
	Working on the back seat of his car, Joel spreads poisson into the tortas and the beer bottles. Meanwhile, Pascual and Lupita, are laying in bed caressing and kissing each other. She is wearing lots of necklaces, bracelets and rings from the loot.  They are interrupted by Joel’s knocking at the door. Lupita goes out and welcomes him in.  Joel can’t resist Lupita’s sex appeal and hurls himself over her to kiss her and caress her with frenzy. They are barely able to pull apart when they hear Pascual opening the door and coming out of the room.
	Joel hands them the poisoned tortas and beers, He has also brought a bottle of tequila. He pretends to be in a good humor. Pascual and Lupita look at him skeptically. Pascual calls him in to the center of the living room.  He faces him and tells him how much he looks like his father, only his father was a “son of a bitch”. Suddenly, the boy takes out a knife and tries to stab Joel, but he manages to stop the boys arm.  They both fight until they stumble to the ground. Lupita takes an electric iron in her hand and blows it several times against Joel’s skull. Pascual stabs Joel to death. 
	Very sad and impressed, they both roll an old carpet around the dead body, but they are too hungry to think about the disposal of the corpse and they decide to eat the (poisoned) tortas and drink the beers. The Camera pulls out of them while they eat and drink eagerly, goes over the shining jewelry loot lying over a black cloth and keeps going towards Joel’s corpse inside the old carpet. We listen to their simple chat while the camera goes in between Joel’s boots into the complete darkness inside the carpet.

title: LAPSO
synopsis: A young woman, supermarket cashier, lives in the banal everyday and anonymity of your function. Only the lapse can free her from this monotony and take it to finding oneself, in seeking to understand his anguish. The decision to withdraw from the world, however, does not result in any change in a system where disposal and replacement is the law.

title: Fuera del Paréntesis
synopsis:
Jimmy feels that he is the culmination of all the moments and people that have crossed his path but he is swimming in insecurity because his life is getting more troubled.  He has been trying to piece things together, but he doesn't understand why things are the way that they are.  Jimmy feels that his life should be getting easier to deal with as gets older, but instead, it seems to be getting more difficult.  Jimmy is not happy where his life’s journey has taken him and it takes an accident to send Jimmy on a journey of self-examination.  Only he doesn’t realize that he is actually on a journey of self-discovery.   
In his alternate reality, Jimmy doesn’t know that he is injured.  He doesn’t realize that he is trying to answer questions of his life that only exist in his head.  He is unsure of where he is and who he is is, at first, only aware of himself as someone sitting inside a cardboard box.  He open the box onto a road that is familiar but he knows not where from.  Who is he …really?  Where is he …really?  What is he doing here?    
Jimmy has key moments from his life that have stayed with him and play in a loop in his head. His injury is giving him the opportunity to interact with those moments.  He is unsettled by these moments, his surroundings, but accepts them as the cards that have been dealt. Are these the moments that he needs to examine or to somehow change so that he can get to where he needs to be?  
Jimmy finds that he can escape for mere moments, scenarios he is uncomfortable with, when he puts himself, alone, in the box, in the dark.  Fear consumes him when he is in the box.  Time and life scenes overlap and intermingle, further confusing his understanding of where he is and who he is.  Jimmy doesn’t know what to do, except to keep moving forward.  His location changes every time he reenters the box. His anxiety is increased when he is alone with his thoughts.  Again he jumps back into the box to get away from his life scenes.  He is frightened by what he sees and he is more frightened by he thinks.      
He comes to see his time in the box as an opportunity where he can reflect on his past, a past he wants to break away from but he cannot.  His past may be the chains that bind him and weigh him down, keeping him locked in, making him unable to move to a place where has reconciled and accepted who he is and where he is in life.  Jimmy slips in and out of consciousness, realizing at one point that he has indeed had an accident.  He has fallen and injured his head and is bleeding badly.  The chain of visions in which memory and reality (the past and the present) are mixed together have incorporated himself, people he knows, and the people that have come to help him.  He is accelerating in his mind and making decisions as to whether or not the journey he is on in life, is indeed, a journey he wants to continue.  He must ultimately, in his new state of self-awareness answer the big question: Does he want to live? 
It is ultimately up to Jimmy to make a decision to stay in the box or reenter his life.

title: Los Vecinos
synopsis: It's autumn in Santiago de Chile in 1976 under the military regime. Antonio is a senior college professor with a quiet life. He doesn't read newspapers, or listen to the radio, neither has a TV. His world are books, classical music and plants.  But all is interrupted by the arrival of new and noisy neighbors. Their screams will not let him sleep. Based on a true story.

title: Caracol
synopsis: Snail mating is usually done at night and lasts on average between 4 and 7 hours.

title: Primera Lección de Magia
synopsis: "Emmanuel" is a boy that feels a great fascination about magic tricks, but "Aida" his mother insists on convincing him that magic does not exist. One day, he decide to get into that hidden and forbidden world to explore it. However his curiosity will uncover a painful family past.

In a near future world in Cardiff, we encounter Daniel an 18-year-old boy with Down's Syndrome who faces the everyday complications any boy his age would such as learning to drive with more hassle due to his condition as his mother teaches not only to drive but how to face these new challenges he will encounter in a Post-apocalyptic world where locals have turned into human-hungry zombies and by so doing creating a ripple effect where society as such is being menaced ... except for those individuals with Down's Syndrome.

Daniel is aware that by being special he may be targeted by non-zombies and is best he leaves to a more secure location soon especially as his mother has been bitten likely that she too will soon turn into a living dead monster and he will be left without protection where it is essential for him to speed up his driving lessons for when this doomed situation is to occur he is able to escape. After a quarrel with his mother regarding his safety and finding Lisa, his lost girlfriend, Daniel faces the risk and decides to go in search for her instead of going straight to the shop as his mother had instructed.

After not finding Lisa at her house, Daniel goes to the shop for supplies for the journey and encounters Lisa coming out of a van, where despite Lisa's warning they both get caught and are taken hostage. Meanwhile, surprised to not see him return, Daniel's Mum writes a letter approving not only his driving but him as a person and leaving her safe zone to meet her destiny. Soon after, Daniel manages to escape with Lisa.
Daniel and Lisa return to find this dramatic situation where Daniel is forced to confront his mother's fate...a new life awaits Daniel and Lisa together.

Jose is a champion, but he's not any champion, he's a champion who never wins. Today, like every morning, he buys a lottery ticket and goes to work for his nymphomaniac boss. 

Once in the changing room, he scratches his ticket but doesn't realize that two robber with guns  jumped into the minimarket.

title: The Dream Player
synopsis:
After losing her baby and getting divorced, Karen decides to move into another New York neighbourhood and start a new life.
At her new home, Karen starts feeling weaker and weaker. No matter how many hours she sleeps, she wakes up exhausted. 
The strange thing is that every night she dreams about a little girl, always the same little girl. Night after night, the girl seems to be invading Karen’s dreams, and by doing this, not letting her sleep, she’s gradually killing her of fatigue.
There’s no way Karen can stop her… the little girl loves her dreams and will not stop playing in them… because she’s a Dream Player.

title: DINNER FOR FEW
synopsis: “Dinner For Few” is an allegorical depiction of our society. During dinner, "the system"  feeds the select few who consume all the resources while the rest survive on scraps. Inevitably, when the supply is depleted, the struggle for what remains leads to catastrophic change. Sadly, the offspring of this profound transition turns out not to be a sign of hope, but the spitting image of the parents.

title: Dieu reconnaîtra les Siens
synopsis:
French countryside, 1975. A family is about to dinner... they do not know yet that the Great Purge is about to begin.

An evening in august 1975. In an isolated house, somewhere in the french countryside, a couple and their two children are going about their own business. Nothing peculiar, apart from the fever that the youngest daughter is suffering from. But the radio is now broadcasting an alarming message: the Great Purge has begun.

title: Galerias
synopsis: The Self-managed social center La Tabacalera, located in the old tobacco factory of Lavapies that closed in 2000, is a space that merges social reality of citizens and folk art. title: Pucará, hacedores de cerámica

title: Война ее детства
synopsis:
В фильме рассказывается история ребенка, которому было 6 лет, когда началась Великая Отечественная война. В центре сюжета ее мечты и надежды, моменты счастья, повседневная жизнь и детство через призму войны. Анимационные эпизоды детства перекликаются с настоящим, показывая как страхи, порожденные войной, влияют на дальнейшую жизнь человека. Как женщина, которая ждала с фронта отца, через 70 лет так и не избавилась от страха потерять родного человека и теперь каждый день ждет возвращения сына домой, и как недоедая в годы войны, сегодня все еще не привыкла к тому, что голода уже нет.
Детство - это яркая искренняя сказка исполненная стремлениями и мечтами, но какой она станет, если вмешается война?
other_credits: Художник - Ткач Наталья

title: Мустафа
synopsis: В курортной бухте Крыма можно увидеть много интересного в сезон отдыхающих. Герой фильма - тоже местная достопримечательность. Каждый день он выходит на набережную и тут же оказывается облеплен детьми, зеваками и даже животными. Прохожих привлекает не только его талант и бесспорная харизма, но и тяжелая судьба этого парня.Мустафа демонстрирует людям свое мужество и любовь к жизни , но это не так легко ему дается, как он хочет показать.

title: EXTREMA
synopsis:
A conquistador on his deathbed is waiting for the priest who will come to take his confession 
of the killings and looting he performed during his trips to America. 
Under a mysterious spell, his past materializes
in a macabre procession of Easter, which the priest 
must avoid on his way to the dying conquistadors’ home. 
Upon arrival, the priest finds a sick conquistador in a frenzy of madness, 
seeing plants and American Indian gods in his room. The priest tries to reassure him
but he dies shortly after. 
Upon leaving the conquistadors’ body, his spirit is received by American gods,
demons created by his guilt, to lead him to the labyrinths of his new reality

title: Vino de moras
synopsis: A small town in northern Spain summer 1982. Tere (11) rehearses a play with a group of amateurs: she is going to be Puck in "A Midsummer Night’s Dream". We always see her silent- either watching others or lost in her thoughts- but we can hear her voice as an adult narrating her story. Her rival is whimsical Andrea (12) in love with the same boy handsome Rafa (12). Ana Belén (13) helps Andrea to make a love potion although she is not sure to retain her "powers" since she started menstruating. Alex (13) fond of the macabre and comfortable in his bad-boy role refuses to admit he likes Andrea. Rounding out the group of friends is clumsy R2 (12) Alex’s faithful companion Pablo (9) Rafa’s younger brother and Tim a dog that looks like something out of the Famous Five adventures. But there is someone else: in the village you can still see posters with the photo of Dani (8) who disappeared mysteriously. The last time his friends saw him they left him all alone in a forbidden place where he was the victim of a cruel joke: if he tried to escape a mysterious character would snatch him up forever ... Andrea and Ana Belén leave Tere aside when they arrange the spell which should trap Rafa’s will: an item of the beloved’s clothing a concoction prepared by a virgin a magical object obtained after passing a test of courage ... a task that seems doomed to fail. Memories of adult Tere mix up the characters’ fate with the theatrical representation in which couples break up and get together as if by magic leading to an end in which secrets are revealed among unexpected occurrences.

title: Fuga Animada
synopsis: A human (pixilation) animator creates a drawn character and gives him life making him walk. While he does so the animator creates an edge that his character does not see and almost fall in it. The drawn creature manages to get back and argues with his creator about the edge. In response the animator draws an oposite one just in front of the first. However, when the creature jumps to the other side the human pushes making the distance of both sides bigger and again the drawn character almost fall in it. The character gets angry and try to fight the animator but seen that he's just too small it tries and fail to run away. The animator bring him to the top part of the paper and hang the small guy there as a punishment. When it releases itself it hits the side of the paper and make a hole trought he can pass from the paper out to the table. While running away the character passes trought different techniques of animation and finally becaming a clay puppet. The animator, however, chases it again and brings it back to the drawing board, erases it and leave the room. While he's away the character come back from the erased and when the human come back and see it he tries to stop it by hitting the drawing. When he takes his hand of the character now is drawn in the animator's hand and start running around his body. The creator cannot control animore his creation. He try to catch it but he fall in the camera and breake it.

title: Hikikomori
synopsis:
Short portrait of a Hikikomori. 
Hikikomori (ひきこもり or 引き籠もり Hikikomori?, literally "pulling inward, being confined", i.e., "acute social withdrawal") is a Japanese term to refer to the phenomenon of reclusive adolescents or adults who withdraw from social life, often seeking extreme degrees of isolation and confinement. The term hikikomori refers to both the sociological phenomenon in general as well as to people belonging to this societal group. Hikikomori have been described as recluses, loners, or "modern-day hermits."

title: Goran
synopsis: The short documentary film “Goran” takes an intimate look at the despair and joy, the hope and pride in achievement as it is constructed out by Goran Gostojić of Novi Sad.

title: Hunger in India
synopsis:
The first step towards change is awareness.
"Hunger in India" is a short animated film designed to spread awareness about food insecurity, malnutrition and related issues in the Indian context.

Tom Alter lent his voice for the film

title: Eye Candy
synopsis: A short film about a boy obsessed with a pair of spectacles! The film shows how the boy's "vision" changes through his adventures.

title: MI MARIDO
synopsis:
María is a housewife and is married with Diego, a fanatic football unbearable. María recounts her life with Diego and discover that she is uncomfortable with her marriage.
The main character, María, is carrying forward the story. She is the reasoner, the learner, who reflects and forgives. She is who constantly arises how to succeed in marriage. Diego, however, does not even know that there is a conflict.
The story is focused on the main character and is developed from the narrative of this character, who will tell us their concerns, their sorrows and life experiences within a very conventional and typical marriage.
 The main theme is coexistence and how difficult it is to live as a couple. 
In every couple should always have a harmonious relationship of three aspects: love, communication and respect. When one of these aspects fails, it means that the couple is not good. As is the case with María and Diego.
 María in his narrative-search will find that your marriage is failing. But it also finds that there is still love, and that is what gives strength to go on and solve the other two aspects of the relationship (communication and respect).
The husband-wife relationship in this marriage is made in a patriarchal, where the man is the one who works and brings money at home, and that automatically makes him a martyr and a supreme and dominant. And the woman, housewife, only exists to serve and satisfy the man-patriarch. Maria is looking for a change. Their struggle is to modify the established patriarchy at home, not a matriarchy, but something more fair for both. In her search (the narration), Maria will realizing the things she want to modify. The ego and machismo of her husband, and her excessive kindness, among other things.
At the end of his narrative, Maria makes catharsis and forgives her husband. She realizes that still loves him and decides to go back to him.

title: Another day
synopsis: A day at work, full of stress, one more time. But lucky enough this day only lasts 29 seconds……..

title: Бикини
synopsis: Маша мечтает получить кубок чемпионки в соревнованиях фитнес бикини моделей. Уже много лет она идет к своей цели и исправно тренируется под руководством своего супруга Сергея, который точно знает, как должна выглядеть его жена. Она должна быть идеальной. Ради победы, героиня прибегает к крайности, и ложится под нож пластического хирурга, чтобы увеличить грудь. Новые формы должны привести Машу к победе, если все пойдет так, как было задумано…

title: 5 ΤΡΟΠΟΙ ΝΑ ΠΕΘΑΝΕΙΣ
synopsis:
How many ways are there to commit suicide? Can a suicide attempt be considered “successful”? Makis over-analyses this subject, struggling to achieve the most ideal result. 

Director's statement: "5 Ways 2 Die" is a socio-political allegory about a country's governmental system based on fake appearances (wearing masks).  Makis, our anti-hero,  is looking for a way to end his misery in a household based on lies and pretentious appearances. Corruption is inevitable when the rules and laws do nothing to prevent it. In such cases the lines distinguishing the sinner from the victim are blurred-  inexistent.

title: Facing off
synopsis: A woman decides to step into the cosmetic surgery maelstrom to give her life a radical change. Once the change is completed she is even unhappier than before. Life will surprisingly rush to the aid of her…

title: L'homme qui sait
synopsis: Char, a Police Inspector, didn't succeed to stop a murderer. She has to find who is the victime, who is only known by "The Man Who Knows". The investigation is starting to become her nightmare.

title: Clarividencia del pánico
synopsis: Created from a poem and with just 24 hours for both production and realization, "Clairvoyance of The Panic" is a short film that explores the visual language and narrative possibilities of the image.
director_awards: NO

title: Sharpener
synopsis: Nedim Saracevic is the last sharpener in Sarajevo, film follows his life in a store od 4m, as he is fighting to survive remembering the old days.

title: SIN NOMBRE
synopsis:
Susana, a woman grown up to be afraid of the world. Sn, a man born to love. COnversations without a name tells the story about a moment in the life of a man and a woman, with very different personalities but who,  at the same time, definitely  belong to each other, and who, at the end, will be united by their own realities.
This story occurs in only one space, in Susana’s bedroom. She is a quiet girl who has the same routine everyday, from home to work and from work to home. In her room most of the main events in her life happen: love, sex, hate, lie, truth. It is all perfect while she is in her comfort zone.
 
When SN gets in, it all stays balanced. He is a character who comes out from nowhere to let her realise about her fears, failures and good experiences. Her room is the only place where she shares her life with SN. He accepted this asphyxiating situation for many years,  until the day he decides to change it all. He is determined to transform her every day and  that strange tranquillity that seems to lie in Susana’s mind.
He was tired of a suffocating routine, he always shuts himself in her bedroom and waits for her. This has made him decide to leave her. Susan will have to decide whether  to overcome her fears and live her own life  or stay for ever locked in those for walls.

title: Hiljaiset ystävät
synopsis: Elise is on her way to a school parent-teacher night. Her daughter's been involved in a bullying incident. Elise arrives late to find that the others have already gotten started. To everyone's surprise, the teacher has found an unusual way to convey the children's situation.

title: A Lança e o Dragão
synopsis: THE SPEAR AND THE DRAGON, tells the story of Leo, a beautiful young, rich, smart, coming from a stable family, but suffering from a severe emotional disorder. In moments of deep anguish, Leo Hurts body. It uses a Razor to cut his own skin. Leo suffers from a sense of not belonging absolute. He can not identify with the family, with the studies, with the young men of his age. Resolve then abandon everything.

title: 安居
synopsis:
The sudden death of Tin-fai’s father leaves Tin-fai lost and confused. He is clueless about the funeral arrangements. As cemeteries are ubiquitous in Hong Kong, but still the city doesn’t have enough columbaria for its people. Tin-fai wants to settle all the funeral arrangement and make space in his apartment for his family of four. The biggest challenge is to find a place for his father.
The film expresses a humanistic concern for life and death in Hong Kong and its neighboring cities through architecture.

title: 專業分手員
synopsis:
Breaking up in a relationship is always a troublesome thing to do.
Fred Cheung is a professional break up planner, assisting various clients to break up with their partners with his superb skills. However, the break up case this time creates a dilemma for Fred…

title: C 412
synopsis: Lisa is 13. She likes riding her bike and listening to the whistling of wind in the trees. One afternoon, while riding down a small road in the forest, her bike-chain comes off and she meets Paolo, an expérimental artist...

title: Super 8 Role Play
synopsis: In the early 80's a young couple decide to give a last chance to their relationship through an innovative couple therapy: they exchange their roles during a walking trip through the desert with two super8 cameras as the only witness of the whole therapy.

title: La Ropavejera
synopsis: Trapped in a portentous nineteenth-century mansion 9 children spend their days forsaken by fate. They live under the orders and abuses of the Huckster, a woman who likes to be referred to as “mother”. Her right hand is Angelita, a girl who punishes her fellow peers for the sake of the house's strict order and obedience. But everything gets out of control with the arrival of a new victim: Teresita. Her obstinacy might be the loose link of an endless chain of harassment and abuse.

title: Storm
synopsis:
A skillfully animated visualization of music with abstract shapes.
EXPERIMENTAL

title: El tren
synopsis: Three childs looking for something to do in a summer afternoon.

title: Hiki
synopsis:
Hiki is a young asthmatic Hikikomori (someone who never leaves home). He wakes up because of a message from his mother reminding him to take his medication. He takes his inhaler when suddenly, someone knock on the door, scared he hides under the desk, when it is only the owner of the house speaking from the outside. After the owner leaves Hiki gets out from his  hiding place but he accidentally breaks his inhaler. Panicked, he decides to go out to buy a new one. 
In front of the house’s door, Hiki is preparing to go out. He reaches out to the doorknob but realizes what he is about to do and gets scared. The door begins to transform and turns into a monster that follows him. Hiki fled, but he is quickly out of breath and falls, unable to move. The monster-door come closer to Hiki, who is looking at his broken inhaler. He rises slowly, head down, resolved, because he can not escape. Suddenly, he rises sharply his head and began to run blindly into the monster-door.
Hiki found him self where he was before, in front of the door, he looks around and realizes that it was just his imagination. He runs out of the house, but eventually he gets hit by a car.

title: Por eso no tengo hermanos
title_en: That´s why I don´t have brothers
synopsis: Antonio, forced by his wife, takes his brother in law to the lake to help him to overcome a brake up. But this same day, Antonio has to assist to the stag´s party of a good friend. Carlos, the brother in law (obsessed by the belief that there´s a monster in the lake) will do the impossible to make Antonio stay with him till the monster appears. Will it do it? Or Carlos it´s the real monster for Antonio?

title: Janne of Love
synopsis:
„Janne of love” is a humorous investigation of the communicational problems, cultural differences and prejudices of contemporary Europeans. Bulgarian, Finnish and English language “get along, hide intentions and clash” just like the characters, pointing out the invisible borders in a globalized world.
The wild journey starts in Bulgaria, where Millitsa and Anni meet two Finnish boys – Timo and Ilkka. Beer is flowing, the temperatures are getting high, so as the passions. After getting intoxicated and recklessly breaking the law, the feelings of the main characters evolve and culminate in a shameless love confession on the dance floor. 
Finland, Timo and Millitsa are already married. When alone they are the perfect match, but in public the joyful and noisy Millitsa gives Timo a hard time. Soon the stereotypical views cause their love language to fall apart. They start speaking their native tongues and their mind. Clichés and the bias that Eastern and Western Europeans have against each other burst out in a hilarious argument.
Will there be a solution in this never-ending conflict? And who, for God’s sake, is Janne!?

title: VHS - Victor Home System
synopsis: Victor pirates movies on VHS for a criminal organization, but risks selling tapes out of the loop. The young man then meets her neighbor Laura, who questions his lifestyle.

title: Feliz Navidad_ENG
synopsis: A drag queen, Mauro (33) comforts his niece Madonna (10) who suffers from bullying by Bryan (10), a classmate. This kid bothers her for still believing in Santa Claus, but Mauro assures her he really does exist. Mauro visits his friend Pamela (49) in the hospital, who has just gone through abortion due to her boyfriend Waldo (32) giving her a beating. Some time later, Pamela, supported by Mauro,  leaves Waldo, and when they get to Mauro’s house, they find Madonna injured by Bryan once again. Mauro plans an ambush on Bryan, but the kid ends up beating  Mauro up. Pamela and Mauro laugh at the incident, and in one drinking night they make love. Christmas arrives, and at school there’s a gift hand out, with Mauro being Santa Claus. But Bryan confronts Mauro once again. This makes  Madonna react unexpectedly, by launching against  her enemy and gives him a good beating. Back at home, Pamela and Mauro receive a  devastating visit by Waldo, Mauro tries to kick him out of his house but the man kills him with a gunshot. After the funeral, Pamela finds a gift from Santa Claus for her, they’re a pair of little boots for a newborn. Pamela comprehends that she’s expecting a Mauro’s child.

title: Бекендор
synopsis: Документальный киноочерк Бекендор знакомит зрителей со своеобразным миром небольшого рыбацкого посёлка, расположенного на берегу Чёрного моря недалеко от Одессы. На экране предстают жители поселения, из поколения в поколение которых, рыболовство и виноделие - основные занятия и смысл жизни; день за днём разделяющие повседневные радости и заботы, люди мужественных характеров, наделенные подлинными человеческими добродетелями, ежедневно сражающиеся с морской стихией.
film_awards:
- Special Mention - Wildlife Vaasa International Nature Film Festival, Vaasa, Finland, 2014
- The Mayor of the City of Ostrava Award. The International Movie Festival Ekofilm, Ostrava, Czech Republiс, 2014
- The best short documentary. Barents Ecology Film Festival (BEFF 2014), Petrozavodsk, Russia, 2014
- The 2nd prize in the category "Eco Tourism". 7th International Tourism Film Festival, “TOURFILM - RIGA 2014”, Riga, Latvia, 2014
director_awards:
2006 - «Серебряный витязь», МКФ «Золотой Витязь», Россия (документальный фильм «Жар-птица», 2005)
2007 -Серебряная медаль, международный Иссык-Кульский кинофестиваль, Кыргызстан (документальный фильм "Божичи", 2006)
          Лучший фильм на историко-культурную тематику VI МКФ туристических фильмов «Ветер странствий», Украина (документальный фильм "Божичи", 2006)
          Грамота за развитие фольклорной тематики в сфере документального кинематографа, «Золотий млин»,Украина     (документальный фильм "Божичи", 2006)
2012 -  Награда режиссеру ко дню Молодёжи - «Молодым творцам кино Украины», Киевская городская администрация

title: El escondrijo
synopsis: A homeless man lives an atypical situation together with a lonely old woman and a daughter carefree.

title: Pero Vengo
synopsis:
"But I'm coming", a short film by Carlos Callero around a Mario Benedetti's poem, which exhibits an emotional profile of consciousness capable of transforming anxiety into vitality. A critical concern seen as a last refuge of non-negotiable values and as a perpetual passport to  comings and goings".
Alejandro Crimi

title: O lugar que se mantém profundamente inalterado perante a minha passagem
title_en: The place that remains deeply unchanged before my random passage or One way to see ourselves within the out of field
synopsis:
Filming the town in an impartial manner forgetting the habitual frameworks and big plans, giving freedom to the camera to shoot whatever it is to appear before it and in that way we shoot the out of the field, usually what it's not filmed.
And what appears in front of the camera is a city built by people, built for people, but with the absence of them. They are not there, they are figures. It's another way to film the city of Lisbon.

title: Islands
synopsis:
It takes place in a world without words: Vaine’s world. She lives on a tropical island. A place that would be paradise if it was not for Putu. His shadow falls over everything she does – she cooks, cleans and shares a home with him. Her life is just a flinch away from his anger.
     Her only joys – escaping into the forest, and Tamatoa. He lives on the neighbouring island. And they share a gentle, wordless romance across the gulf between them. A romance that is threatened once Putu finds out.
other_credits:
Production assistants: 	Anna Roumanu, Ephraim Anselmo, Pete Petero and Ruhau Tamaunu
Executive Producer: 		Stan Wolfgramm
Cast: 				Heiarii Ioapa, John Trego and Tumai Nooroa

title: Lost and Found
synopsis:
A cold winter night in Brussels. Behind a hole in a wall, a woman lies suffering from the cold. Her shivering sounds attract the attention of the lost gloves of the city. They start on an adventurous journey. 
The film was entirely shot at night in the city with no extra light; each photo had an aperture time between 4 and 12 seconds, shot with a very small diaphragma.
The gloves featured in the movie are lost. I collected them with the help of many citizens. Thanks!
Story, Direction and Animation Antje Van Wichelen
Cinematography Pascal Baes. 
Music Aki Onda.
Musicians Doug Wieselman, Michael Evans, MV Carbon, Aki Onda.
Actors Elisabeth Lebailly, Rudy Welvaert, Antje Van Wichelen.
Editing Sébastien Demeffe for Atelier Graphoui.
Color Grading Miléna Trivier for le CPC.

title: Сюжет
synopsis: Фильм представляет собой зарисовку, небольшой отрывок из жизни двух молодых людей, волею судьбы оказавшихся коллегами. Каждый из них по-своему переживает первый опыт разочарования, отсюда у каждого из них личное восприятие масштабов собственной трагедии.

title: Círculo Interior
synopsis: "Circle Interior", reflects on the look that everyone can have of itself. Throughout the journey of a personage, we see the personal search within the imagination, the dream world and thoughts.

title: Formen Fila
synopsis: A soldier walks through the countryside. Get to a place where another group of soldiers form a line. Calls once. While waiting, start a conversation with the soldier in front. Dialogue about war, death, religion, love, ... Meanwhile, the row is progressing.

title: The gift
synopsis: A man decides to make a special gift.

title: Жертва Рекламы
synopsis: Фильм снят по мотивам одноименного рассказа Эмиля Золя. Героя зовут Аскар... ну или Оскар, впрочем это не так важно. Он принял рекламы за основной закон, которому должен подчинить свое существования. Его отец  немало потрудился, он же будет теперь отдыхать среди несказанных радостей  золотого века, которые сулят ему последние страницы  газет  и  бесчисленные рекламы.
other_credits: Беккалиева Айгерим, Мекебаева Райла, Ермекбаева Дана,Жаксылыкова Асем, Жантасов Даут

title: El piensa, Ella piensa
synopsis: One date, one he, one she, one target. None of them said it to the other. But, of course, we can hear what he thinks and she thinks.

title: Todo lo que dices que soy
synopsis: Gonzalo, a hotel waiter, looks under a bed and finds Bea. She, suffering a bout of amnesia, has run out on her own wedding, and everyone is searching the hotel for her. Before the others find her, Gonzalo must get her to believe what he says: that she is the love of his life.

title: No somos nadie
synopsis:
Basic cynicism skills. Immediate despair. Proven incompetence. 
When your future is at stake, the past is not important.

title: SERIE J
synopsis: Julien comes from a very respectable family. His father is a politician and his grand-father was in the resistance. He's studying Law in Paris and has just been taken on as a trainee in the Departmental Archives of his hometown. Sorting through various documents, he begins to question his family’s history…

title: Ninis
synopsis:
Fabiola is a girl, who doesn't work nor study, she doesn't know what to do in life an she either care about it. She's been supported in distance by his mother. She spends the day walking to nowhere, hearing music, apart the rest.

Alvaro is a young musician, that has lost hearing, and he can not do, what he most love in live. He stopped playing his guitar and his only source of hope is a redhaired girl, who he spies from his window, every day.

One day, thir paths, will match it the music store where, somehow, Alvaro is still working. Fabiola, gets in the way he acts, and they spend the rest of the day together, and fall in love with each other.

At the end of the day, they follow their own ways, Alvaro will return to his music, and Fabiola will be en the threshold of change, with a decision to make, and a violin between her arms, a gift from Alvaro.

title: A Pequena Vendedora de Fósforos
synopsis: The film based on the Andersen´s tale and adapted to the present day shows the same ills of society at the time it was written in the 19th century Europe, that persist in modern societies undergoing "economical developing" : brutal coexistence of wealth and poverty, and the inability of society to rescue the helpless childhood  from the culture of historical  indifference.

title: Full Circle
synopsis: Natalie, a young girl living in New York, has a love for food cart gyros. But when she stops by Tarik's Gyro Cart on 19th and Park, she has to decide on more than what kind of sauce she wants. She has to decide whether or not to help a hungry man buy a gyro for himself. Despite some initial resistance, Natalie helps him out. Then, on another day, at another cart, Natalie faces another obstacle to getting her gyro: the cart owner can't make change for her. They begin asking strangers for help, and karma smiles on Natalie when a handsome young man not only agrees to make change, but winds up buying Natalie's gyro for her. The two share an instant connection, and Natalie's kindness has come Full Circle.

title: Desmemória - Oblivion
synopsis:
Are we a set of experiences or 
only memories may be lost 
when our brain simply 
Decide? If we lose them, are we alive 
or not?

title: Não custa nada
synopsis: Jean is a middle class boy who lives with his father and constantly worries about  the preservation of the enviroment. Cláudia is a poor girl who lives with her ill grandfather and survives by collecting other people trash to sell it. In order to get people to know about enviromental responsabilty, Jean promotes "speeches" at his school, but never manage to get his classmates's attention, wich makes his speeches nothing but to fail. To get things worse, Jean has an arrogant father who does not care about him, let alone the enviroment. Claudia, on her side, pick people's trash to sell searching only to help her grandfather . One day, picking things near Jean's house, Claudia sees the boy by the window and get enchanted by him. So from this day on she comes back every time she can to take things of his trash, this ends up with them getting close and giving a new meaning in both lifes.

title: Zar
synopsis: THE HEAT - 1. Coal or wood afire to redness, 2. High air temperature, 3. Vehemence of feelings.

title: Dari  lola shode be Faramoshi
synopsis: A partridge is forgotten in a deserted village...
