Montreal International Film Festival 2014

title: Routine
synopsis:
Two different awakenings, two different endings.
The beginning of the day for each one; have a cup of coffee, have a shower, have a look in the mirror….
The man and the woman in this couple follow totally different daily routines despite sharing the same house. Neither of them says anything; focusing on different little things and having different feelings they seem to live so close to each other but so distant at the same time.

title: O Jogo
synopsis: After an argument during a road trip to the countryside, Julia and Fred begin a sexual game with definitive consequences for their relationship and their lives.

title: Sangre de Dragón
synopsis: The real story of José Florín, a patient with post-polio syndrome that found in diving an incentive to carry on.

title: Bendito Machine V - Pull the Trigger
title_en: Bendito Machine V - Pull the Trigger
synopsis: An exotic traveler comes from far away to discover the beauty of a supposedly unexplored territory. Instead, he finds himself in the middle of a turbulent conflict. Trapped against his will, he must wait patiently until the storm has passed.

title: Beardsters
synopsis: Jack is an Italian, whose life has not been successful after relocating to Spain. A vision helps him find his path. But the solution could be worse than the problem.

title: Alcoba Nostalgia
synopsis: In the privacy of a small room, a young man get obsessed with the picture of a woman.

title: Yin and Yang
synopsis: Yin and Yang - are polar opposite to each other, but yet related forces or principles. White yang - hard, hot, male, active and the black yin - dark, soft, cold, female, passive.  In Greek mythology the male symbol is a bull, a female in German legends – a snail. The predominance of male changes a man into a beast – the furious bull. Female predominance - in a spineless snail. Only the balance of yin and yang leads to the harmonious personality.

title: Jardín de la Croix - Colorado Springs
title_en: Jardín de la Croix - Colorado Springs
synopsis: Nikola Tesla spent his last days in the New Yorkers Hotel plunged into poverty and the oblivion. Sick and old, the ghosts of the past torture him; his frustration aganist Thomas Edison who achieved success at his expense; his obssesion in proving extraterrestial life with María Orsic; his deep fear of intimate relationships, or as the FBI and Nazis try to appropriate his inventions.

title: Kde je Houba?
synopsis: If the driving school pupil Burns passes the final exam, he will get the driving license. He is nervous before the ride, so the instructor Toast is trying to calm him down: he tells him the examiner Mashroom is a good guy that never let pupils fail. But what will happen if Mashroom not attends?

title: Poriluk na slatko
synopsis: Woman takes a journey through her inner emotional landscape on a lonesome day, realizing she is trapped inside her own creation of reality.

title: L'usine, l'autre nuit
synopsis:
Helpless and confused, Andrea goes back to the factory where she used to work.
Clinging on her past, she tries to survive.
But, the violence of reality will shatter all of her illusions.

title: Rebirth
synopsis: A former heroin addict who spent nearly half his life in jail gives an honest insight into his troubled past. From his addiction to drugs, armed robberies and literally being on deaths door, he manages to completely change his life and is now an actor.

title: Adem'in Hikayesi
synopsis: They told to a man, there is a door. If you find and pass it, you will receive all the answers. The man starts to search for the door they mention about. While he is searching for the door, he comes across with “lost donkey criers”, “the waiting man” and “the man says honey”…

title: Decadence of Nature
synopsis:
Earth pollution is increasing at alarming speed.Fantastic creatures, animals-people try to survive in the new conditions.
On the one hand, they suffer from pollution, on the other they continue to sail on the waves of the consumer society.

title: Caçador
synopsis: After the untimely death of his father, the young huntsman tries to maintain the daily routine of manual labors. But a stranger and his dog are haunting the borders of his land. The closer they get, the harder it is to stand his ground and fill his father shoes as a grown man.

title: My eyes
synopsis:
Once upon a time there was an old woman who had 
a doll which she loved like her eyes. One day his 
wrist was lost and the little old lady went to look for 
it, initiating a mysterious adventure.

title: Союзники
synopsis: Moscow. 1986. Programmer Vladimir Onufrienko was sent on a business trip to the States. Without thinking twice, he decided to involve his friends journalists in gathering dirt on the General Secretary.

title: EL D�A M�S FELIZ
genre: Fiction; Drama, Family, Health, Social, Women
synopsis: Jose Mari and Eva married in a courthouse with the unique presence of witnesses of commitment. At the exit there is no wedding celebration.

title: Hero for Hire
synopsis: Veronica can't hold down a job, but not because she has no talent. Maybe she's too talented, what with her superpower and all. Suddenly someone wants to pay her to do a dirty job. Can she ignore her conscience for some quick money?

title: Pacto
synopsis: Amanda and Julieta are two Colombian sisters who live in Spain while their deaf mother lives alone on a remote farm in Colombia. One day the y both start taking pictures in different places in Barcelona, pictures which give the impression that they are older and socially more elevated than they actually are. Then they organize some post-dated letters that describe Julieta’s emotional and economical stability. Once these tasks are finished, Julieta commits suicide and Amanda conceals this from her mother by using the letters and the photos, leading her to believe that her daughter Julieta is still alive and happy.

title: Mi vida es el Cine
synopsis: The trouble shooting of a film in Spain. A funny and bitter trip over a job and a passion : filmmaking

title: Récord
synopsis: One pool. One girl. One guy. One secret.

title: La Encrucijada
synopsis: Mario feels desperate. He hasn’t got a job and he’s as poor as a church mouse. His life dream of becoming a rock star is simply impossible: he doesn’t have a talent for music. The Devil will be his only friend and his last chance to change his fate. An ancient tale is given a new up-to-date perspective that pushes the myth a little further to describe the artist’s relationship with the world.

title: Una Nit
synopsis:
A man and a woman meet each other. Two strangers. One apartment.
They find each other, they connect, they observe each other. They intesely desire each other. They become really close and at the same time they are so far… it’s just one night, but it’s the night they will always remember.

title: Mejor pídelo tú
synopsis: What would happen if all your dreams you ever wanted in your life suddenly became true? Pablo became in an addict of making wishes but it never became true he stopped to make it until now

title: Frikis
synopsis: An in-and-out-of-love tale between a Disney geek and a Street Fighter nerd.

title: Cambio de Sentido
synopsis: Ana and Andrés meet at a rural hotel in Cazorla Natural Park. She’s looking for a gate away from work. He’s working on an article against the clock. They get to know each other and discover their frustrations. Step by step a mutual attraction grows. Will this meeting be the turnaround point in their lives?

title: Lion in Helsinki
synopsis: The fantastic story of a lion lost in Finland trying to find friends and fresh meat.

title: BUMBA BUMBA COM A MINHA PRÓPRIA MACUMBA
synopsis: Escorel, a hard man because of a hard city, sat on the street and became a part of it. Standing before a macumba, a big plate of food placed on a corner, it's revealed the crossroad that summarizes his life.

title: Nora
synopsis:
An old man wakes up, confused by age and memory, in his farmhouse room. Some relatives are visiting him and they have to remember him that this is the very day of his birthday. They hurry outside, leaving him alone with his thoughts, an awkward gift and an enigmatic souvenirs in his hands.
In the same sun-drenched Tuscan summer a young woman suddenly wakes up, as if bitted by a memory. Her day seems to start as an ordinary one, until an unexpected note and the elusive behaviour of her brother come to perturb its normal flow.
An obscure bond draws itself between the old man and the young woman, tied along the phases of the day, across the windows and the doors opened on the countryside, across the slumbers and the awakenings. And so the former, visited by an old friend, is brought back to the memory of a marking episode, the disappearance of a loved woman, an to the inextinguishable guilt connected to that episode, which occurred on the very date of a birthday, many years before.
Whereas the latter, surprised by the celebrations for her own birthday, that she had completely forgotten about, goes on questioning about the mysterious letter received during the morning. But again, the evasive behaviour of persons – and things – around her just increases her doubts.
Once stopped the delay, she throws herself into an itinerary, more and more estranging, determined to untie the secret that seems to call her through a bewildering nature. Her path, similar to an a rebours passage, finally rejoins the motionless and absorbed course of the meditations of the old man, the one who seems to have been waiting for her forever.
Nevertheless, it is only after their impossible encounter that the bond between the two protagonists will be finally revealed, in a finale woven by Alzheimer's disease.

title: Huésped
synopsis: David is a young drug addict who enters an old and mysterious house to rob it. Once inside, an old blind lady, the only inhabitant of the place, sees in him the ghost of her dead son.While looking for something to rob, David will uncover the real secrets hidden by the house and its owner.

title: John Feldman e a Moto (english)
synopsis: John Feldman is crazy about American films. Tired of your routine, he decides to live an adventure!

title: Troker y el Automovil Gris
synopsis: What we intend to document is an "event film", but focusing on the creative process of the background music for a film (belonging to another era and another spectator) as a function of its atmosphere, its narrative and emotions generated: suspense, curiosity, intrigue, movement, etc., but from the perspective of a particular contemporary band. In the documentary we draw three thematic lines that intersect and diverge: the creative process and the background music for the film from the Cineteca program; the story of the film and everything that revolved around her; and the recreation of the band grey automobile historical fact. But also the dialogue between sound art and the visual (film), paradoxically in a context where what prevails is implicitly audiovisual.

title: 0,60 mg
synopsis: Carkoma and his friends laugh at Copito and bully him; meanwhile, Dani and Ainhoa have a quarrel once more. They all were leaving the disco when they unexpectedly found themselves trapped in a police sobriety checkpoint. Will they come through?

title: Nuestro propio Sri Lanka
synopsis: The trip as a search of a couple trying not to see local reality as foreign. Observation in order to try to understand how sinhalese people live from respect and admiration.

title: L'étang
synopsis:
It is the end of the summer.

Three children play in the forest. As all the children they mess around, bicker and release their energies. In the depths of the forest they discover a swamp, an old boat...

This day their life is going to fall over.

title: Ciudad Panóptico
synopsis: Two amateur actors accidentally reach the limits of reality. One mysterious man fight for his freedom against the destiny. Fiction is mixed with urban portraits in this manifest about vigilance and the great tales of modernity.

title: Tanatopraxia
synopsis: María y Mónica trabajan como tanatopractoras en una funeraria, María necesita un donante de corazón para su padre, Mónica tiene una idea, Robarlo de su propio trabajo.

title: Constelación hiperbólica
synopsis:
A report on a weird event comes to editorial office of the mystery program "Hyperbolic Constellation". Noelia, the executive producer of the program, questions the veracity of the document but a specialist assures her that it's true.
Pascual and Chiqui are the UFO-Fans who have recorded the UFO sighting.
They are waiting to go live on television to tell their tale.

title: 日々の罪悪
synopsis: Guilty is an art university student who is slacking off on her school work and feels horrible about it. Plus, she's confused about her family and Christianity, and she can't even get her ex-boyfriend to accept a small present she bought for him.

title: EN EL FONDO DEL MAR
title_en: AT THE BOTTOM OF THE SEA
synopsis: A group of unsuccessful filmmakers draw a plan to go in search of the Goya award that Juan Antonio Bayona won for The impossible, which ended at the bottom of the deep sea.

title: D. The Endless Journey
synopsis:
“D.” è un film di fantascienza horror realizzato completamente in computer grafica 3D.

D. Like Dante.
Il progetto Diamond è nato dall'idea di rivisitare in chiave Fantascientifica Horror la Divina Commedia, Opera di Dante Alighieri.
L storia riprenderà alcuni profondi concetti base della Divina commedia, non la storia. L'avventura sarà ambientata sulla stazione spaziale Deep Space Diamond in un percorso inverso rispetto a quello di Dante attraverso quattro intensi capitoli:

Prologue.
Chapter 01 - Heaven.
Chapter 02 - Purgatory.
Chapter 03 - Hell.
Chapter 04 - The Divinity Advent.
Epilogue.

NOTA IMPORTANTE: D. non ha nulla a che fare con le religioni o i credi esistenti sarà ambientato millenni nel futuro, con una civiltà umana totalmente diversa da quella che noi conosciamo.
Dante era prima di tutto un artista e questo progetto è fatto da artisti che credono nella potenza della creatività e della narrazione.


La storia sarà ambientata in un universo diverso da quello che conosciamo, con regole e stili di vita unici.

Un’avventura che vi farà riscoprire la natura umana e vivere un viaggio nei suoi istinti più profondi e pericolosi.

Grazie a “D.” il cinema horror entrerà in un ambito di realtà 3D mai vista prima. Lasciati trasportare in un viaggio che, da un paradiso iniziale, dove ogni cosa è perfetta, ti porterà in un luogo dove sofferenze e grandi colpi di scena daranno origine ad angoscia e sgomento.

Sofferenze ed efferate situazioni coinvolgeranno i protagonisti in una storia originale e avvincente, dove i sentimenti si combineranno con la paura in un viaggio attraverso un nuovo universo.

Un viaggio che non avrà mai fine. “D.” sarà destinato ad un pubblico adulto in quanto presenterà scene forti e violente combinando un misto di horror e fantascienza.; Short synopsys:
“D.” It’s a science fiction horror movie made entirely in 3D computer graphics.

Support our crowdfunding campaign at IndieGoGo
https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/d-the-endless-journey-chapter-1

D. - like Dante

The Diamond project was born f

title: Azul
synopsis: Общество отказывается принимать молодого человека, который не похож на других.
film_awards: Screenings: Festival Internacional 4 Minutos En Corto (Telde, Spain ), Mezinárodní festival studentských filmů (Písek , Czech Republic), etc.

title: Un grand bol d'air pur
synopsis: Jean, a 40 years old divorcee man, meets his children for a hiking weekend he organized himself. But everything will not go as well as he planned.

title: YSME
synopsis:
There is an area about 90 kilometers after leaving France towards Corsica, where the continent disappears behind and peaks in the distance are not yet visible. Earth is watching us more. The sea. The sky. All over. It is said that sometimes there, you can confuse the two ... The image is reversed as the retina of the eye, we perceive almost the slowdown of the world. 
    At this point of time and space "zero", the reality will be different. Not on the plane, no ... It will continue his path in a straight line without a perceptible change in the controls. But in the music. To start. 
    As a Bermuda Triangle of sound. Everything crashed, everything becomes enigmatic, values ​​previously stable becomes erratic, different ... The sea and sky confusion is palpable in the material sounds. The mirage effect in the mirror will now extend the display. Real and artificial images now operate in parallel, and our landmarks are blurred, our sensations strange, indistinct. Anyway, it is so high now ... 
    Maybe in the back, back through the "Bimini Road", things will again become what they were. Or not.

title: Deadline 2014
synopsis: "It’s just another working day in the office but for one guy it’s going to be anything but. Paul a young up and coming office worker takes a broken chair down to the store room but he's about to get the shock of his life. but can he hold it together and save this his live."

title: All The Robots
synopsis: It's a normal day in Robot City when things start to go awry. A mean robot starts to disperse evil across the town. All the robots must come together to fight against evil. And "all the robots" includes even the mean robot.

title: ATLÂNTIDA - Eu também vim de lá...
title_en: ATLANTIS - I also came from there...
synopsis: While Lissa shares the rehearsal stage for the play “Plato’s Atlantis” with her childhood friends, Gunnar and Ageu, her doubts regarding the true existence of Atlantis won’t leave her in peace. An irresistible drive takes her to a quest in search of clues of the Lost Continent and the paths chosen end up revealing aspects of her own course. Guided by the teachings of the mysterious Gahnende, Lissa tries to understand the binding threads between the Atlantes and the Guaranis and ends up discovering binding threads that redefine the way she understands the world and love.

title: Letter to my Grandchildren
synopsis: The main protagonist is a painter (who shall remain anonymous until the end of the film), who decides to write a letter to his estranged daughters on his seventieth birthday. We learn that the painter's childhood abduction by his father will have long term consequences on his marriage, life, and art. The letter, meant to mend father-daughters relationship, is reconstructed and retold in several poetic vignettes.

title: ¿Y si gritamos poquito?
title_en: And If we shout a little bit?
synopsis: Two players try to make an audition so they can join the cast of a play, but suddenly they realize that the casting director hasn't arrived. Boredom makes these two fellows to do some acting exercises in the lobby. After a few warming games, they decide to develop an exercise a mimicry exercise in which the actors get naked and take a bath together, but the clerk tries to keep them quiet.

title: Saudade, Finitude
synopsis:
This film-poem belongs to a series of videos with similar thematic and poetic approaches: life, death, memory and ephemerality. These themes, recurring in my production, propose reflections relating mainly to ephemerality of life, the inevitability of death and the memories that materialize when the end is near - transformed into 'saudade'.

Thus, feelings connected to word ‘saudade’ are the central theme of the video. This word is very important for Portuguese-speaking countries, because it is exclusive to this language. It represents the mixture of various feelings, like loss, lack, distance and love. It is a word difficult to translate into other languages, being part of international lists of concepts that are, mostly, understood only by their original culture. So, its apparent simplicity hides a complex linguistic and even philosophical nature.

For this production, I realize an experimental proposal in which I use a collage of several images that, superimposed, create poetic sense to the viewer. The images were captured from places and objects that are part of my intimacy: the old park, now abandoned, where I spent most of my childhood; my photo album with a sound device that made me sleep; the turntable; the old typewriter; etc. 

Using the universal language of audiovisual to propose reflections on the word 'saudade', prioritizing the images and the sound and not just the written text, is interesting to establish emotional connections with audiences of diverse cultural realities worldwide.

title: Sibylline Winds
synopsis:
Meditation Abstract Video.

Directored by Steven Corton. Music by: Richard Hill (Sibylline Winds).

title: Soft Pong Inari
synopsis: A visual experiment in crowd-sourcing. Soft Pong Inari was made entirely from pre-existing photos of Fushimi Inari Shrine, available for modified re-use in the creative commons. The film explores how a multi-subjective viewpoint can express a sense of place. The soundtrack is study by Swedish composer Palle Dahlstedt.

title: Mototanaka Dérive
synopsis: This super 8 stop motion film is a record of an aimless walk, in the manner of a situationist dérive, through one of Kyoto's former outcaste neighbourhoods, which continues to exist below normal Japanese living standards. Despite pro-active legislation, people from families associated with such areas can still experience discrimination. The soundtrack was created using an original self-built apparatus called 'The Octopus'. Voltages from light sensors on the projection screen control an analogue modular synthesizer. The film itself acts as a musical score.

title: El Juego
synopsis: A young girl is waiting for her mother when out of the blue a mysterious woman appears at her side and suggests playing a game: "you have to follow the lines on the ground without stepping outside of them," she says. The girl curiously accepts and what at first seems simple, becomes a great challenge.

title: Caballo de mar
synopsis: Pedro Leyva maintains an endless game of chess against boredom, loneliness and the same time, this sailor cuban has seen, after many years of sailing, his life becomes a journey of no return.

title: La trompeta
synopsis: In The Roaring Twenties, where debauchery, alcohol and jazz are at their peak, Jeffrey is a famous Jazz trumpeter having fun playing with Larry and Glen every night at New Orleans' clubs. Everything is fine until one night when the worst thing that can happen to a musician occurs...

title: La Vie en Rose
synopsis: Pepa and Rafael had four children...

title: El tipo del fondo
synopsis: An ordinary man without memory is rescued by other lives, at the right time, random.

title: Golosinas
synopsis: This is the story of two people who run into each other under very different circumstances from when they first met. Time has passed and both have changed.

title: Plástico reciclable
synopsis: Do plastic dream about flesh caresses?

title: Un día cualquiera
synopsis: Another day in the life of Ana, but her boyfriend, family and friends don’t know her real reality, even being part of it.

title: Progreso al pasado
synopsis: Year 2054. After more than 40 years of crisis, in a ruined and decadent country, a pair of cops investigate a mysterious case of attacks dating back to 2014.

title: Come se..
synopsis: Video produced with the assistance of the Diocesan Caritas of Cortona and Arezzo Sansepolcro within the project " The ability of different disabilities." Ilaria , girl suffering from osteogenesis imperfecta and forced in a wheelchair began his daily battle against architectural barriers , every day special ... A heroine who has to deal with a particular epidemic alone be able to save the earth?

title: Le Secret d'Orson Welles
synopsis:
In memory of Orson Welles.
Because he lied to his biographers, not in malice, but for he was "pudique" and he wanted to make his life a legend, I have decided to tell the fake for telling the true.
And the fake that is true appears in his films.

title: Solitude du poète
synopsis:
In memory of Orson Welles.
Because he lied to his biographers, not in malice, but for he was "pudique" and he wanted to make his life a legend, I have decided to tell the fake for telling the true.
And the fake that is true appears in his films.

title: Séduction et Tauromachie
synopsis:
In memory of Orson Welles.
Because he lied to his biographers, not in malice, but for he was "pudique" and he wanted to make his life a legend, I have decided to tell the fake for telling the true.
And the fake that is true appears in his films.

title: Egy kéz élete
synopsis:
The film starts with the meeting of two hands. They fall in love and the union of the two gives life of a little one. The tiny hand grabs the parent’s finger, discovers his own motions. He holds objects and gains knowledge. Improves. Starts to eat and drink independently, creates his first drawings. Then he finds friends, starts the school and the little child grows up to be a boy. We show the adolescence’s first successes and failures, while we place the emphasis still on the hands. Like in the life of a youngster, music, party and love appears in the movie. Adulthood starts and the love of his life becomes marriage. The easy and droll years are replaced by the years of parenthood, until they finally become grandparents. Years go by and the hardworking hands turn motionless. 
The experimental short film portrays the life from the perspective of a hand. We see the happy moments and the conflicts of daily life. The touching movie tries to draw attention to the importance and beauty of the small, everyday events in life, supposed to be insignificants.

title: La Concha de la Vieira
synopsis:
We are on the edge of Finisterrae, regarded in ancient times as the "Last Stop",
beyond it there was nothing but the big expanse of the ocean.
From this place the ancient pilgrims threw their dirty clothes down into the ocean
so they could leave everything before turning back.
Amin Lazar, a polish pilgrim,
is trying to understand where the way ends and what he has to do:
stop and go back home or keep walking, maybe forever...

title: Ce qui fane
synopsis: A young boy raised by his grandmother finds her dead and keeps the secret.

title: Scarlet Says
synopsis: During youngest daughter Sadie's fancy dress birthday outside, older sister Scarlet and her little brother Jeremy go off for an adventure amongst the woods..but where does reality end and fantasy begin?
other_credits:
Cast:
Alexandra Gilbreath
Emma Amos
Mark Brent

title: Косичка
synopsis: Усыновленная девочка-подросток, страдающая от недостатка родительской любви, находит странный и опасный способ привлечь к себе внимание...

title: GOCHOS (ENG SUBT)
synopsis: THE WORLD IS TURNED ON ITS HEAD

title: Cosmovision
synopsis: Cosmovision is the amazing journey of a bacteria trough the micro and macrocosmic world
screenwriter: Nora juncker, Carlos Violante,  Ingrid Gallardo

title: Фотография
synopsis: Группа сирот прибывает в небольшой город . Один из сирот любуясь семьей отстает от группы и  встречает трудности на своем пути.

title: Ataque de Consciência
synopsis:
“A man moves into the spaces of his mind
by walking through gaps, excavations and fissures of light.
He comes across a personal abyss and is set forth on a search.
We are invited to visit imaginary landscapes, where time is not translated,
Following the course trail of a reflection”

title: Bahauddin
synopsis:
Bahauddin (18), a young Sevillian dervish of deep faith and devotion, lives in a Naqshbandi Sufi community in Lefke, Cyprus.
	A recent breakup, a he tells the filmmaker, generates profound sadness and depression. This makes him lazy and listless. Not being able to fulfill his daily duties, Bahauddin want to evade himself from everything. 
	Hoping that a solitary retreat in touch with God will return peace and love to his life, Bahauddin dreams of escaping to the mountain, however, day after day, he postpones his project.

title: Smelaya mama
synopsis:
A young mother isn't afraid of a single thing in the world except rats. 
Sure enough one day a giant rat shows up in the mother's apartment. The rat tells the mother he will leave her alone, but only if she grants his 3 wishes. The wishes become more and more demanding as the rat grows bigger and bigger... 
Will the frightened mother be able to defeat the terrible rat and her greatest fear?

title: Окситоцин
synopsis: Why man is so hard to leave his beloved woman? What power does link him to her? And what if it's time to break the destructive affection?

title: La Goutte d'Eau
synopsis: After a costume party, two young women, Alex and Manue, are driving fast through the night on a countryside road. They seem stressed out but both know that soon they’ll finally dispense justice. Except that nothing will turn out as planned…

title: The Cowboy - in color
synopsis: In a black and white world a cowboy picks colors up from his hat, but a crow steals the hat and turns the world gray. A fable about the elementary particles - in RGB technique.

title: 뿔
synopsis: Gak-su puts bandage on his forehead because he thinks that he has a horn.

title: Joyeux anniversaire
synopsis:
Virginie is having dinner with her son and her husband, none of them speaking a lot even though that is her birthday. 
As Virginie is about to blow the only candle on her birthday cake  Charlotte - her roomate - walks in and we then find out that Virginie, a 40 year-old transexual, had been alone since the beginning.

title: REFLECTION
synopsis: Gustavo is driving along in his car. Suddenly, his girlfriend appears and quickly disappears again as only a reflection. They have arguments, they make up. However, this all only exists in his mind

title: Хлам
synopsis: Сестра с братом приезжают убирать старую бытовку на оставленном в наследство от отца участке. Во время уборки всплывают табуированые темы, которые приводят к обострению конфлікта.

title: Dead End
synopsis: A morning like every other finds an elderly couple getting on with their daily routine. The loss of youth, social and professional activity intensifies the old man’s obsessions and he is found desperately trying to find meaning in his life. His fixation with «making money» takes him through the day without being touched by the loneliness of his wife.

title: ΤΟ ΝΑΝΟΥΡΙΣΜΑ ΤΗΣ ΠΕΤΑΛΟΥΔΑΣ
synopsis: A woman receives a mysterious phone call; that same night she has trouble sleeping, tormented with thoughts. Early the next day she abandons her house and sets out on a journey to an unknown destination, carrying a kitchen knife in her bag. After driving all day, she parks her car at a remote location and waits for someone… something… in the middle of the night...

title: L'oreig
synopsis: It is summer and Júlia, a thirteen years old girl, is spending her holidays in the village. One morning, she goes to the river in the forest with Martina, her older friend. There they both meet some teenagers from the village. Suddenly, Júlia will be surrounded by an ambience where everybody is older than her. And soon a chance encounter will change the course of Julia's summer and mark the end of her childhood.

title: Mr.Dentonn
synopsis: On a cold winter night, Laura reads his brother David the story of a strange creature that attacks children. Suddenly, a shiver runs Laura's body, feeling a strange presence in the house. It’s him.

title: Las Cosas Raras
synopsis: Mercedes and Javier hire Julia a nanny to take care of their infant daughter so they can enjoy a night out. The rules are simple, theirs food in the fridge, clean up, and don't go into the babies bedroom. During the night Julia inspects the house and does as told, until two masked individuals enter the house and start attacking her. Being an out of the ordinary nanny Julia strikes back fighting the invaders. She disposes of one of them rather quickly, but she lets him land a few hits before doing so. She then encounters the other invader who is revealed to be Mercedes, the women that hired her, during their fight things take a turn to the sexual, with Mercedes overpowering her, Julia breaks free and settles her attacker down. Mercedes and Javier are sitting in the couch when Julia enters and picks up an envelope full of money, she says she will see them next month. Mercedes and Javier share a look of satisfaction. They had they their fun.

title: Samarkande
synopsis: In Baghdad, in 8th century, the Caliph Haroun Al Rachid is a man for whom the human life has only not much value. But when his dearest friend the grand vizier arrives terrified, his vision of the death is irreparably going to change.

title: Aún hay tiempo
synopsis: With no other intention than  to fix their relationship, Ángel shows up in the mall where Nina, his ex-girlfriend, works on a christmas eve. What he doesn’t yet know is that to get his girlfriend back he must fight in a space-time labyrinth created by a twisted Santa Claus doll.

title: Zéro
synopsis: In the middle of a little suburb park, a young boy is getting to reveal his incredible secret to his schoolmate. If he proves he has wonder powers, he'll can join the band.

title: طيف القاهرة
synopsis:
Egypt. The sun is rising on Cairo. 
The call to prayer is heard. Omar is getting ready. 
He is searching for a woman. 
On his way, a strange man urges him to go back to his people...

title: Freedom
synopsis: Vision of liberty and freedoom around Slovenia.

title: Кофр
synopsis: Молодой накрокурьер перевозит изрядное количество кокаина в кофре мотоцикла. На одной из лесных безлюдных дорог ему встречается голосующая симпотичная незнакомка. Он останавливается чтобы подвезти девушку, но она оказывается не самой законопослушной особой и крадет у него ключи от мотоцикла.
other_credits:
Александр Коробов
Юля Кулиева

Лилия Попова
Владислав Королев
Степан Руднев

title: Бездна
synopsis: В недрах заброшенной промзоны, в глубокой шахте таится неизвестная опасность... Такой сон видит ревнивец Илья, пока девушка, которую он любит, изменяет с его лучшим другом. Или нет? Что, если это лишь иллюзия? А страшный сон - наоборот, реальность?

title: Indómito Mogambo
synopsis: Sebastian Mogambo, once a respected music manager, is hopeless and desperate from his comeback trip of India. Nowhere to go, return to his neighborhood where will live an intense night.

title: L'Abîme Vif
synopsis:
Ivan and Gladia try to put an end to their relationship, in a game of caresses and reproaches that seem to come from Ivan’s dark fantasies. 
Ivan’s attitude is ambivalent—attracted by the rejection, he fluctuates between the hate and the hope of healing the relationship. In spite of everything, Ivan proves to be incapable to decide himself, even if the proximity of the end results in some kind of sincerity. 
But Gladia, viscerally affected, is able after all to put an end to relation.

title: At the Last Stop Called Ghost Chimney
title_en: At the Last Stop Called Ghost Chimney
synopsis: To spend more time with the bus driver she has always liked, on the last day of school, a girl rides to the last stop called Ghost Chimney. Depending on the angle, it is looked as one chimney or four chimneys. The girl and the bus driver dream of a world beyond the last stop....

title: TEMPO INVERSO
synopsis:
ALBERTO has the ability to travel both back and forth in time at will. It always works the same way: second to second, minute to minute, day to day, but it consumes his lifespan and ages him equally either he travels forwards or backwards.

ALBERTO's ability to go back in time and remember what he lived provides him with privileged information which allows him to correct certain incidents and control his luck. Any mistake can be unmade; it is just a matter of time.

In his adulthood ALBERTO receives bad news and despite his ability he will not be able to do anything to change it or correct it.

title: Sector Zero 4
synopsis: Melissa Baquer is driving on the wrong way when she requests to the Computer Emergency Center to route her vehicle via GPS. During the call will suffer an brutal accident.

title: Inside
synopsis: Alone, trapped in a cloudy and dark world, a young boy looks around and sinks into madness and terror. Suddenly, a white flash blinds him and a white door appears before him. The boy, filled with wonder, runs to the door to open it. But a black smoke catapults him back. The boy gets up and sees the smoke, which turns out to be his evil twin. The boy gets scared and his double, laughing, removed the door. The boy panics and his double challenges him to a duel. The boy stands up and gives him a punch. Its double teleports and strikes him back. Injured, the boy kneels and his double laughes heartily. The boy gets angry and hits him with a spectacular shot. The boy looks impressed and his double gets angry too. The boy remains focused and his evil twin rises in his turn. He strengthens his fist and jumped on him to achieve him. The boy finally defeats his double penetrating his fist in the heart. His evil twin explodes and disappears. Exhausted, the boy breathes deeply and the door reappears. The boy gets up, walks quietly to the door and opens it. A white flash illuminates the universe.

title: Судьба на замену
synopsis:
Максим – человек с позитивным отношением к судьбе, которая отвечает ему взаимностью. Но даже у судьбы случается отпуск. А правильно ли справится со своей задачей тот, кто придет на замену, – вот главный вопрос!
Maxim is a person with positive attitude to the fate which loves him too. But even fate has a vacation. And will the one who replaces Maxim's fate properly cope with its task - is the big question!
film_awards: Золотая Лада (фестиваль "Встречи на Вятке"), Лучший студенческий фильм (Fuse Film Festival), диплом за монтаж (фестиваль "Покров")
director_photography: Екатерина Гребнер, Игорь Рено/Ekaterina Grebner, Igor Reno

title: Minor Border
synopsis:
Since the border between Austria and Hungary became a "Schengen border" it seems to have lost its meaning. Therefore the border stations , among them the "small border crossing" in Nickelsdorf/Hegyeshalom are being removed. 
The border persists culturally and socially, based on historically grown resentments and new European laws. 25 years after the fall of the Iron Curtain, the border still excists as division in income and life satndards. And for those who travel to and within Europe without all the necessary papers, the border is not a line to cross anymore. They are carrying it with them wherever they move, in the form of electronic doubles in databases, that are made to watch and  control each of their steps.
Poeple related to this border talk about the ways it still exists in their own languages. The stories are subtitled in English.

title: Vekne Hleba i Riba
synopsis:
In a little village in the heart of Serbia Mirko takes care of the old and small Serbian Orthodox church of the community. Every day he opens the church and with strong dedication prepares all details for the service that the priest will give. When everything is ready, Mirko rings the bells. Only an old and devoted woman enters the church: she is the only person attending the service. But one day not even the old lady arrives.

As a cinematographic attempt to capture the invisible, The Loaves and Fish tries to catch the essence and mystery of the profound faith of a small Orthodox community in a remote Serbian village. But this is also a short film about faith in its broader meaning: faith conceived as persistence, dedication and the capacity to wait. Somehow it is a film about the meaning of silence and work. The filmmakers contributing to the project are combining an atmospheric use of sound and image to create a film they like to describe as a «documentary tale».

title: Simple
synopsis: "I just want sex!" says Tanja to Benjamin

title: Reformed Citizen
synopsis: José Martinez, an ordinary man, wake up in a mysterious white room, tied up at a surgical table. Two individuals, dressing odd white clothes, start to communicate with him using only a monitor, where they write messages. They accuse him of been a immoral person and intend to punish him.

title: ОБНЦБНЧА
synopsis: Энциклопедия перестроечного детства

title: O Maior Espetáculo da Cidade
synopsis:
In the 60s, in full decay of a Brazilian typical Theatre genre (Teatro de Revista), Zé Catatau, a comic, and Yolanda a starlet, receive, form  their Director, the news that they are making their last show in the Theatre Company to which they belong. That's because the theatre will be closed in order to be replaced by a building. 

They spent the night trying to deal with the end of the roles that they played on stage, and that for so long defined them. The barriers between actor and character seem to be increasingly tenuous. While Yolanda says goodbye to all his history in that theatre, for Zé Catatau it is difficult to assume the reality and he tries to pretend that all is well , spending the night in the bohemian .

Meanwhile, for the Director, who carried this company over the years, is the end of everything he knew, but perhaps his star can still carry on some of him.

A film that speaks abou the Brazilian culture, using color, music and bohemia, as in the theatrical genre "Teatro de revista".

title: The treasure of light
synopsis: A man is haunted about a dream from the spirit of a mysterious girl who walks in the direction to a huge rock. He runs after her, but each time he arrives at the rock too late and the girl disappears. The man will meet a strange guy called Joseph who apparently knows what has really happened to the mysterious girl on this rock. Soon, the man will get an answer in his dream that is when he will know that he will be able to arrive on time and save that mysterious girl...

title: Коробочка
synopsis:
В этой ироничной комедии вчерашний "ботан" и нынешний мастер по знакомству с девушками вступает в финальную битву со своим наставником. Успеет ли он побить рекорд своего наставника? Ему встретятся разные девушки, и одна из них изменит его жизнь...
While trying to win a bet with his coach on who seduces more girls in one week, an ex-nerd and Shakespeare fan meets a girl that will change his life for ever...
producer: Любовь Игнатьева, Дмитрий Куповых/Lubov Ignatieva, Dmitriy Kupovih
music: Paul Mottram , Terry Devine-King , Christopher Ashmore , Tom Smail , Tim Garland / Geoffrey Keezer , Paul Mottram, Cissie Redgwick / Bob Bradley / Steve Dymond, Little Violet / Bob Bradley
director_photography: Илья Кондратьев, Дмитрий Поляков/Ilya Kondratiev, Dmitry Polyakov

title: Tu P*** Banco
synopsis: Ramón has got tickets to go tonight with his son to the football king cup final between Atlético de Madrid and Real Madrid. But he must solve a question before that: he must rob a bank.
other_credits: Cast: Carlos Kaniowsky, Pedro Morales, Marta López Mazorra, María Kaltembacher, Gustavo Fernández, Mariano Monedero, Iván Bezanilla “Txutxo”, Ylenia Ruiz

title: Despierta
synopsis: Short film based on experimental realism which seeks to reflect on the pace and current lifestyle in which the mass globalized world, does the individual lose their personality and individuality, understood and its unique essence. The man is replaced by the frantic routine movement and society that goes to nowhere on the constant flow of subjects.

title: PATIENT 39
synopsis: When a soldier known only as Patient 39 awakes from a coma with no memory, the search begins for his identity and past.
director_awards:
Winner X Faculty Award, THE CALCULUS OF LOVE, X Science Film Festival
Winner Best Direction, THE CALCULUS OF LOVE, Shortini Film Festival
other_credits: based on the short story 'Ghost of a Bird' by William Boyd

title: Dernière Nuit
synopsis:
An evening of drunkenness to celebrate the end of a rent of 2 room mates.
A night meeting, a threesome in preparation before the accidental death of a lady. A night of anxiety to make the body vanish before movers come...

title: A veces viene
synopsis: Sarah is getting ready to go out for dinner with a friend. Suddenly, she feels that she is not alone at home. Making up her mind that her suspect was true, she only has one direction decision.

title: Практическая магия
synopsis:
Главная героиня - одинокая девушка за 30-ть - пытается привлечь в свою жизнь любовь с помощью магии.
The main character - a lonely girl 30-th - trying to attract love into your life with magic.
editor: Наталья Мехия, Глумнушина Наталья/Natalia Mejia, Natalia Glumnushina
music: Дмитрий Берлизов, Михаил Малоголовко, Никита Гаранин/Dmitry Berlizov, Michael Malogolovko, Nikita Garanin

title: Герои нашего времени
synopsis: Лето это счастье. Особенно когда оно в деревне с любовью и друзьями.
other_credits: Аня Светлова, Максим Кравченко, Влад и Ярик Моисеенко, Жанна Кабыф

title: Тунэль
synopsis: Браты трапляюць у тунэль і спрабуюць разам выбрацца з яго, аднак высвятленне адносін ўсё ж разводзіць іх па розных баках. Куды яны вядуць становіцца зразумелым толькі ў развязцы фільма.
director_awards: "Ривнеский слон" за фільм "Роўна праз прызму часу 2" (Роўна-730-2013) і "Конотопская конь" за фільм "Тунэль" (Руды конь-2014)
other_credits: Акцёры - Андрэй Кудзеля, Сяргей Зінчук, Кацярына яравых. Гук - Сяргей Панфілаў, Пётр Буткевіч

title: Othell'a
synopsis: The young and beautiful Ivy is meeting someone who will deeply main to her soul.

title: COMPORTAMIENTO BIPOLAR
synopsis:
In 1965 the psychiatric hospital for disturbed criminals West Point, Pennsylvania was used to house all the patients considered very dangerous. 
The director of the center was a cold, ruthless woman who became the psychiatric in an orgy of madness, depravity, abuse and mistreatment of patients ... 
Who gave electric shocks to cure them of their ills ... slavery and blood testing rats injected in terminal patients. 
All patients in the center were savagely mutilated and murdered. 
The director of the center was never found ... 
Today there are people who claim to have seen the director walking near the trade ... 
Welcome to the bipolar psychiatric center!
screenwriter: Christina Rapado, Richard Leal, Thommy Tayco

title: Mama, please forgive me
synopsis: Intimate short documentary filmed in New York. The author collects testimonies from a young man who has trouble coping with life. “It’s a war, there’s a war in my mind and I wouldn’t want anyone to go through that”.

title: Prohibido Arrojar Cadáveres a la Basura
synopsis:
In 2029 the Spaniards don´t know what to do with their death relatives. Burying them is very expensive. Incineration has been forbidden due to environmental reasons. A new law forbids transporting them from cities to rural cemeteries.

Nati and Tomás´s daugther is dying…

title: QUEEN OF NOLLYWOOD
synopsis: When the search for the Queen of Nollywood who will represent Nigeria at the upcoming Beauty Eurasia in Turkey became deadly, only five girls came out alive.

title: Folclore
synopsis:
Two Friend are in a bar, watching a soccer game, but one of them doesn't like soccer. So, he begins to tell a story that he herd at the work. 

That is the story of a secret club were very rich and powerful men and women get together to do all sorts of ilegal and immoral activities. They have sex with male and  female prostitutes, use drugs, and other things like that.

But, in the back of this club, they do the must forbidden think. People with serious debts are forced to play Russian roulette in order to pay what they owe. Even worst, these rich men and women, make there own bets in who is gonna be the winner.

Folklore is the story of how this club started, and also the love story behind this beginning. But, overall, is a short movie about the way we tell storys.

title: Каждый первый
synopsis: В зале ресторана Анна Андреевна обнаруживает пропажу кошелька и вызывает стражей правопорядка…
film_awards: "Лучший игровой фильм до 30 минут" и "Лучшая актерская работа" (актриса Марина Солопченко): VI Всероссийский фестиваль авторского короткометражного кино "Арткино" (Москва, сентябрь 2014).
director_awards:
Награды режиссера:
2014 - VI Всероссийский фестиваль авторского короткометражного кино "Арткино" (Москва) - Лучший игровой фильм до 30 минут (за фильм "Каждый первый").
2014 - VII Международный фестиваль искусств "Арт-Изо-Фест" (Москва) - Диплом победителя в номинации "За выдающийся вклад в развитие авторского кино в России" (за фильм "Потерянный дом").

2013 - XIII кинофестиваль студенческих фильмов "Питеркит" (Санкт-Петербург) - Диплом жюри "За успешное начало" (за фильм "Потерянный дом").
2013 - XI Кинофестиваль молодого кино «Зелёное яблоко» (Новосибирск) - Лучший игровой короткометражный фильм  (за фильм "Потерянный дом").
2013 - Криворожский кинофестиваль "Кино под звездами, дубль 4" (Кривой Рог, Украина) - Специальный диплом "За любовь, которая объединяет мир в фильме "Потерянный дом".
2013 - V Казанский международный фестиваль любительского, молодежного и детского кино - Специальный приз от дирекции фестиваля (за фильм "Потерянный дом").

title: I PHONE
synopsis:
The film is made in a plan sequence.storyline about a man named Kiyanoosh suspicious that his wife about relationship with another man. A Day at the Kianoosh sees his wife with another man's .
But he is wrong

title: #ПравоНаАборт
synopsis: The project consists of several video messages created within the campaign #ПравоНаАборт initiated by Left-Fem group. The debates over the bill banning abortion in the Russian Federation prompted activists to launch a campaign against these initiatives. Doctors, historians, psychologists, researchers, artists, legislators, students, young parents, mothers with many children, people with different political views explain why the right to an abortion is the key to a society where everyone will feel comfortable. About 200 people from Ukraine, Finland, Turkey, Australia, the United States, etc. participated in the project.

title: Parabéns Pra Você
synopsis: A man wait for  some people to celebrate his birthday.

title: Voluntario
synopsis: Jaime wants to live in Hollywood. His parents want him to go a bit farther.

title: Casitas
synopsis: Carlos and Marta, both 35 years old, are living the life they’ve always dreamed of…a house with a yard, a dog, and they’re even about to have a child…but there’s no such thing as a perfect life.

title: Carnevale
synopsis:
Inspired on a true story.
The Carnival is a celebration without any rules, 
where fact and fiction plays together and creates it's own world.
The only task required is to be a part of it.
Is the Carnival a farcical celebration? On a day like this we could really fall in love with something fake

title: Tú o yo
synopsis: All’s fair in love and war…and work.

title: Beogradska sonata
synopsis: Belgrade sonata is about lack of empathy in modern society. It presents people from Mentally Challenged Aid Society spending days underground in an atomic shelter used during bombing, without light and fresh air, but showing their creativity and a way of life that can be good example for all of us.
film_awards:
2nd Award for Documentary - XVII. Faludi International Youth Film Festival, Budapest, Hungary (15.11.2013.)

Award for most authentic movie - Seize the Film Festival, Novi Sad, Serbia, 28.9.2013.
director_awards:

Award for radio-play, radio televison of Serbia, 2014.

title: Dernière Volonté
synopsis: A priest visits a condemned to death. A discussion about God , hope , love , death , life and his sense ... or his nonsense.

title: Новые русские казаки
synopsis: Кто такие казаки? Народ? Сословие? Или образ жизни? Этот фильм рассказывает о войне в казачьей среде. Впрочем, кино вовсе и не о казаках... Оно о миссии славян и нас, наследниках великой истории предков. Готовы ли мы понять, кто мы есть и куда идем? О народе, исчезающем с лица земли.
film_awards:
Премия имени Хантера Томпсона (Москва, 2014 г.)
ряд наград на фестивалях регионального уровня
director_awards: премия имени Хантера Томпсона  (Москва, 2014 г.)
other_credits:
Звукорежиссер: Георгий Стариков
Графика и анимация: Кирилл Алферов

title: Carroña
synopsis:
A symbolic representation of our society through marriage and a young housekeeper, in a single location, the dining room is an endless feast of Mary given service, who voluntarily agreed to be abuses, whims and caprices of those who are now their masters.
It is a reflection on the unconscious agreements of a capitalist society, oppressor and oppressed.

title: Приказ
synopsis: Фильм направлен на сохранение исторической памяти и посвящен событиям Великой Отечественной войны. Основа фильма - воспоминания ветерана о случае, произошедшем с ним в 42-43 г. Фильм снят любителями истории - участниками военно-исторических клубов Екатеринбурга. Дата производства фильма - июль 2014 г.

title: NEVER FORGET THE TIP
synopsis:
Three pretty girls, Alexia, Linda and Mireia are having the time of her life on summer vacations: Beach, party and handsome guys ....
 
But what happens in Mexico, stays in Mexico ...

title: Hijos de Cain
synopsis:
In some populated state of Mexico, Jacinta, a young faded, is sexually harassed by his godfather, was abused by her parents and drug influenced by her boyfriend. 
She will look for luck in the state capital. It certainly achieved escape the hostile environment of your home, but not as we had imagined.

title: Isabel teme a la vida, Eduardo ya no teme volar
title_en: Isabel teme a la vida, Eduardo ya no teme volar
synopsis: Isabel is in love, and she has in her heart all the revolutions. Isabel is afraid of life, Isabel is afraid of stars, Isabel is afraid of existence. Eduardo is not afraid of flying anymore. Isabel and Eduardo find themselves, Isabel and Eduardo lose themselves.

title: Raconte-moi ... Le Petit Prince
title_en: Tell me the story of ... The Little Prince
synopsis:
« Draw me a sheep ! » Between dream and reality, the silhouette of a child appears suddenly from the sky. This Little Prince, lost in a world not his own, becomes for a short while the only companion of the aviator.

“Tell me the story of ... The Little Prince“, a mini series in three chapters, where diverse audiovisual styles are employed, offering a unique reading of the famous tale by Saint-Exupéry.

title: Das Katzenjammertal
synopsis: A woman dozes in infinite room. She wakes up and looks around her. Suddenly, a screen is projected in front of her. While she is watching the screen, a cat comes close to her. And the cat hit her back and she starts throwing up her innermost things.

title: a geografia é algum lugar entre o coração e aquilo que já foi
title_en: geography is somewhere between the heart and what has gone
synopsis: Geography is somewhere between the heart and what has gone is a montagem experience. A collage of impressions in search of a narrative. To create memories from travel records: memories that stumble, almost like commas. Memories that make other colors, other speeds; memories in composition. These fragments become one with the intervention of the text: impermanence, memory, wandering. What are the possible narratives between the dweller and the place where he is?

title: ROJO
synopsis: JESSE is an adolescent addicted to chatting. One day an unknown gay 'friend' proposes a blind date in a public place, but the boy, not having seen his face, insists he uses a 'red' shirt so he can recognize him. What Jesse never imagined was that with that meeting some of his worst fears would come true, beyond anything he could imagine.

title: TRAZOS EN LA CUMBRE
synopsis: Golfredo is a fourteen year old boy who lives high in the mountains of Mérida, Venezuela, in a little town called Los Nevados, the Snowy Peaks. His time goes by in hard work on the land, to which his father wants him to devote his life. Although he has serious trouble with his eyesight, his great passion is for drawing. 'Drawing on the Heights' is the true story of how this boy, through his perseverance and his goodness, struggles through difficulties to achieve his dream, transforming his life and the life of those around him.

title: Alegría del hogar
synopsis: Sofía, Josefina and Mote go out to a party in a ran down house where a rock band is playing. Little by little, the girls get into the mood of the party and, after Sofía has sent away the first guy that approaches her, they’re already drunk and dancing in front of the band. Nevertheless, the group of friends will split throught the night. After kissing a guy she doesn’t like, Josefina sticks to a wild blonde girl and her friends, with whom she leaves the party. Sofía pivots between two guys all night until she picks one with whom she also leaves the party. Mote, not finding a guy or a girl to be with, stays by herself until the end of the night, trying unsuccessfully to mingle in a group of stragglers, the last to quit the party.

title: Тонкие линии
synopsis: История художницы, однажды загадавшей желание: рисовать так, как никто не рисует...

title: El ritual de las composturas
synopsis: During a family conflict, Montserrat announces her intentions of moving out. This argument evolves and takes us on a trip into the private world of each family member: an absent father, an over-bearing mother, a substitute mother figure, and a daughter who debates between comfort and freedom.

title: Полюбил
synopsis: Несерьезная анимация для взрослых и не только на серьезную тему по серьезным стихам серьезного поэта Назыма Хекмета.
director_awards: Спец. приз жюри фестиваля "Киноглаз, спец. диплом фестиваля "Кунаки", диплом фестиваля Милосердие.DOC - за фильм "Мустафа"
other_credits: роль паучка озвучивал - Максим Зайцев

title: Белым про черное
synopsis:
Children look to adults illusion.
Детский взгляд на взрослые иллюзии.

title: Ne parlez pas d'amour
synopsis: Samir, a junior high school pupil, edgy and impulsive, is in love with Lea, a classmate in a wheelchair. After he is unjustly expelled from school, he is set upon revenge…

title: В дверь звонят
synopsis:
There is a Buzz is a warm short dramedy about excuses for not being a person you would like to be. 

Petya, a man in his late 30s, comes to his mom to ask her for some money again, but he finds money right in front of her door. Of course, the money is hers. What shall he do?
Come on, nobody would have returned it! Or?..

title: The Viewers
synopsis:
During the fifties, the ex-movie star Uma Enoci is having a lull in her career. 
In order to get her back on the tracks, her agent Max Mayerling, plans a meeting with a young director in a hotel room. Meanwhile, Max hires a detective, Leonard, who stays in the next room, to spy on her through a two-way mirror... 
As Leonard's fascination for the actress grows, he becomes the privileged viewer of a more and more dangerous game of manipulation...

title: Во всем виноват сценарист
synopsis: Молодая женщина на приеме у психоаналитика долго не решается начать рассказывать о своей психологической проблеме в отношениях с любимым мужчиной. Наконец, преодолев  неловкость, она излагает свою проблему. У психоаналитика есть решение, но оно несколько необычно... Их разговор заканчивается весьма неожиданно...

title: Impact
synopsis: Two films for the price of one for this comedy about TV series and their impact on our daily lives. An exercise of cinematic styles to give birth to two totally different atmospheres, and drag a message of humor to all the TV viewers we are.

title: МУРЧА
synopsis: Один муравей живеть в этом мире всего 4-ри дня, но за это время усмеет многово увидеть в этом мире.

title: Pasaje no reembolsable (english subtitles)
synopsis: Maria decides to travel abroad in search of a better life. The ticket is non-refundable.

title: Каждый 88
synopsis: Молодой советский солдат погибает на поле боя. Он хотел жить, но попал в другой мир, о котором не писали ни в одной книге. Всё, чем он жил, все его ценности и воспоминания в прошлом. Ему остается только ждать билет в новую жизнь и надеяться, что он будет счастливым.

title: Nahuales
synopsis: Fatima and Jesus are desperate. She is in a hurry to jump up in to the world of television and he has urge to have a space in her heart. To achieve its objectives both are ready for anything, even to give credit to a crazy old man who ensures that they can film a real Nahual. Support towards the mysterious Asuncion to achieve his goal is a mistake that will put all humanity in a unimaginable danger.

title: Game Companion
synopsis: Thirty-something Bob lives downstairs in his mom's house, works in fast food and has one friend. His greatest accomplishment is making it to master in a fighter-style video game, permitting him a game companion, Kimiko, which turns out to be real. Kimiko is impressed with Bob as a "great warrior", but when she starts to discover he is not very important in his own world, her enthusiasm fades.

title: MELAWA
synopsis: Melawa (the festival of marriages) is the story of a small village girl Manju. In one of drawing competition arranged by school, manju presents the blunt reality of innocent girls in her village & their future. Manju’s father is worried about the marriage of his four daughters. Based on superstitious belief, he decides to marry off his youngest daughter manju. As manju wins the drawing competition and a handsome amount as a price, she starts getting various marriage proposals. Scared for her own future Manju takes a bold decision.

title: Однажды, просто шкура
synopsis:
Синопсис

Фильм построен на трех историях, где события происходят в городе Уфе.

Первая история затрагивает проблему отсутствия культуры у людей, которые портят стены домов в городе бессмысленными рисунками и фразами. Еще эта история о том, что есть уличный вид искусства – граффити и нужно его развивать, чтобы город стал красивее.
Вторая история рассказывает о том, что благородный поступок  одного человека может спасти другого человека, оказавшегося в беде. Делать добро – это очень просто.
Третья история о молодом человеке, который не может определиться в жизни. А все просто: нужно поверить в себя и начать действовать, чтобы достичь своих целей.
Все эти истории переплетены между собой, три героя выбирают свою жизненную позицию, определяются в жизни.
Граффитчик Миша в очередной раз рисует на стене дома, его замечает охранник. Убегая от охранника, Мишу сбивает машина. В больнице он видит сон: Сергей Радонежский находит случайно в лесу шкуру медведя и , разговаривая с медведем, он подсказывает Мише о его предназначении в жизни.
В конце истории он изображает на фасаде Сергея Радонежского и медведя. Прохожие, идущие мимо, останавливаются, увидев эту красоту, ведь она несет смысл и заставляет человека задуматься о более высоких и духовных делах в жизни.
Герой второй истории Марат находится в подавленном состоянии так, как его здоровье находится под угрозой. Он не может найти деньги для того, чтобы оплатить операцию. Происходит чудо, совершенно ему незнакомый человек, оплачивает его операцию. Звонок из больницы и Марата везут на операцию, он не понимает до конца , почему так все разрешилось в его пользу. Выйдя из больницы, Марат начинает искать своего спасителя, но не может его найти и тогда он понимает, что он может отблагодарить этого человека по-другому: продолжить совершать добрые поступки.
Герой третьей истории Сергей находится в поиске работы, но его никуда не берут. Находясь в состоянии безразличия и апатии к жизни, после очередного отказа (его не берут на работу) Сергей идет в парк и встречает девочку Яну. 
Между ними завязывается диалог. После этого разговора главный герой понимает, что в жизни все зависит только от самого себя и нельзя терять время впустую. И он находит работу.
В трех историях проходит один  мистический образ,  который связывает эти сюжеты, это образ девочки – ангела. Она помогает молодым людям выйти из сложных ситуации в их жизни и вселяет в них веру в себя.
Раскрыта жизнь города….

title: Five Worlds
synopsis: A mysterious story without words starts at the bottom of a tea cup a lead us to five different worlds of dusky tearooms, colourful mandalas, strange planetas, red rose petals or games of chess. Is it reality, or is it a dream? Is there something beyond that interconects each of us?

title: Yuva
synopsis:
Human life resembles three aspects of a rain drop. Sky, rain and soil…
Sky is freedom. Innocence of childhood ends with envy. This first sin is completed with the first stone thrown. Still, none of these are enough to end the childhood. Until seeing the death…
Rain is the energy, haste, inexperience of humanity. We all learn life and get the worst injuries in this time.
Soil is death, eternity. It is the journey to the opposite shore of life. As in Cahit Sitki’s verses: “Come on Abbas, it is time…”

title: Быть рядом
synopsis: Костя– главный герой картины, самолично повествует зрителю о своих семейных неурядицах. В частности, о проблемах с женой, которая по его вине «заболела». Костя рассказывает о том, что его любимая совершенно изменилась после автокатастрофы, в которой им обоим с женой – Лерой, к сожалению,  давилось оказаться.  Константин делится своими переживаниями по поводу того, что у его супруги отнялась речь и тело. Рассказывает о том, как ухаживает за обездвиженной спутницей жизни и лишь в конце Костиного повествования становиться понятно, что все это время Костя рассказывал о мертвом человеке, мертвом по его вине. Становиться понятно, что Костя живет в мире больных иллюзий и, к сожалению, не один – в этот «мир иллюзий» из настоящего он прихватил труп собственной жены, заботливо вымоченный в формалине.

title: The Awakening
synopsis: In the 1930s, Vito Liberatore goes to Argentina escaping from the debts of the mob at the US, believing he could lose them in the other half of the world, just like his family thought when they escaped from Sicily to the States for the same reason, several years ago. However, after getting off the boat, he is followed by the gangsters. He escapes again as far as he can, even with a bullet inside him. At the end of the road, he has to face his fears and kill them. That way, he will be prepared to save his family legacy and deal with them once for all.

title: The Mess Song
synopsis:
short: „Life´s a blurry mess!“ Is it? Join Bubble Boy on his musical journey with „Jeanny has had a nightmare“ and find out yourself! 

long:
"Videograpically „The Mess Song“ is a journey.
The protagonist – Bubble Boy, the aliensuperherocreature- heads off to  explore the world unknown to him. A world he sees for the first time, that looks strange to him and in which he feels estranged himself.
He meets other creatures, discovers new places, is himself.

The collision of the real and the unreal world is the theme of the film. Reality becomes manifest in the surrounding, the passersby and the musicians, whilst Bubble Boy follows his way pedaling.
The existing of composite beings personified by the dog man, the guitar guy and the dancers allegorizes the absence of strict dualism, maybe even the urge to slightly turn the back on the real world.

Furthermore „The Mess Song“ is a hommage to coffee, fuel of the artist, the life, as well as an ode to home, the idyll, at the same time cosy real world and scene of surreal happenings. The pittoresque scenery of Munich is the perfect backdrop.

There, in a dusty ol´ bar almost from another time, the worlds of the artists and the creature meet. With Bubble Boy being the only guest at the concert. Yet he is not alone on his journey! Unexpectedly he is welcomed by others of his kind before he keeps following his path.
Into the unknown."

title: The Silent Killer
synopsis: Gem and Manuel are rethinking their relationship. They live in a small inland town with his son Andrew. But one day, for no apparent reason, Gema disappears. It appears that has been kidnapped by a serial murderer who is called "The Silent Killer".

title: EK KULTA EK RAJA
synopsis: A few moments spent in the fascinating life of dreams is much better than spending the entire life with harsh reality. Bali, the farmer, dreams of a day when the bankers are requesting him to take loan from heir banks, the money lenders are pleading to take money from them, the dalals are fighting to buy the yield from him, the government officer is treating him like a king and he along with his family is living a luxurious life. But, what he actually faced that day was something very different. Something that many like him have done before and are still doing. Bali, compromised his life to stay in the life of dreams for ever.

title: Gematria
synopsis:
The future is a bleak dystopia, ruled by multinational conglomerates and corporations. Having taken over governments, they have redefined the system. Using technology for themselves, they’ve left client-citizens to live in a mechanical world, under constant surveillance, manipulation and propaganda.
Mani Haruplex (Anatol Rieger) is a paranoid data analyst, one of the many client-citizens forced to live in this grey and monotonous world. Mani believes that since the roots of human civilization date back to Mesopotamia, its destruction will also signal the end. Using the ancient numerological calculation system of gematria and the epic of Gilgamesh as his source, Mani believes he’s unlocked the ultimate truth: The world ends on 04.04.2104.
Everyone is trying to make sense of this hopeless world, finding various methods of coping with reality, whether they be seeking solace in ancient texts or conspiracy theories. Mani’s neighbor, Cecilia (Dany Sigel) unravels his universe and reveals the ultimate truth: reality can’t be found in ancient “gibberish”, it’s hidden out in the open. Cecilia and Mani confront their theories and test their validity's: only to be shocked at the outcome. Could they be wrong? Is “the ultimate truth” hidden elsewhere?

title: Erotos
synopsis: One summer night, he is about to make out with her. But in the tiny stifling car, the phantasm changes itself smoothly into a disturbing dream.

title: Hard To Lose
synopsis:
Hard To Lose is a dark urban drama set in a contemporary, urban and emotionless London. Nero, a 28 year old Albanian is trapped in a job and a in a life that he detests. 
He is deeply alone, but everything might change when he meets Laura in a club.
Nero doesn’t know that Laura is not exactly the good girl he had in mind. She is a prostitute and if Nero wants to enjoy her company, he must pay. That's quite a big problem for a guy with no money.
Nero realises he has skills. He can fight. To get the money he needs, he takes part in illegal cage fights and he's pretty good at beating people up.
With his newly obtained fortune he can be with Laura and ignore the real cost. As time goes by they start an almost romance.
However, in their world there’s not much room for love and they need to struggle to keep a little hope alive for what they feel.

title: La tierra es pobre
synopsis:
The land is poor.
A short film about a village in Western Spain, close to the Portuguese border. 
How do the villagers react to the problems in rural spain? The population is ageing and within decades no one will  replace the farmers. Young people move to the cities or abroad. 
How do the villagers avoid that their village which has existed hundreds of years will disappear?

This film was shot in August 2014.  
In winter it is cold and the village seems empty, just the farmers and their families remain on their native grounds, altogether not more than 100 people. In summer sons, daughters, cousins and grandchildren return to celebrate San Lorenzo; a 5 days feast in commemoration of the village´s patron. It is then when cultural events take place.

A film which the endless beauty of the landscape and the vast power of its population.

title: Los Fracasados
synopsis: After seven years of living abroad Olivia returns to Ecuador when her parents take away all financial support. Her luggage does not arrive and it will take days to find because of their own mistake. Olivia goes to her parents' house but before ringing the bell sees her mom, and her determination disappears. She seeks refuge in the home of Yolanda, her best friend, but is told that she is not home. Not knowing where to go, and opposed to call her friend, Olivia meets Walter, who shares an apartment with Yolanda and finally the day seems to be on her side. Yolanda gets home and is surprised to see Olivia, who breaks down in her arms. They talk, Olivia avoids serious issues while Yolanda tries to know if she has seen their parents. Walter interrupts the conversation and Olivia asks them to go out. Yolanda warns her to be careful with her stuff, Olivia ignores her. At a bar, Olivia and Walter enjoy themselves while Yolanda sits around thinking about her early morning. They all decide to leave but Olivia remains behind. Outside Olivia sees neither Yolanda nor Walter and is suddenly attacked.

title: Ecce Homo
synopsis: In a godforsaken place young Ada and her ill mother live in solitude and destitution. They bear the heavy load of being bound together into a silent communion. Their quiet life slowly flows like a wordless ritual and hides under the seemingly still surface the cold tides of misery and apprehension of the inevitable. As the mother's health deteriorates things escalate into a spiritual crisis which unleashes the whirling forces of fear and despair. As the light within is about to perish the fabric of reality melts into an oneiric realm of apparitions. We witness a cathartic descent into the abyss, liberation from fear, a mystical sacrament and eventually- death…or perhaps – a miracle.

title: Killing My Girl
synopsis: Dawn. Rafa, a young South Asian woman, hangs the laundry in the yard of the house. In a voice-over she announces she is pregnant and that her husband and in-laws, with whom she is living, do not want the baby only because it is a girl. In the afternoon, her mother-in-law gives her two pills to take but Rafa reacts. After her husband reminds to her that they cannot afford to have a girl, she reluctantly takes the pills. Later, alone, looks through pictures of her family back home, contemplating. She pukes the pills in the bathroom and in the night she takes a photo of her mother with her and leaves. After walking endlessly in the streets of London she stops and calls her mother back home. Eventually, she returns to the house and takes another couple of pills. A series of shots depicts all her senses colliding to each other. Rafa looks straight into the camera while suddenly water pours down the roof in the middle of the house. Heavy rain follows.
