title: صابر على الغلب
synopsis: "MISERBLE SABER" or "Saber Ala Elgholp" short documentary produced in 2014, embodies the suffering of one Egyptian citizens who live on garbage heart of the Egyptian capital, depends Saber and his wife Fathea to dump garbage in the provision of a living and spend on their young children who play with him in the garbage, the film shows through footage naturally, if the man in the home and work and what are the difficulties faced daily .
film_awards:
My name is Saber Abdulwahab. 
I used to wander the streets selling goods using a three-wheeler, but it got stolen. I parked it somewhere, and I came back to find it was gone.

  not being able to sell my merchandise as I used to do before, I started to collect garbage, and it became my main source of income

. In the 56 years I have lived, I have suffered through them all.
 Even during the holidays, I could see people celebrating, while I had to collect garbage.

 I work all day. I go home at 11 pm, grab a bite, and then get some sleep.

 I wake up before dawn, collect garbage, rest for an hour, until sunrise, and then I resume working. 

I was never a fraud, or a thief. This is against everything I am. I am used to earning the money I get. 

There are many difficulties I face while working; having to collect broken glass, and the ugly smell I have to be around.

 Sometimes I get nasty cuts as I carry garbage bags which have broken glass inside.

 As for my son, Attef, he too gets those cuts. He once fell down and got his leg seriously injured from shattered glass he was once collecting.

 I never had a chance to send him to school. I can barely feed my children. It is bad, but it is what it is.

 He finds solace in the place we store the garbage in. It is very wide, and it gives him the chance to run wild and play, while I can still watch over him.

>>>>
 I had to completely shave my hair. Collecting garbage makes your hair absorb all the dirt one has to be around, and this is why I decided to shave it all.

 I got married 22 years ago. I have four daughters, and a son; Attef.

My name is Fateheya , I help my husband. He has no salary, no income, so I have to help him.

 Saber: When I first got married, I was selling vegetables, and when this did not pay well, I had to work in the field of garbage collecting. It is no government job, but it makes us survive.

 I collect all the plastic materials, cartons, and sell them.

 Fateheya: As hard as he works is as hard as I work. We both work for the sake of our children. We want to enroll them in schools. 
I have a daughter who is about to get married next Eid, and I still have not bought her any of the things she needs at her new home.

 Two other men had asked for her hand in marriage previously, but because we couldn't afford to buy her anything for a new life with a husband, they both abandoned her.

 But this time I decided to work hard and help her father so that we both can afford to get her married and get her everything she needs.

 Saber: so far, two of my daughters got married. I still have to help the other two get married too, and that is what I live for now. 

 Fatehya: We rarely eat at home as we are busy working all the time, but when we do, it does not have to be anything fancy. We buy some eggs of so. 

Saber: as for food, we usually buy something simple, nothing expensive; some beans, tomatoes, Falafel, and other foods of their likes. We might as well have chicken for dinner once a week; it depends on how much money we make. We have to be patient.

 Fateheya: some people might wonder why we decided to collect garbage for a living and say that it is bad for us, but I tell them that we will do anything to survive.

 Saber: we work from 5 am to 10 pm on a daily basis. If we take rest for one day, we don't get any money for it. 

Fateheya: I enrolled my kids in a nursery, but could not continue to pay 150 pounds on a monthly basis for it.

 And so I stopped sending them to it. I do what I can. I managed to get my two married daughters an education, and the daughter who is about to get married is educated too.

 Saber: We have to endure many hardships. We have to be patient for the sake of our children.

 Saber: turn off the lights. We only have an hour or less until we wake up for work again...
director_awards:
Biography abdelfattah 
Abdel-Fattah Farag journalist and documentary filmmaker, at the age of 29 years and a half. Graduate of the Faculty of media  Al-Azhar University in 2007, has won numerous training courses in the field of investigative journalism and the media, and directed 5 documentaries. Intense in humanitarian issues and community. And participated in more than a festival of documentary films in Egypt.

title: Зависть
synopsis: В двухместной больничной палате лежат два старика. Первый – у окна – ходячий. Второй лежит у дальней стены, он парализован. Тому, кто у окна, виден маленький мир. У второго старика тоже есть привилегия: у его койки расположена кнопка вызова дежурной медсестры. Старик у окна развлекает парализованного рассказами об уличной жизни. Последний мечтает оказаться на его месте. Однажды ходячему становится плохо. А второй старик на кнопку вызова не нажимает. Первый умирает…  Когда второго перемещают на место ушедшего соседа, его взгляду сразу же открывается вид за окном. Там – серая глухая бетонная стена, почти вплотную подходящая к окну.

title: The Ashes of Possibility
synopsis:
The Ashes of Possibility is a choreographic travelogue that explores two themes: identity and environment. The piece is an exploration of the philosophical understanding of the nature of the self. Shifting location inexorably informs one’s identity. The piece peers into the isolation of frequent changes of environment and how much our relationship with our surroundings affects our sense of self. The “other” to whom we would relate in our sense of identity plays a different role when separated by large physical distances. The piece is also a meditation on what it is to pine for another who is lost to us, and whose loss informs a new identity as much as the new places do. 
On of the  dances was made and shot in Seoul, South Korea, two others originated in New York and were filmed in various locations in the city. The project includes and includes footage from San Antonio, Texas, and from a visit to Seadrift, Texas. Finally, I have included moving imagery from trips to New Hampshire, Maine, and a boat ride in Columbia, Virginia.

title: Sentidos
synopsis: Zoe is lying on an old mattress remembering better times. There was a time when I had it all. But he lost it. Now he is starting to forget. In a world devoid of feelings he can't remember what he had. He knows it was not always positive but he longs for it. He has often thought about death but without really knowing why his survival instinct keeps him alive. He can not even tell if he's a lucky man or misfortune has struck him. At heart he still hopes to find a better world.

synopsis: Three youngsters traverse dark underground galleries. They have to find a way out.

title: WHERE SHE LIES
synopsis: WHERE SHE LIES is a Reflection about the Women / Artworks and its location, spatially and atemporal.  The apparent nearness corroborates the immortality that they hold, in contrast with our fragility and our fleeting step along the time.

title: El Duelo
synopsis:
Daisuke, a flawless and dogmatic samurai, is entrusted by his feudal master Yoshiaki to eliminate Takeshi, a samurai now turned ronin who broke the bushido code after killing Ioshiyuki, one of the master’s personal bodyguards. 
 	Just before Daisuke begins his search, he part ways with his wife. The Woman warns him that, whatever he does, he must do the right thing.
 	After passing through lush forests, Daisuke finds a dead bird stacked to the crust of a tree, with the blood still fresh. Daisuke knows that is a warning sign indicating him that Takeshi’s presence is nearby.
 	Daisuke arrives into an open field where he finally sees Takeshi’s figure in the undergrowth. Daisuke tries to approach Takeshi stealthily from behind, but he notices his presence. Takeshi confronts Daisuke about his blind obedience towards Yoshiaki and his lack of self will. Both of them seem to know each other for a long time. Daisuke tries without success to convince Takeshi about de gravity of his acts, but there’s no reconciliation possible. Takeshi provokes Daisuke into a sword fight and they both withdraw their katanas. Takeshi attacks Daisuke aggressively but he blocks and dodges his blows. Takeshi continues attacking until Daisuke makes a deep cut in his arm, wounding him considerably. Takeshi suppresses his pain and counterattacks with rage but Daisuke gives him the crushing blow when he penetrates into his chest with his katana. While Takeshi bleeds out in the undergrowth, he shares an anecdote regarding him and Daisuke when they were little and Takeshi used to beat him with the boken. Takeshi recognizes Daisuke’s superiority as a rival and dies. Daisuke kneels besides Takeshi’s body and starts withdrawing his dagger. He takes a deep breath and performs himself the hara-kiri. Both samurais lie over the undergrowth while the twilight hides behind the trees.

title: Nahuas y Saharauis
synopsis:
Nahuas and Saharawis. This encounter takes place when an indigenous Nahua family from the Sierra Norte of Puebla, in Mexico, welcomes into their home a Saharawi arab to share their customs and traditions.
During this time spent together, one can recognize there's not only cultural similarities but also similar struggles, feelings and efforts to preserve their mother tongue, their culture and their territory.

title: Fugitives
synopsis: Fugitives-(Synopsis). In twilight, someone is running through a forest. Sounds of attacking planes and helicopters. Distant sounds of gun shots. Voices of matured man and a woman talking each other. He moves towards them. They are talking about their kids that had forcefully taken away by some military group. About forcing them to leave their inherited lands. Sounds of an approaching helicopter. He runs again. He sees a dead body of a killed person. The dark of night spreads all over the place. Helicopter gradually approaches more closely. Few gun shots. He speeds in the darkness. Helicopter shoots him. Everything becomes silent. The soul of the dead person appears and says to the spectators that they were watched killing him. The words “Thrill of Killing” appears on the screen. Except the last scene, all scenes are depicted from the Fugitive’s eye view.

title: Smart Songdo Song
synopsis:
Built on privatized land, managed by a single company, finanzed by multinational investors: Cities are becoming a market-oriented product, traded like a commodity.
Nevertheless, individuals find smart ways to deal with those concrete real(i)ties.
In New Songdo City, one of South Korea´s Free Economic Zones, we reflect on this development along a settled hard rock melody.

title: Jarovoe
synopsis: Who is it Jarovoe? Why he has such a long beard and he is standing with a razor on his hand? He is just a man with a painful history or he has something terryble to hide? While he plays piano or he is eating alone , among the rooms of an aristocratic home, Jarovoe lives his life hunted by memories, tormented by an event that had marked his life for good.

title: Живые
synopsis: Лена узнает от доктора и друга семьи, что ее мама, известная в прошлом пианистка, роскошная женщина, смертельно больна и отказывается лечиться. Родной брат Лены Лёня поддерживает маму в ее категоричном решении. Перед Леной встает сложная задача : бороться за мамину жизнь зная, что спасение маловероятно, или попытаться сделать маму счастливой здесь и сейчас, не думая о страшном финале.

title: حلوان .. أنا
synopsis:
It’s about Helwan, one of the gratest and famous Egyptian cities . 
It’s about my relationship with the city, and about its changes and transforming and for people there too, as Helwan was a city for Bashas and high class people, but it’s now for sellers, microbus’ drivers, and local people .
My story about Helwan since childhood mix with my own story about my family, and my family’s prespective about the city .
For sure Helwan has a lot of stories inside, but that’s my story, my own story about Helwan .

title: Το καταφύγιο
synopsis:
Rural Greece 2014. Little Billy is the only son of a poor family. His father has been unemployed for a very long time. The kid is fully aware of the dire economic situation his family is in despite their efforts to hide their financial struggles from him. The family’s looming eviction is haunting him and he decides to take action.

Finding shelter is his big plan. But will little Billy succeed in securing temporary accommodation for his family?

title: Kukurer poti....
synopsis:
There is a dram outside a hostel of women,
where the women Students put their extra
meal. A dog comes and out beside the dram,
but it cannot eat this food. Tuli, one day a
member of hostel notices disappear of the dog,
in her mind growths sympathy to the dog. Tuli
puts her meal outside the dram so that the dog
can eat food. After some days she has collected
an old plate and she gives the extra food on this
plate regularly. Not only Tuli begins diet control
but also she has minded to eat the day. She is
getting more enjoyed by eating this dog, thus
build-up a relation between two.

title: Блажъ
synopsis:
Девушка Оксана раз за разом добивается внимания симпатичного ей  парня Михаила. Отец парня  беспробудно пьёт, что тому совершенно не нравится.  У Михаила есть  более  подходящая, как  ему кажется, подруга Света.  Одна за одной попытки добиться Михаила у Оксаны проваливаются, и она прибегает к крайней мере - шантажирует того собственным самоубийством. (Перед этим показываются постоянные намеки на суицид в виде  лирических отступлений.)
	Михаил не "покупается" на провокацию, оставаясь дома. Ночью ему снится сон, в котором он встречает  Оксану и видит её обмотанные бинтом руки.  Во сне он нежно снимает  бинты  и видит, что никаких ран на руках у неё нет. Она говорит, что на самом деле хотела повеситься на чулке, но тот порвался. 
	Михаил просыпается и вдруг обнаруживает, что на руках у него появились порезы словно от ран. Не зная, что со все этим делать, не неожиданно для всех уезжает в монастырь, чтобы в том числе найти там ответы,  никому не говоря насколько по времени.  Недалеко от монастыря  Михаил  достает из рюкзака  книгу, которую давал Оксане и находит в ней записку с почерком Оксаны. Надпись говорит  -   перед тем, как прийти к Богу, нужно кого-то полюбить. После этого он  замечает идущую вдалеке в лесу перед ним словно видение Оксану (в одном черном чулке).  Михаил ускоряет  шаг.  Он идёт за ней, она убегает, он бежит за ней по лесу, но не догоняет. Он падает на колени и теряет сознание.  Затем Оксана подходит к нему, склоняется над ним и гладит по голове. Она закасывает ему рукава  рубашки и становится видно, что порезов уже нет.    Михаил приходит в себя, но никого рядом с ним нет.

title: Ноль

title: il primo giorno dell'ultima vita
title_en: The first day of the last life
synopsis:
At the completion of his forty-six, on a warm summer morning , Gianluca is awakened by his young wife with a "Good morning , Daddy !"
At that moment the man means it is going to be a father.
Probably there is an age beyond which you should think a lot before conceiving a child , not to increase the already many problems in a world brutalized by too many compliance and vices that tear the growth and existence of characters as fragile young lives ; but the protagonist does not care .
Thus began the journey of memories that part of the talks with his old father , a farmer and exemplary man ; through the mother, who is still like a child ; for dispassionate advice of the teacher of poetry, too often guilty of responses from the courtly language ; to dwell on the time spent courting the woman he loved more, but who corrupted the ethics of feelings ammutolendo the breath of the heart.
We are still in the bedroom . Gianluca is awakened by his wife, that sentence was not related to him but to his father.

title: Con Lupe
synopsis:
Manuel (33) lives a very routine and somewhat lonely life, with much defined habits and customs. Before going to work, Manuel has breakfast in his usual bar where the waiter greets him with his breakfast ready. This morning, a young Lupita (29), draws Manuel’s attention while eating breakfast. Their eyes meet and they both smile. Manuel finishes breakfast and leaves the bar heading to work.  Manuel walks down the street, deep in thought.  Suddenly, Lupita starts walking beside him, both nervous yet relaxed, they begin talking.

 

On this lonely street they begin a relationship of great strength. They are deeply in love. However, when they are in public, they experience problems, especially people making fun of them.

 

Over time, their relationship basically leads to a private world, Lupita develops a kind of social phobia and she decides to end the relationship. Manuel is not willing to accept this and offers his help. Both undergo therapy in which Manuel, at the request of the physician, shares how they met. Manuel contains Lupita and insists that she is the one talking. When the doctor allows Lupita her turn to speak, we see that the seat next to Manuel is empty.

title: désaffection
synopsis:
Federal State. In the near future.
The company sees its members fully involved in productivity and economic performance of their country, thereby sacrificing the slightest shred of privacy and recreation for the benefit of the common interest.

In order to maintain their full devotion to extreme work, the masses were subjected to intensive brainwashing by the leaders ; pushing to develop amorous feelings - and more generally the emotions - as the first symptoms of an incurable disease and potentially fatal .

Within this well-oiled machine , Sarah , covered under the registration number Y1IN , is delegated by the Party to investigate the discovery of a suspected case of amorous behavior and quarantined . Accompanied by scientific experts, it will attempt to diagnose the evil Patient to determine whether it represents a threat to the maintenance of the economic policy of the state establishment .

This immersion in the heart of this system of manipulation will lead to the need to make a choice between a clear relationship found with the Patient and his duty to " protect the population ". Between life and death. Between love and duty.

Несмотря на внешне вполне обычную и временами, даже веселую жизнь Люси, ее чувства к первому мужу, Игорю не угасли. Игорь просит привезти сына на день рождения. Люся соглашается, втайне надеясь увидеть, что и Игорь по-прежнему любит ее. Однако, встретившись с ним, Люся наталкивается на почти полное равнодушие с его стороны. Более того, он вполне счастлив без нее с новой женой. Люся спешно забирает сына домой и там срывает свои невысказанные чувства на сыне.

title: Città di Luce
synopsis:
An important part of the festivities for San Ranieri in Pisa is the Luminara which takes place on the evening of June 16, the eve of the patron saint's feast day.
The architectural details of the palaces, churches, towers and bridges along the Arno river are recreated with wooden frames which are fitted onto the buildings and on these frames candles are attached and lit after sunset. Over 100,000 lumini [how candles are called in Italian when they are inside a container, glass in this case] burn and reflect on the river. The city along the Lungarno simply glows.

title: My Land: Values of a Modern Quebec
title_en: My Land: Values of a Modern Quebec
synopsis:
“My Land: Values of A Modern Quebec” is an exploration into the values of a pluralistic, contemporary society. This documentary follows an intense period of heated debate on reasonable accommodation that took place in Quebec in 2013.

The ruling party at the time, the Parti Québécois (PQ), created a bill called the Quebec Charter of Values, as a political move towards the party’s re-election with plans of a referendum. In the name of secularism, the Quebec Charter of Values would have included provisions banning government employees, including individuals who work in schools and daycares, from wearing any ostentatious religious clothing or symbols, such as kippas, veils, crosses, turbans, etc, as a means to further separate religion from the State. For many, this charter was interpreted as an oppressive and discriminatory act towards immigrants.

The Parti Québécois is a nationalistic party with dreams of independence from the rest of Canada. Over the years, however, the PQ’s political influence has waned. It hoped to rally its citizens once again around this divisive and controversial bill, but after pushing for an early election in 2014, they lost. Nevertheless, it stirred up a lot of strong emotions, particularly fear, which continue today.

director_awards:
Kuesti Fraun is an award-winning independent filmmaker and producer from Germany. His short film "BEN" was the winner of category "Best Smartphonemovie" at 2012 ́s Frontale International Film Festival in Wiener Neustadt, Austria, and was awarded Best Short at International Film-Contest „Meet & Street“ by the Artcommission of Kreuzlingen Switzerland. It went on to screen at over 50 film festivals around the world, receiving a Marler Videoartprize- and a AVIFF Art Film Festival nomination in Cannes. Fraun also received honors in scriptwriting being nominated for Samsung Smartfilm Award in 2014.
His special dedication to political and social themes find expression in his shortdocumentary "Trümmerfeld" and the mockumentary "Volkspark" both receiving People's Choice Awards and Juryprizes at annual Linke Kinonacht in Berlin 2012 and 2013.
As member and co-founder of the creative collective mobtik he participated worldwide in numerous exhibitions, film and video presentations (e.g. International Shortfilmfestival Berlin, Köln Comedy Festival, Bunter Hund München), at festivals, events and galleries based on all continents, on radio (Bavarian Radio, SWR and Germany Radio Culture) and television (including MDR, ARTE, Eins Festival, Channel5 Tobago)
Furthermore Fraun has also delved into the realm of live-action performances, being honored for his installation "Mal seh ́n wofür ich es noch brauch" as part of the exhibition "Jean Paul ein wenig anders" in the opening of Bayreuth`s Shortfilmfestival Kontrast in 2013, as well as in object art, receiving a prize award for the documentation of the building process of his sculpture "WWZD/ Quem chegou primeira?" by Goethe Institute of Salvador do Bahia Brazil in 2011.

title: Inside Me
synopsis:
This project is based on a 3D-scan technique, which allows me to reproduce an image of my own body as a 3D object in a software. It is possible to view this object not just from outside, but also from the inside as a negative as well, which creates abstract shapes. 
The colouration was generated with the help of colour data I took from a real picture.
The film reflects the invisible inner world of an individual, which owns a small universe in itself, created by experiences and feelings - as well in the digital world as in real life. We try to express ourselves and approach our world another being, but still, nobody can see in our souls entirely.
For me, the process of scanning is a very important part of this work itself. 
The idea of digitising a body and hence the creation and deformation of its computer generated self, reflects the digital world we live in today. We create an alternative world, in which everybody can be what they want to be. In some way, it resembles to an act of creation.
We never stop building more worlds for ourselves, even though there are already various ones encircling us, that we don't even understand yet. 
Each universe encloses another, which creates a new one, and the world next to us still seems far away. And so we look into infinity again, which inevitably surrounds us.
Concept & Animation by
Dmitry Zakharov

title: Lugares fronterizos (Hogar)
synopsis:
Border Locations (Home) encloses a personal reflection about the private space. The aim of the videographic images is to show the viewer certain fragments of reality, everyday scenes mainly captured within the home. These images are complemented by other more symbolic ones, filmed in an aseptic and improbable space, in which we feel the artifice. Images that rather than portray the private space, as do the first ones, talk about the feelings and emotions that often surprise us within those four walls.
Articulated in three chapters (the bathroom, the bedroom and the kitchen), its spaces become pretexts to investigate about deeper concepts. The relationship with nature, the individual and the social being becomes the true background of each of the three chapters.

title: Maestros at Play
synopsis: This film attempts to capture a little of the innocence and joy of youth, however fleeting this can appear to be. The camerawork and editing try to juxtapose distance to show that life is really a question of perspective. We start with via 4 boys from Salvador, Bahia (in the northeast of Brazil) having fun in a landscape, high up in the old city.  We move to São Paulo where the teen skateboarders seem to blend into their urban surroundings. Then, back in Bahia, older kids breakdancing and playing capoeira merge in an accelerated fashion as if preparing for the end of adolescence. The flautist, Julian Cawdrey, chose the Paganini piece as it captures the essence of playfulness but has an urgency, a reminder that this won't last forever.

title: Вячеслав Захаринский. В своих мечтах…
synopsis:
Фильм-портрет о белорусском художнике Вячеславе Захаринском, который, не смотря на выпавшие ему трудности и несчастья, сумел сохранить верность своей мечте и пройти по нелегкому пути своего призвания. Свою боль, страхи и накопленные переживания художник реализует в своих картинах. Он отражает в них свои детские потрясения, свои размышления на тему противостояния добра и зла, свои духовные поиски и душевные метания. 
Отчаяние и тяжелые переживания сменяются легкостью и радостными красками, когда для художника открывается новый мир после тяжелой болезни, заставившей его остановиться на бешеном скаку, на каком он шел по жизни. Мрачный цикл картин (грешники, крысы, фарисеи) сменяется другим циклом – жизнеутверждающим и оптимистичным (леди, святые). В конечном итоге, художник реализует свою давнюю мечту - работать не спеша, когда не подгоняют сроки и получаешь удовольствие от самого процесса творения.
Сколько бы людей не окружало художника, в душе он всегда остается один на один со своими тревогами, душевными переживаниями и муками. Признание и известность - все это обманчиво и недолговечно. Есть более высокие ценности – семья, доброта, благородство… Вот они и заслуживают внимания и того, чтобы к ним стремиться, а вовсе не погоня за призрачной целью стать известным и востребованным.
film_awards: Нет. Фильм нигде не показывался еще и не участвовал. Впервые на фестивале, это будет премьерный показ.
director_awards: Нет

Илья Алексеев - немного помог со звуком, Анжелика Жигалова - оказала помощь с машиной (перевозкой).

title: Die Schwulenheiler
synopsis:
The documentary "Gay healers" reveals that there are doctors in Germany that consider homosexuality a disorder and therefore want to treat gays to become heterosexual.

In a self-experiment, the gay reporter Christian Deker visited registered doctors that move in devout Christian circles. The doctors propose treatments that should change his sexual orientation from homosexual to heterosexual. Such treatments are not only ineffective but may even have a negative impact on the patient´s health, warn World Medical Association and German Medical Association. Nevertheless, these doctors try to settle such methods even with health insurances. After his doctor visits, the reporter receives bills of the physicians to be forwarded to the private health insurance. The doctors diagnose a "mental disorder" or a "life-changing disease". One doctor even recommends a homeopathic therapy in an interview.

The documentation shows that even in a liberal country like Germany some people still consider homosexuals as ill. In a demonstration in Stuttgart, people tell the reporter that they believe gays to be "disgusting", "sick" and "abnormal".

The documentary also addresses the discrimination of homosexuals in other areas of society. Until 1969, in the Federal Republic of Germany tens of thousands of gay men were sentenced to prison terms as their sexual orientation was criminalized as "obscene". The judgments are final until today. And even in 2014 gays are not allowed to donate bone marrow to help terminally ill people. Gays are statistically said to be more frequently infected with infectious diseases such as HIV compared to heterosexuals. For this reason all healthy gays are flat excluded.

The documentation is the result of intensive research by a team of authors. The gay reporter Christian Deker tells the stories in a very personal and natural way. He confronts people with reservations very calmly and vividly describes his experiences. The medical sessions are documented and recorded by hidden camera.

The documentary was a huge success on television and especially on the internet. The authors received not only from Germany an unusually large number of distraught and at the same time encouraging letters from viewers. The investigations were then subject in the German Bundestag and the German Medical Assembly. Numerous media have taken up the discussion.

title: Mototanaka Dérive
synopsis:
S.R.T. - Sadder but wiser. Reform. Take hold company.
This is a super 8 stop motion document of an aimless walk, in the manner of a situationist dérive, through one of Kyoto's former outcaste neighbourhoods, which continues to exist below normal Japanese living standards. Despite pro-active legislation, people from families associated with such areas can still experience discrimination. The soundtrack was created using an original apparatus called 'The Octopus'. Voltages from light sensors on the projection screen control an analogue modular synthesizer allowing the film itself to act as a visual score.

title: Horla
synopsis: Henri, an aristocrat living in an isolated mansion is restless, looking for what could be causing the strange phenomena that have surrounded him and his domain for his whole life. One evening, Jean, his butler, brings to him the old family doctor but Henri refused to be checked by him. The doctor insists when he sees a strange scar forming around Henri's hand, after which Henri immediately asks Jean to send him away. As Jean leads him out, Henri looks at his hand but the scar has disappeared. Meanwhile in the main hall, the doctor gives some medicine to Jean to administer to Henri. Later that night, Henri is drawn in his dreams to the door of the park leading to the stables. As he sees it closer the door opens by itself and a dark shadow comes out of it. He wakes up suddenly and heads out to check on that door. On his way out the same shadow creeps up behind him but he does not notice it. Later, as he opens the door he half expects to see what was in his dream but instead finds the butler, himself out to inspect some noise coming from the stables. He takes Henri back home and administers him the medicine the doctor gave him. On the next day, Henri tells Jean he was able to slept. After lunch he starts shaving himself but is interrupted when he sees a daunting reflection of himself in the mirror and decides to go inspect the stables this time. There he finds Colette, the head maid. As he speaks to her he hears Jean and the doctor entering the stables and he is taken aback when he realises they can’t see him. He turns back to the maid to ask her what is going on but her attitude speaks more than words. He is caught inside a nightmare and sees the three of them dying progressively and finds it impossible to move himself. Henri wakes up from this nightmare in his own dining room to the presence of the very doctor and butler. He can barely believe what he is seeing, even more so when he sees the scars on their faces are the same than the one he has on his own hands.

synopsis: Born in the XVI century in Portugal, the Three King's Day's tradition came to Brazil at the time of colonial era. title: 풍장
synopsis:
One worn out old man seeks to keep a promise to his deceased wife that he would return her to her hometown and let her fly away into the wind.  On the way to the destination, the old man meets a North Korean immigrant who works as a Taxi driver.
Despite their different backgrounds, they ultimately come to a deeper understanding of each other.

title: al-Ándalus, la conquista
synopsis:
The Muslim arrival to the exceptional Spanish region of Andalusia  now becomes a beautiful story that mix history and wildlife, that brings us at present which was the beginning of the influence of Islam culture in this European nation.

The beauty and uniqueness of this Spanish location is resolved in the film in a very original form.

The history of the conquerors confronts the natural reality of one of the most biodiversity areas on the planet, something that undoubtedly encouraged newcomers to maintain their dominance for more than 800 years in this rich peninsula of Western Europe. This influence would transform forever culture, science and lifestyle of its inhabitants.

Produced by Horizon & Nature films, "Al Andalus, The Conquest"  is a beautiful and unique story in order to know the early years of Muslim influence in Spain.

At the same time, this is the first documentary short film about history and nature made in Spain, which deals with the original story of the conquest by using the latest technological advances in image and sound.

title: День жалоби
synopsis: Самые трагические дни Украинской революции. Эмигрантка, которая давно живет в Праге, потрясена событиями на Родине как и миллионы украинцев. Почтив память погибших, она возвращается в свою одинокую квартиру. Но в этот раз ее уже ждут неожиданные ночные гости.

title: Si tuvieran ojos
synopsis: Marta works as a flight attendant and lives with his boyfriend at a small apartment. On day she wakes up, has breakfast and says goodbye to him as he leaves the house to work before she heads to the airport. She then showers, gets dress and put on some make up in the bathroom. When she is ready to go she realizes she can’t open the door and she is trapped inside until some one comes to rescue her.

title: Camera Iperbarica
synopsis: Anobot is a gay Nazi robot coming from the future in order to wipe out its own creator. Josef Condor is the Soviet mercenary committed to protect the life of the homosexual androids’ future creator. He is the future leader of the Soviet empire, free of any prejudice against homosexuals. Iutavaca Putamaria Sol, An Indian woman coming from a mysterious past, after a magic and unexpected pregnancy, gives birth to the little man searched by the robot and the mercenary. Born premature, the baby awaits inside a hyperbaric chamber to see the light, whilst outside, the world fights for him.

synopsis:
Zeynep tries to keep up her home situated in a shanty. But secular hanks relations imprison her and her home in the same vicious circle.
However breaking the routine is required to move to talk the courage to face with the facts to  return on the halfway to turn another ways…
Is it possible to cure the broken hearts by mistakes which are done and thought? Being faithful to the time, waiting can be cure?
We try to learn that on the one hand major social events happen, on the other hand the evolution of the individual, personal lives by opening out the tulle at the window of a small family.

title: The Silent Chaos
synopsis:
North Kivu, Democratic Republic Of Congo. After a bloody civil war that lasted for years, Congolese society has lost its identity. However, archaic superstitions and magical beliefs are the only elements left which still bring the population together.
These forces guide the defense of the territory led by Mai-Mai rebels, but they also make people consider those who are different as a threat, just like what happens to the deaf in Butembo. This is the story of those who have no voice and no hope, but who keep struggling for their own dignity, not willing to resign to unhappiness.

title: The Bloody Illusion
synopsis:
A man, rusty by the his daily work, gets pity with the help of alcohol forgetting about his family and responsibilities. His wife, with broken illusions, knows that her children won't have a future with their fathers regular condition. 
Hours of darkness come by and this women decides to change her future for ever, she escapes with her children from their farm to the golden city. Her husband awakes drunk from bed as usual and searching for a drink he smells the absence of family, he will run as fast as he can with the bloody illusion to win them back forever. 
Filmed as an experimental film duo to the odd coincided that the director found out that the script he wrote was part of a real story of an old couple that lived isolated in the suburbs of Santa Fé, Argentina. They both insisted in acting after reading the script even though they have never acted in there lifes. There acting method will be remembering those hard days, struggling with their relationship and alcohol, by actually living them on film to metaphorize a message of forgiveness, love, hope. To live their life for the art of film-making...

title: 58/18 Прим
synopsis:
Наслаждаться настоящим можно, если есть предсказуемое будущее. Но будущее невозможно, если ты не помнишь своего прошлого. Мы – потомки – не имеем права забывать наших предков. Предков, прошедших жестокие войны, ставших героями 20-го века. Но есть и такие, которые стали жертвами несправедливости себялюбцев и жестокости злодеев.
Эта работа посвящена всем, кто стал жертвами 58-й Статьи, именуемой в то время «Враг народа». У этой чудовищной статьи 18 примечаний. И, если в них вникнуть, то можно было репрессировать любого гражданина Советского Союза. Мы должны помнить, чтобы избежать повторения. «Они» говорят: не теребите раны, «мы» убеждены: чтобы лучше помнить, пусть они болят.

synopsis: "Their road paved by genocides, mass executions and enslavement, the rise of the Islamic State of Iraq and Syria left countless families of the Yezidi minority in Kurdistan scattered. title: The Heat Wave
synopsis:
Ingo is German, Cecilia is Spanish. They live in Luxembourg and are totally in love. It's summertime and a heat wave is baking the heart of Europe. Cecilia's father is coming to visit for the first time and Ingo wants to impress him by preparing an authentic Spanish paella. When Cecilia is picking up her father, Ingo is left out of his home because of an unfortunate current of air, with the paella on the fire and dressed only in an Andalusian apron. He will have to solve how to get back home without anyone noticing his nude situation, knowing that his girlfriend is just about to get home with a father-in-law he really needs to impress.
Based on a true story.

title: Mi peor enemiga
synopsis:
Lara is a teen harassed by her roommate, she insist in to torment Lara life whit insults and comments about the Lara size, making that Lara feeling fat and bad forcing her making severed Diets that will transform in anorexia, until to think in to suicide.

The food will change the Lara sanity. Only Manu, a class friend, will help her to go away of this hell.

Would can the love overcome the disease?

On 11 march 2004 , just 3 days before Spain was to hold presidential elections, ten explosions shook Madrid in the early morning.
It was the biggest and worst terror islamist attack in the Europea history. 
That day Muslims and Christians prayed together for the souls of those killed in the attack ...
As people were heading to work and school, the blasts ripped apart 4 commuter trains and killed 191 innocent people. Thousands more were wounded. The victims were from all walks of life.
The director shows in a experimental documentary short (filmed with mobile phone, 80%) as the attacks could have been executed.

title: A Boy's Prayer
synopsis:
Dicky is a super sportsfan who daydreams about being a sports superstar, when in reality he’s only a teenage loser. His peers mock him for being a “sports Phd” because he only talks about sports instead of actually playing them. At home, he faces the endless fights between his poet father and insurance saleswoman mother. One night, Dicky was sent to take out the garbage. Dicky dumped the garbage into the garbage truck as the melody of  The Maiden’s Prayer* was playing in the air. He was then called back by one of the cleaners because he did not do the recycles properly. Dicky felt like he saw the angel of his life when the female cleaner took off her gauze mask, and his life was about to change…. 

*In Taiwan, garbage trucks play The Maiden’s Prayer to let residents know its presence.

title: Munich
synopsis:
Two young guys want to go to work to Germany. They live in a little village and they're willing to start a new life far away from there. They're  travelling on an old sidecar motorcycle, a three seat vehicle that envelops them in a love triangle. The morning they leave, one of them discovers that not all of the things they wish for are abroad and that Munich can be a person.

Munich talks about the difficulty to start a life from zero and forget everything we leave behind.

title: Noite Sem Nome
synopsis: Drug dealers take over the city of Rio de Janeiro. Two friends see a girl alone on the street and decide to take her home.

title: My Sweet Nurse
synopsis: The fable mixes magical realism and horror showing the daily life of a nurse and her only patient, in an old and hidden hospital in a remote time. Years go by fast, while the two characters remain as if they were frozen in hanged minutes fighting an invisible duel.

title: Al final de la noche
synopsis:
How many things can happen during one night?
For the first time Louis and Sarah are having dinner in their new apartment. They might think their happiness is complete. Nevertheless, Louis leaves the house to find something that is lacking him. At the end of the night he might be able to find it.

title: Weekend With Cristine
synopsis: A retelling from the old advertisements on TV and the soap-operas from the 60's. A anguishing weekend to a man closed in Cristine's apartment. The whole story is narrated through the eyes of this tied man, while he is observing Cristine. Between both there is a game, where the girl's heart reveals slowly something dark and mysterious.

title: Sacristán
synopsis: Pepe is the sacristan of the Cathedral of Murcia. Pepita a parishioner who has been working with the cathedral the last 40 years. Every day both of them keep routine organizing the Masses but sometimes things get complicated.

title: Verdad & Consecuencia
synopsis: Two persons are forced to tell the truth… a “truth” that all we already know.

title: El corral
synopsis:
Rafa is 28 years old and lives with her parents in a small town in the province. 
His days pass between the heavy task and a social life flatten and reduced to wander around the town’s square in his van again and again. However, the siege of that thick weave of relationships begins to stifle him when their desires go beyond the narrow limits of the town.

title: SOFIA
synopsis: Every night, Sofia falls asleep hoping to find the one she loves.
other_credits: Sound: Damien Guillaume

title: Moul Lkelb
synopsis: Youssef lives as a secluded outcast. His sole friend is his dog, Chagadai. One evening at the beach, the dog disappears. In order to find him back, Youssef must engage in a dangerous quest through Casablanca’s slums.

title: Operación preferente
synopsis:
Four masked men kidnap the director of a bank branch in an unremarkable town.  They put him in a van and ask him 90,000 euro from his own pocket.
Trying to dodge the bullet, the director tells them that he does not have the money but the aggressive masked men know that he does. Even more, they do know where it is, at this place. The van is heading to his home.  Halfway the van breaks down and, overwhelmed by the circumstances, they take their masks off. You can see for the first time the faces of these frightening captors who fight to recover the money they were defrauded.

title: Остановка
synopsis: At the bus stop in Moscow people expect a public transport. They don't know that a few minutes later their lives will be changed. Mysterious car is in the way...

title: Рождение любви
synopsis: Spring morning two girlfriends Katya and Olga coming by car in a deep forest. They are not interested in the mushrooms or berries. Young women are going to hide the traces of the crimes committed by Katya. In the forest the fate prepared for Katya and Olga serious test ...

title: Hola
synopsis: Through his computer Hilo finds a lover. Decomposes on the fissures of the machine to go to meet him.

title: Tejo Mar
synopsis: Joao sees his time in Rio comes near to the end, and in his last week at this side of the ocean, he feels the pressure of his portuguese girlfriend at the same time as he rediscovers the city he is in. And facing his nostalgic look into the city, he meets Marina, a brazilian girl that messes with his feelings of goodbye.

title: The Fight
synopsis:
Beneath the frenzy of cockfighting in the Philippines is the curious relationship between the Filipino
man, and his treasured idol whom he sends to battle

title: Carne
synopsis: From what we're made. Carne tells the history of a butcher's son from an early age has contact with the slaughterhouse, which makes his vision of the world and of human relationships to change to something instinctive and automatic.

title: Sibarisia
synopsis: A delicate blending of visual sensations with the finest chocolate covered howls accompanied with bites of brownish perfume. A full bodied film that will delight the palate of the best gourmet.

title: INSTALIFE
synopsis:
A new trend in the internet is fire challenging: people burning themselves with petrol filmed by a camera and load it up to the internet - just to get some Likes. The videos an pictures are available on prominent lifestyle-platforms.

INSTALIFE is an experimental-documentary-film based on photos, which were either directly taken from a social media platform or recreated by actors according to the original photos. It brings the photos in a new rhythmic order and combines them with a voice-over reading the original hashtags found on this platform. 

INSTALIFE is about a permanent pressure for digital self-expression, which can lead to death.

title: DÖDSRYTTARENS DRÖM
synopsis: Leif Lilja built his own motordrome and toured with it as motorcycle artist Berne Kenton in the 60s and early 70s. Back then a motorcycle show was a natural part of the markets right next to the fakir and the snake charmers. When he after a last season sold it, he almost immediately regretted it. Now, 40 years later, he finally got it back through a chance of luck and is determined to revive it!

title: MALIGNO
synopsis:
On the streets of Bogota there is a catwalk of strange human beings who hide dark and macabre stories. The city has turned them into monsters, wandering creatures, unnoticed bystanders who you are better not looking in the eyes.  
A helpless blind stops to piss in the street , from behind a visibly unbalanced man approaches and hits the blind man with a rock on the head.
Months before, we see the same man, who attacked the blind man, leading a happy life with his girlfriend in a flat in Bogota’s city centre. 
While walking down the street the couple is approached by a blind man who purposely bumps into the woman and casts a spell on her.  The blind man starts stalking them disguising under different identities. With every encounter he wraps the couple within his dark knowledge. The couple starts to deteriorate due to the evil power that has fallen upon them because of the mysterious man. 
One night, the girlfriend disappears without a trace. The boyfriend desperately looks for her and looses his mind when he fails to find her. Several months later he finds her, now a completely different woman. In his effort to get her back, the boyfriend will try to cut off the root of the evil that separated them.

title: A vida de Jair
synopsis: A film documentary that describes the life of the artist Jair Mendes while he paints the pictute "the bull'

title: Strayed
synopsis: Tracy flees from a country house party into the wilderness of the Scottish Highlands. Defeated by the land, she is discovered by a passing runner. Reluctantly accepting his help, she soon doubts the honesty of his intentions.

title: As He Lay Falling
synopsis: Forced to migrate for work, Georgios has travelled to Scotland from Greece. Unable to find pay, he has drifted north, settling on a peninsula at the edge of the remote Scottish Highlands. A ghost in a foreign land, Georgios digs peat for food and board on Bronte’s rundown croft – his unwelcome presence hanging darkly over her partner William, an English incomer. Trapped within a forced intimacy, lost from a life he left behind, Georgios discovers the stark difference between his disappearance and dissolution.

title: Grizzly
synopsis:
GRIZZLY - It is here, it has come!
In the forest surrounding the village of Meminiecz lurks a terror older than memory. A terror that has started to drain the town of that very thing that makes a town a town in the first place, if you know what I mean. I mean, the terror is starting to eat the Meminisczians. It's totally fucked up.

title: とかげ
synopsis: During summer vacation, Shota encounters a strange woman Nazuna. Feeling for her loss, Shota tries to help her...

title: 寿
synopsis: Sayo (30), a single girl works and lives in Tokyo, visits her parents for her birthday one weekend. She suspects that her parents' relationship is shaky. Not being able to become comfortable in her own home, Sayo visits her ex-boyfriend in the same town and spends the night, while, at home, her parents confront each other...

title: Futuro Breve
synopsis: A man buys a second hand camera and finds out that it reveals the future, for 5 seconds, when plugged on the TV. His wife arrives at home and he decides to show her the discovery, afraid of what could be revealed.

title: IF YOU LOVE YOUR CHILDREN
synopsis: Raj Camarta has it all, a great job, a beautiful wife, a comfortable home, but he is haunted by the loss of innocent people in a natural disaster fueled by climate change. He begins a crusade to educate the world and in so doing destroys his marriage, loses his home and his livelihood. Raj finds his commitment to be stronger than his desires and ultimately rises above his losses to realize his dream.

title: Ruprecht
synopsis: Dr. Ruprecht Rummel recently retired from a career as an Urologist at UCLA, Los Angeles. Looking forward to a nice & peaceful retirement, he gets terrorized by leaf blowers in his adopted town of LA. Although leaf blowers are illegal in LA, the city does not enforce the law and regulations. Therefore, Ruprecht Rummel takes the law in his own hands and finds even love in the most unexpected places.

title: Cuatro días de octubre
synopsis: Hugo (Francesc Garrido) is a psychologist whose life is too influenced by his shyness. As a psychologist, Hugo directs and listens to his patients considerations. However, this therapist-patient role is just a cover to hide his true self. In her session of the day, Esther (Olalla Moreno) tells Hugo she decided to stop the therapy and then she stands up and goes away without any explanation. Hugo needs to find answers because he feels that something is going on.

title: Dejejum
synopsis: To J. the best time of day is when he takes his breakfast but today it was interrupted unexpectedly and consequences no one can predict it.

title: L'escapade
synopsis: While on a getaway with his girlfriend, a young man sees a stray dog walking by the forest and will then give in to some dark childhood memories of his, throughout this beautiful day.

title: After
synopsis: Sometimes, when the night comes and sleep creeps upon you, you start remembering your day. Did you finish what you had to do? How do you feel about it?

title: La queue
synopsis: In a crowded supermarket , a young man quietly awaits his checkout. To have missed a young woman with a single item, it incurred the wrath of the other guests. A sequence of behaviors and incongruous situations will therefore quickly transform the everyday situation in hell of modern life ...

title: Virgile dort, 6 esquisses pour un film
title_en: Virgile sleeps, 6 sketches for a film
synopsis:
Virgile Novarina conducts, for more than 20 years, a survey on sleeping. His research lead him to produce some "night writings and drawings" during micro-awaking, to sleep in a Bremen laboratory in order to researchers to analyze his sleep different forms, and also to produce an image of the sleep in public places all around the world: the one from Virgile sleeping.

The week of 21st to 26th January 2013, from 9 am to 6 pm, he slept during the day, in the Inlassable Gallery window, 18 Dauphine street in Paris. For each of these days, Jean Seban proposes a film as a vision of this performance.

title: Adela
synopsis:
Adela is a young Romanian living in a slum in a parisian suburb.
Each day, Adela builds her children's future.
film_awards: Young jury Award, Belleville en vues, France, 2013

title: OSCAR DESAFINADO
synopsis:
Oscar and Violeta are a young couple that (as all regular couples do) find themselves immersed in an argument after spending the morning shopping at the mall.

“Who do you think is gonna die first?”.

Half-joking, half-serious, Violeta ends the conversation stating that if she dies first, Oscar would have to wait two years before he starts dating other women. That said, if he breaks that rule, she will return from the grave to have revenge.

Shortly after… Violeta dies.

One year, 364 days, 23 hours and 17 minutes later, Óscar invites Ana to his place. They are in love, but nothing has happened between them yet.

Oscar takes very seriously Violeta´s pledge. He wants to wait until midnight when the deadline is over. Ana isn´t in the mood to wait since she thinks Oscar´s fears are silly and childish.

But Ana didn´t know Violeta…

title: Красна Маланка
synopsis: Krasna Malanka is a story about people from Romanian village Krasna on the territory of Ukraine, which are getting prepared for the Malanka  holiday. This holiday is a landmark event for everybody in Krasna, especially for young men, for them it’s the main initiation in life. Malanka is a carnival, a queer pagan show where everyone has his own part.

title: Child Brides
synopsis:
More than 40% of marriages in Yemen's poorest areas are celebrated with girls younger than 15. Subjected to sexual violence, many die as a result of internal bleeding, childbirth, or attempt suicide. 

"It's destiny. People marry young girls all the time", says the father of Jamila, who was sold into marriage aged 12 to resolve a debt issue. In one of the world's most conservative countries, a strict interpretation of Islam dictates people's lives. Poverty, mass unemployment, a culture of glorifying the beauty of young girls, lack of a legal framework, and increasingly, marriage tourism from the Gulf, makes the work of human rights advocates difficult. In Al-Qaeda's last stronghold, child brides are a political issue. Abdelmalik al-Taji, a professor of Islamic Law, argues that it's not a question of compassion nor a matter of protection for the girls, instead fixed minimum age for marriage "has been proposed by the UN who wish to impose their laws on the whole world". According to him, when a body of a girl reaches maturity it is ready for marriage, even at the age of 10. Meanwhile, a doctor relates a case of a 14 year old who was rushed to the hospital on her wedding night. A case of severe bleeding caused by a tear in her vagina led to her death. Aisha, who describes her wedding night as the biggest shock of her life, drank rat poison to escape her abusive husband: "I wanted to free myself from it all".

title: MAFIA
synopsis:
Ángel is well known by everyone. His shady business deals, his luxurious life
and his connections with power back him up. Today won’t be his day. His

title: Tharattu Pattu
synopsis:
Tharattu Pattu (Lullaby) is a short fictional narrative set against the backdrop of Smarthavicharam - a custom practiced in the Namboothiri community until the early decades of 20th century Kerala. 

Smarthavicharam was the ritualistic trial of Namboothiri (an upper Hindu caste of Kerala) women who were accused of adultery. A Smarthan (Judge) along with the king's representatives would conduct a trial to decide if the woman is guilty. Smarthavicharam therefore means the Smarthan's trial. If found guilty, the woman is ostracized from the community. A ritual is performed that is similar to the one when there is a death in the family. This symbolizes, from the perspective of the family and the community, that the guilty exists no more.

The last documented Smarthavicharam reportedly took place in 1918.

SPOILER ALERT - Please do not disclose pre-viewing. This narrative is an alternative, dark interpretation of a lullaby. Instead of the imagery of a mother putting her child to sleep, here we have a son severing the relationship with his mother - a woman excommunicated through Smarthavicharam. The woman has been 'put to sleep' and is effectively dead to him.

THE NARRATIVE. The narrative unfolds in two sequences. The first roughly set in the 1940's and the second (the flashback) about 30 years earlier. The first sequence is borrowed from a Malayalam poem whose title and author is unknown. It describes the protagonist on a bicycle riding by on a village road when he chances upon his excommunicated mother. In the poem, both mother and son recognize each other. In this narrative however, only the son recognizes his mother while she is unaware of him passing by. He throws her a money pouch as if giving alms to a beggar and rides away. 

The connecting flashback sequence was added on for this narrative. This sequence is the protagonist recalling the Smarthan's trial. While showing all the stages in a Smarthavicharam trial is beyond the scope of a minute and half sequence, it shows the woman put in an 'Anchampura' (a special isolated room, removed from rest of the house). The Smarthan reads out the verdict from a palm leaf manuscript. The ritual that is performed when there is a death in the family is conducted and the woman walks to the exit gate. The protagonist as a very young boy watches the proceedings. 

The two sequences joined together is interpreted here as a lullaby.

title: Penha, uma festa carioca
synopsis: New ways of living and new forms of entertainment have caused the gradual disappearance of the neighborhood festivals of the old days. A sense of longing (or a somewhat melancholic nostalgia) makes us seek the lost pleasures of the past. “Penha, uma festa carioca” is a look back at what was once the second largest popular festival in Rio de Janeiro, losing out only to the Carnaval. Among the myths and stories surrounding the event, which occurred over a period of almost 400 years, we consider the Catholic faith, the African martial-arts-styled dance called capoeira, the festive Portuguese immigrants, and the birth of Brazilian Popular Music.

title: Not Anymore: A Story of Revolution
title_en: Not Anymore: A Story of Revolution
synopsis:
A short film about the Syrian struggle for freedom as experienced by a 32 year old rebel commander, Mowya, and a 24 year old female journalist, Nour, in Aleppo, Syria. The film clearly and concisely tells why Syrians are fighting for their freedom, told through the emotional words of two powerful characters whose lives have been torn apart by war.
Nour is a schoolteacher-turned-journalist who faces death on the front lines to tell the world about the war. The film’s title is derived from the opening line of the film, when Nour says, “I used to wear fancy dresses and high heels. Not anymore.” Now she wears body armor and a helmet. She is fearless, but lives with the pain of friends who have been tortured, raped, and murdered by the Assad regime. She tells not only her story, but theirs, and in so doing she shows the audience what life is like for a Syrian girl who is spending her 20s in war as everything she loves is destroyed.
Mowya is a young rebel commander who bears the scars, physical and psychological, of seven months of torture. But this hasn’t broken his spirit. With incredible wit he tells his story. With disbelief and sadness he walks the streets of ancient Aleppo, telling of how life used to be in a thriving, vibrant city whose heart, as Mowya says, has stopped. With a great deal of charisma he clearly articulates why the Syrian people are fighting for their freedom.

title: Vostok
synopsis: o	Early 60s. The Vostok programme was a Soviet human spaceflight project to put the first Soviet citizens into low Earth orbit. Irina, the astronaut, from a capsule communicates with Nikolai, the radar officer of the monitoring center. The flight is fully automatic and the control panel of the capsule is locked, so contact with Earth is limited to simple ceremonial checks of the vital signs of the cosmonaut. title: Naleena
synopsis:
n indian culture transgenders, called Hijras, belong to the so-called "third sex", neither man nor woman.
Hijras have an ancient history dating back to the seventh century before Christ.
As an offering to the Goddess Kali, they undergo the ritual emasculation, carried out in secret because illegal, and without anesthesia, by the Thaaiamma, that could be considered a kind of sacred midwife.
Through this surgery Hijras renounce a specific gender, as the male organ is cut off and in its place is not made no reconstruction of the female organ, as is normal in modern surgery.
This is the reason why they are called "non-gender specific", "third sex" or "shemales".
Traditionally considered sacred beings because daughters and priestesses of Kali Matha, in reality the Hijras live like outcasts, even at a lower level to the caste of Pariah, and to survive the majority of them is forced to beg and prostitute.

title: Henri
synopsis: Dorian, Yassine and Sofiène, three suburban young men, are chilling, as most of the time, in the district of Les Halles in Paris. To kill time, Yassine tells the others about a murder having taken place just a step from here, in the Ferronnerie street. The murder would have been particularly dirty: the victim would be a good father, stabbed repeatedly, leaving behind him woman and children. Sofiène, who didn’t hear about it, does not believe it. Dorian and Yassine decide to take him to the crime scene.

title: Er op uit! ( deel 1 )
synopsis:
A day out! ( part 1 )
Two men on a bicycle, they are leaving us, it is starting point for a tour of a day, a couple of days, a week or a month. We are not sure, but  we do know that they are leaving us and that the world they travel through is a bit different then the real world. 
 It stays unknown who these men are and where they are from or where they are going and the world they travel through stays a unknown territory. It will probably be a journey they did not thought  they would experience when they decided to leave us…………..
And there is the pre-historic drone trying to find them, but we do not know who is trying to find them or who is missing them and there are windmills, who have there one unknown role in this story….
( This is the first part of a  triptych ).

title: Dinosaurs and Sea Hawks
synopsis: Inspired by creating performance gifts for his schizophrenic mother 'Dinosaurs and Sea Hawks' is another story in Ezra Dickinson's ongoing performance work. The dinosaur mask is intended as a reminder of child hood and quite literally a mask to hide from the harsh really of the world through Ezra's mothers eyes. Sleeping under a bridge is a man and his dinosaur mask. Waking up he walks in to the heart of the city and puts on his mask. A friend a stranger a kindred soul emerges and the mask is passed off and traded. The man watches then walks away with a Sea Hawks hat.

Обсуждая "собачью" проблему, люди забывают о простом условии взаимоотношений с нашими друзьями меньшими:  что в детстве вложишь, то и вырастит. В фильме снялись два трудолюбивых, дрессированных, добрых пса. На улице стоял мороз  -15. Замерзала камера, приходилось повторять трюки, но друзей согревало доброе слово и вкусняшка!...  
В двух словах:
Однажды, друзья  Малыш-Йорк и Гигант- Черныш  сталкиваются со  странным существом, чем-то похожим на тигра. Оно появилось внезапно, скорее всего свалилось с неба... В начале друзья испугались, но вскоре поняли, что с небесным пришельцем можно дружить и пригласили его к себе домой.

title: TRIBE
synopsis:
TRIBE 
Dream Nation is young organic street fashion brand showcasing organic fabrics , urban shapes and bold patterns. It' s part of a new fashion industry taking responsibility for our customer choices and committed to sustainability.
To create prints for their latest collection Tribe they collaborated with emerging polish artist Robert Kuta. Patterns are inspired by Ndebele art and Mayan culture .
The movie Tribe directed by Jan Macierewicz with Kamil Płocki images focuses on 4 major brand and collection concepts : dreams , multiculturalism, tribe and gesture . All visual effects were made on set with no post production. To achieve this amazing, intriguing result  movie was taken on the camera Red Scarlet combined with old 8mm tales displayed in the background and different filters and lenses. Music for this image composed Bogumił Misala.Concept art for the whole campaign created Sara Milczarek.

title: For Red (Everlasting)
synopsis:
For Red (Everlasting) is a Jungian retelling of the story of Red Riding Hood that explores Red’s passage to woman hood. Sent into the woods to care for her grandma she discovers she is not alone, a Wolf lurks between the trees. To free herself from her fate she must renounce saviour and find strength from within, for she is not the first to be consumed by the Wolf. 

With a minimal budget, For Red (Everlasting) looks to challenge the passivity of women within fairy tales and expose a deeper message within the tale. For Red (Everlasting) aims to reclaims the story from a lost perspective.

title: Pioggia Dentro
synopsis:
Martha is 55 years old and she has spent the half of her life working in a small town shirt factory. Because of the crisis in the sector she is fired and, not having specific skills, she can not find a new job, even though she try. An only child and without a companion, she lives with his father, an oldman stubborn and irascible, and she is the only one to look after him, trying to support both with her father’s pension. The situation worsened when the father dies, catapulting Martha in a state of despair.
Inspired by a recent news story, Pioggia Dentro try to reflect on the dramatic transfiguration that the jobs crisis is working on the society, portrayed here in its dark essentials. To create places and characters are the same shadows that they generate.

How far will Tristan go to make his love's last dream come true? Her hearts desire ?

title: Короткое лето
synopsis: Главный герой картины «Короткое лето» – мальчик, проводящий лето неподалеку от больницы. Он беззаботно проводит отпущенное ему время, играя со своей собакой и исследуя окрестности. Ветер, свобода, пение птиц и солнце – что еще нужно для счастья ребенку? Но вот он случайно заглядывает в больничное окно и видит там прекрасную незнакомку. Юной пациентке совсем не до веселья, она лежит под капельницей. Им достаточно встретиться взглядами, чтобы почувствовать симпатию друг к другу. Однако как же коротко будет это лето…

title: Подарок
synopsis:
Каждый год в свой день Рождения, молодой человек спрашивает у своего отца, что тот подарит ему на 18-тилетие. И каждый раз отец отвечает ему: "Давай доживем до 18-ти, а потом поговорим". В 17 лет герой увлекается спиртным и становится токсикоманом. Из-за этого в семье наступает разлад: папа не может с ним справится, подрастающая сестра превращается в домохозяйку, в то время, как ей очень хочется погулять по клубам с подружками и т.д. Из-за такого образа жизни парень попадает в больницу с неизлечимой болезнью сердца. Для отца на этом жизнь останавливается.
Спустя год, в свое 18-тилетие выздоровевший герой возвращается домой. Там его встречает только сестра. Войдя в комнату, парень находит письмо с текстом: "Здравствуй, сынок. Ты все спрашивал, что я подарю тебе на 18 лет... я подарил тебе... свое сердце. С днем Рождения, сынок".
other_credits: Сергей Шимко, Дмитрий Давидович, Гражина Быкова, Наталья Холодович, Евгения Задора, Ксения Корольчук, Татьяна Боровик.

The people of this generation run away from their lives, nurturing coldness, distance and irony inside of them.

title: As I Am
synopsis:
Synopsis – As I Am

Successful and well-known businessman Babe Ginindza dies in his sleep. This is a deeply painful loss for his eldest son Mlungisi; after all, Babe Ginindza was his rock, the only person who accepted him unconditionally. As a 30-something year old sexually ambiguous man living in a peri-rural area, it’s not easy for people to understand why Mlungisi hasn’t moved out of home and why he does not have a wife and children. Amidst the hustle and bustle of all the funeral arrangements, Ndumiso, Babe Ginindza’s second and lastborn son, arrives with his pregnant wife and their child. Arrogant, unknowingly insensitive and chauvinistic Ndumiso quickly hijacks the funeral arrangements and delegates all the tasks to different family members as he sees fit. Mlungisi is offended by the fact that Ndumiso is undermining his authority as the eldest yet he does not have the audacity to speak up and reclaim his status. 
As the week of the funeral progresses, the siblings’ resentment for each other reaches its pinnacle. The two brothers go to a livestock farm with their elderly uncles. Again, Ndumiso undermines Mlungisi by choosing the bull that will be slaughtered for the funeral.  A confrontation ensues because Mlungisi has gained more courage and realizes that he has the potential to stand up to his younger brother. The next day, Thabo, Mlungisi’s friend, arrives and confesses his love for Mlungisi. When Mlungisi rejects Thabo’s advances, Thabo asks him to label himself according to his sexual preference. Mlungisi refuses and leaves Thabo heartbroken. Mlungisi might not be confident about a lot of things but one thing he knows for sure is that does not have to explain his sexuality to anyone, not even a gay man.

                                                                                                                                      

The bull arrives and all the men congregate in the area where it will be slaughtered. From a distance, Mlungisi watches as Ndumiso barks orders at the other men. Goaded by his younger brother’s hyperbolic displays of masculinity; he finally decides to reclaim his place as the eldest once and for all. Mlungisi stops Ndumiso as he is about to strike the bull, the two brothers exchange insults amidst the scandalized crowd. To spite his older brother in the worst way, Ndumiso tries to kill the bull. Fuming, Mlungisi starts a fistfight and the feuding brothers wrestle in the soil like Neanderthals. Although Mlungisi would have preferred to talk things through in a more civilized manner, he has no choice but to abide by the rules of the arena in which he finds himself. Surprisingly Mlungisi overpowers Ndumiso. Eventually the fighting stops and Mlungisi tries to talk some sense into Ndumiso... brother to brother. Ndumiso coldheartedly rejects Mlungisi. Humiliated for the last time, Mlungisi reclaims his power by killing the bull. He is triumphant; finally he has earned his place as the eldest.

title: José

title: Little Talks
synopsis: Galya, a Bulgarian girl, has recently reached her boyfriend, Petyo, who's been living in Milan for about two years. They share a small apartment on the outskirts of the city. Galya's life is divided between the job searching and the everyday tasks. An unplanned pregnancy, but accepted by both, complicates their grind. The house needs renovation and there are debts to be repaid. Although they are in love and confident about building a new life together. But one day, Galya is called to replace a friend for a translation job. That day, her life will change forever.

title: Auflösung
synopsis: Simons new job: Surveying the audio recordings of conferences which are held in a convention center. At first that job seems very exciting. He witnesses lots of conferences which he follows enthusiastically. The only problem: There are always disagreements among the speakers. Nothing seems to be clearly right or wrong. Simon fails to just shrug off the statements. In a most unhealthy way he is fascinated by the disagreements. As the conferences challenge even the most irrevocable of facts, and the most certain of things get questioned, he begins to lose the ground beneath his feet.

title: Arenal
synopsis: A young woman returns to her hometown, a humble resort. She has to take care of something that she has been avoiding for a while. Walking the streets of her childhood and a particular meeting helps her to perform a ritual that will close a period of her life.

title: Journée d'Appel

Chris wants to go straight back home, but Momo, the hood’s "loser", convinces him to spend the day with him at the Château de Versailles.

Two people living in a state of bored love, a married couple in short, invite an unknown couple to their house. First it's time for coffee, then let's see. In the end the boredom is gone - but at times it’s better not knowing everything about your partner

title: ДОЧЬ ЛУНЫ
synopsis: Фильм основан на башкирской легенде о девушке, оставшейся рано без матери. Отец привел в дом мачеху,которая не давала ей покоя, всячески унижая ее. Мачеха заставляла ее делать непосильную работу. В один прекрасный день она послала ее по воду. Всю ночь девушка таскала воду. Изможденная и обессиленная свалилась она на землю. Взглянув на небо увидела она Луну и со слезами на глазах молилась о том, чтобы Луна ее забрала к себе. И тогда Луна протянула свои лучи и подняла ее к себе.

Alarm bells are struck, the news spread quickly. The townspeople gather to discuss the situation. Is it already too late? As Phillipe finally reaches town in the early evening hours, he finds it already destroit.

title: Auf Wiedersehen
synopsis:
A German family of three is having a summer vacation at Sunny Beach, Bulgaria. 

A place where it's easy to get lost amidst the alcohol,  young girls, and loud parties. 

This is where Elena, 18, wants to be. 

But her mother, Sara, 50, is worried - her husband has gone missing and is nowhere to be found. 

The police tell her that they must wait at least 24 hours before they issue a searching warrant. 

In the following 24 hours, Sara and Elena are going places they didn't think they would go before - or, at least, go together. 

The lost relationship between mother & daughter has been miraculously recovered after a night of dancing, drinking and a bit of psychedelia. 

But the father is still nowhere to be found...

title: Cuspe
synopsis: Based on the shortnovel by the amazon writer Benjamin Sanches, the shortfilm tells about a couple in an unusual way. After a stressed daywork, a man arrives in his house and receives a strange welcome: a spit. After this the story carries a series of questions, doubts and strangeness.

title: Daheim und Dazwischen
synopsis:
Max has been studying in Frankfurt for some time when a family event brings him back
home to Vienna's outskirts. A short meeting with old freinds turns into an all-nighter,
just like in the old days: drinking beer in the skate park, secretly breaking into the
outdoor pool with young women, hanging out at the bus stop – a night between
youthful memories and „hardcore grown-up stuff“.

title: Blut REIS TRÄNEN
synopsis: Tim is 38 and works  as a taxi driver, which gives him enough flexibility to take care of his father who suffers from Alzheimer. Lee, a Chinese student, is 25 and Tim's boyfriend - although he wants more than occasional sex in Tim's taxi. The problem is that the father takes all the attention he can get. So Lee urges Tim to take a decision: it's him or his father, either a relationship or family.

But this Saturday, it takes a little longer. Their son wants to finish watching a TV show. And so it happens that the separated couple starts to talk again – via the intercom. Suddenly the former intimacy is back, the conversation almost turns into a flirt...

title: BERLIN TROIKA

Young diplomat Konrad Gelb is recruited to step in and interpret between the two conflicting superpower leaders, who seem to hold the fate of humanity in their hands - an absurd responsibility, which by extension rests on the shoulders of the young interpreter. He must balance the oversized egos in the room and maneuver the world's destiny to either peaceful resolution or total annihilation.
