synopsis: The dance floor is a battlefield.
film_awards: 19.09.2014   * 3rd EVERYBODY’S PERFECT – INTERNATIONAL LGBTIQ FILM BIENNALE FESTIVAL (Official Selection, Geneva, Switzerland)

title: Ocupação Hotel Cambridge
synopsis: In the central zone of Sao Paulo, Brasil, a group called The Homeless Worker's Movement occupy a building where families can build a future away from the streets. Responsability, hard work and organization ensure everyone earns their keep.

title: Dystopia
synopsis:
In modern capitalism, workers are no longer called slaves. They are no longer deprived nor exploited. They are just bred, without any power to survive outside the system.
  This movie is a cry to warn ourselves from being chained by poverty, lashed by capitalism and becoming a slave.

title: Exposure
synopsis: Following a sexy photo shoot, she goes to her darkroom to develop the pictures, soon to find out she’s not alone.

title: home in mind
synopsis:
Tami, a newcomer to the online 3D world of Second Life, approaches owners of virtual
Second-Life homes in an attempt to re-discover her own lost home. Blending Second-
Life and real-life footage, Tami explores the experience of home in the virtual era, and
the ability to capture it on film
film_awards: 10.10.2013 * NORDIC ANTHROPOLOGICAL FILM ASSOCIATION – NAFA FESTIVAL (Bilbao, Spain)

title: Life Patented
synopsis: The wonder of human life, birth and procreation has a very different value in a world ruled by corporations. A journey from egg-cell to human life with a surprising end.

title: Zu Risiken und Nebenwirkungen
synopsis: The ambitious scientist MARTIN RAUH feels pretty close to find a cure for Malaria. But the subsidies get canceled and his last chance is his former lover CORNELIA SCHILLING, who is now in charge of the budget at one of the world leading pharmaceutical companies. Schilling makes Rauh an offer he can't refuse, but the price he'd need to pay would be the biggest moral sacrifice ever.

title: 푸어파이터
synopsis:
“Sun Mi” is a jobless youth who doesn’t have anything to offer to the world – not in educational background, nor in looks, nor in skills or qualifications – and even whose weight is close to 100kg. 
While she has always had the label “worthless human being” tagging her along in her life, Sun Mi does have one thing that she does at least at well as others: “eating.”
To make her mark in the world as a Food Fighter, Sun Mi sets out in search of “Ma Gudo,” the first Korean second place winner of “The World Chicken Wing Fastest Eating Competition” that took place 30 years ago...

title: Jetzt Jetzt Jetzt
synopsis: Late summer in Berlin. The city is pulsating and Fabian, Bene, and Richard are wandering aimlessly through the urban jungle. Against Fabian's quiet protest, the friends ridicule outsider Jakob. The aggression escalates when one night the boys make their way into Jakob's room, and bully Borschwitz sets Jakob's mother's car on fire. Fabian can no longer repress his affection for Jakob and confronts his friends - perhaps too late.
film_awards: 14.10.2013   * 29th WARSAW INTERNATIONAL FILM FESTIVAL (Int’l Competition, Poland)

title: Moritz
synopsis: MORITZ loves the nature and is full of discovery: he likes to play in the garden and toss the stones into the water. But what if his favorite toy is suddenly broken? Will MORITZ find a way?

title: e-Social
synopsis: The story takes place in 2035. In this world, the e-A&Ω Corporation can create holograms that are identical to dead people based on their social networks. Anna recently lost her husband, so she decides to create his hologram.

title: Auguste & Louis
synopsis: Auguste and Louis are fishing, but the fish will have to wait...

title: MiMO
synopsis: MiMO is a 2D traditional animation created with black ink and color pastels. Inspired by Joan Miro paintings of lines and colors, MiMO is an abstract piece that explores the art of motion.

title: Autogenic
synopsis: From the void of space, a cube structure comes to life.

title: Separation
synopsis: A hiker lost in the woods discovers truth all around him in the moment between Summer and Fall.

title: TORN
synopsis: Two lives, two worlds: a man and a child. A kid who wants to be friends with the neighbouring children. A man who has a date with a woman on a roof. The world of adults and the world of children. They are related but they are torn.
film_awards: 23.05.2014   * 45th QUINZAINE DES RÉALISATEURS/DIRECTOR’S FORTNIGHT CANNES (Official Selection, France)

title: The Animals
synopsis: Influenced by the German Expressionist movement of the early 1900s and films by Lotte Reiniger. Adapted from the life of Joseph Merrick, the historically famed Elephant Man who walked the streets of Victorian England, exhibiting himself in freak shows, abused and despised by society for his horrific appearance. Merrick is at his wit’s end when things take a serendipitous turn.

title: Route 52
synopsis: What happens when the journey of a whacky teen crosses paths with a tired hotdog tender ending his shift? Catch the crazy encounter of the unlikely pair and brace for the unexpected!

title: MAQUINAS
synopsis: Carlos and Alfredo are officemates. In a break from work, Alfredo leads Carlos to a basement in the building to play a game of pool. Carlos tries to take this moment to reveal a problem he is having with some strange phone calls.

title: Cholo
synopsis: The dark-skinned 11-year-old Cholo meets his fair-skinned brother Abdullah for the first time, when their father Said arrives in Zanzibar from Muscat. Although, strikingly different, the two boys enjoy a crackling chemistry.
film_awards:

title: OMESSA
synopsis: Anna never leaves her backpack and do not come-back often in France. Discovering a lump in her breast, she goes to a gynecologist who tells her that it is worrying. For Anna, it’s the moment to return in Corsica, to face her history, her inherit, her father.
film_awards: PUBLIC AWARD - Festival des nuits meditérrannéénes

title: Волны
synopsis: Одинокий учитель пытается понять, что ему делать, когда мир вокруг становится всё более агрессивным.

An adaptation of an Indonesian legend, inspired by the style of the Southeast Asian shadow puppet play “Wayang Kulit.

title: Roadtrip
synopsis:
Julius can't sleep. To get his head empty he decides to go on a roadtrip, but somehow
he can't manage to leave.
A hand drawn film about failure, insomnia, a red motorbike, pretty bargirls, the
desolateness of Berlin (even in summer) and waterproof socks.
film_awards: 17.11.2014 * 22nd OZU FILM FESTIVAL (Ozu Animation Section, Italy)

title: Salomeas Nose
synopsis: Salomea remembers the day her beloved brothers, Max and Karl, disfigured her and themselves for life. The Day of Tragedy, is what their mother called it, and blamed it on the fate of her children. Though fate and tragedy have a different meaning by the end of her tale. A tragicomedy about sibling rivalry, disfigurement and the pain that binds us.
film_awards: 24.07.2014   * 34th SAN FRANCISCO JEWISH FILM FESTIVAL (Official Selection, USA)

title: Des millions de larmes
synopsis: A meeting in an empty roadside café-restaurant. A man in his sixties is waiting. A young woman enters, she seems tired, weighed down with her backpack, and her whole life inside it. He offers to take her a part of the way. She accepts.
other_credits: cast : Natalie Beder, André Wilms, Myriam Tekaia

title: Caballito de Mar
synopsis: With the rhythm of Colombian Caribbean music we dive into a special sea: fishes made of pencils, chains and tools; bubbles made of bolts and marbles, and a seahorse  who leads us between dreams to discover the sea and its mysteries, and fight against fears with the company of his marine friends

title: OMUL
synopsis: He is a silent man. He walks the streets, watching, looking for the right place. He finds it. In the middle of a market. He sets up a stand. But instead of selling his goods, the silent man gives them away for free. The other sellers watch. They feel provoked. The situation escalates. They lose control. But in the end... there is hope.

title: Camusi Camusi
synopsis:
Camusi Camusi is a micro episodes series for preschoolers (two to five years) in wich around the excuse of a game we combine two themes: Latin American musical instruments and phonological awareness games. It is conceived as an entertainment series with cultural content and stimulation for the skills development of the viewing public.
Camusi Camusi is a winner project in one of the Colombia Ministerio de Cultura fund program (short format tv shows for preschoolers). With the fund resources we already produced 18 episodes. We are finding resources in the form of co-production and / or pre sell to complete a 50 episodes season.

title: Bubble
synopsis: A chance encounter of a girl and a cat in a small Southeast Asian village.

This is a recollective animated film exploring what it was like to be a kid in 90’s Singapore. The film follows two unreliable but keen observers - a boy and a girl - as they deal with their outcast primary school lives.

title: Desolado
synopsis:
What if the Sun did not exist? Or if the clouds could completely cover it?
Tito imagines a world where sunflowers do not have to look at the sky,
where the Moon works overtime to make him smile... The question is: why?

title: Umbrella
synopsis: A playful animated film that revolves around an umbrella superstition. A bubbly girl made a discovery and decided to go against her granny to save their world from drought!

title: Conciencia, "Segunda Oportunidad"
synopsis: Richard Ferro is a man without scruples that has dedicated most of his life to contract killing. But in the last one something strange happens and he has to change the way he behaves. As a result, he does not distinguish now between reality and fiction.

title: DHAANAM
synopsis: This film based on awareness of donate
other_credits: SHEEBA RANI

title: GOCHOS
synopsis: The world is turned on its head

title: Pflegestufe
synopsis: Ruth cares for her mother Hilde who is suffering from dementia. Both women are broke because the care devours every last cent. Only the approval of the ´level of care 2‘ can still save the two women. But when the case manager from the medical advisory service comes by to evaluate Hilde’s health condition, suddenly the old lady seems not to be sick anymore. Rather Hilde presents herself as a charming, entertaining person with good memory. The new Level of Care is in danger, Ruth is more and more under pressure until she loses her self-control…and with that she degrades not only her mother but rather herself.

title: Si
synopsis:
Si, the sound of a "Si".
A novel short journey of Louis. A 8 years old kid living by himself in a squat. 
Louis is scared of the darkness. Through the night we discovered his fears, his dreams, his loneliness.

title: not funny
synopsis: Homophobia is not funny, everything else is!

title: ‘FLIPSIDE’
synopsis: This film employs a succession of moving images from similar and dissimilar locations. The resulting project seeks to extract from these locations images of confinement, life, disorder, order, the bleak and the stifling, and then unify the moving imagery through the utilisation of scale, movement and direction.

title: Scuffle
synopsis: A playful kidnapping told through dance.

title: De los contratos
synopsis: Two girls try to carry out the preparation for a party whilst they wait for the result of a grant's request. The task is brought to a halt by an accursed temporality that, minute by minute and frame after frame, hinders its completion.

title: The Song
synopsis: A film about the song that is sung by a professional singer at one’s funeral in Korean. It is intended to interpret a nation’s cultural heritage, Sangyeo-Sori, as a universal language, and to dig into the margins of reality for the song in present day Korea that is barely practiced.
other_credits: Sounds: Sang Jin Byun

synopsis: Один день из жизни белорусских музыкантов в провинции и столице.

title: Plug and Play
synopsis:
Anthropoid creatures with plugs in place of heads are up to mischief. Instead of abandoning oneself to the dictates of the raised finger, they soon submit to themselves. But the fingers also finger around. Is it love? 
PLUG & PLAY is entirely finger-drawn using an integrated touchpad of a laptop.

title: Bavakan
synopsis: Beneath the surface of Armenian society lies an untraditional reality, one where a woman’s right to choose ends in a quest to present a male heir to the family. Bavakan explores this issue through the stories of four women and the pressures they have faced to have gender selection abortions.

title: FLEXIBILITY
synopsis:
Flexibility, the prelude of an exhausting world...

Europe, near future. The workers of a stickpin factory gather urgently to avoid the impending plant closing. The differences between the workers and the top management are not the expected ones.

title: Fötter
synopsis: After an accident Elmer gets a new pair of feet, but when he leaves the hospital he realizes that the feet has a mind of their own.
other_credits: Cast: Jens Olsson and Maria Barlöv

title: Nach einem Traum
synopsis: Filmmaker LUZIE has a strange dream that makes her wake up with the feeling of having found a great story. She begins to produce a short film based on 2 images from that dream - and in doing so she investigates the nature of her dream.  (fiction / narrative experimental)

synopsis: The starship Tantalus drifts through space.

title: Однажды наша жизнь изменилась
synopsis: Фильм сделан детьми для взрослых. Обитатели лагеря беженцев из Украины (размещённого на территории детского оздоровительного лагеря «Пионер», Ростовская область, Россия) рассказывают, почему им пришлось покинуть свой дом. 3-5 июля 2014 г.
other_credits: Дети, обитатели лагеря временного размещения беженцев из Луганской области Украины.

title: Un instante en el paraíso
synopsis: Carlos, a school teacher who has lived all his life with his mother Soledad, facing a very difficult situation. Soledadpadece a great depression due to a degenerative disease. Carlos decides to end this suffering, after it agreed last days with his mother, although she does not know that his son also depart. The situation is complicated when his brother Victor decides to visit.

title: The Aethernauts
synopsis: The Aethernauts”. “Aether”, a classical element in ancient and medieval science, a material that fills the universe above the terrestrial sphere and where gods and heavenly bodies reside, and “naut”, from the Ancient Greek “nautes” meaning “sailor” or “navigator”, as in astronaut or cosmonaut. The film is set in a dystopic environment, seemingly in the future and where “The Aethernauts” live and travel. These bizarre, yet knowingly characters, perhaps only travel in their imagination, their inner world, and they could be seen as a metaphor of the non-conformist, the day dreamer, the excluded and exiled, the Artist itself eventually.

title: 少男的祈禱
synopsis:
Dicky is a super sportsfan who daydreams about being a sports superstar, when in reality he’s only a teenage loser. His peers mock him for being a “Dr. sports” because he only talks about sports instead of actually playing them. At home, he faces the endless fights between his poet father and insurance saleswoman mother. One night, Dicky was sent to take out the garbage. Dicky dumped the garbage into the garbage truck as the melody of  “A Maiden’s Prayer”* was playing in the air. He was then called back by one of the cleaners because he did not do the recycles properly. Dicky felt like he saw the angel of his life when the female cleaner took off her gauze mask, and his life was about to change…. 

*In Taiwan, garbage trucks play The Maiden’s Prayer to let residents know its presence.

title: Per vendetta
synopsis:
This short-movie is an humble act of love toward the backgrounds of the thriller-movies by italian way which reached world-famous by the director Dario Argento. On this subject it's a great pride for me the collaboration with Maestro and composer Marco Werba for the original soundtrack of the short. Same composer in 2009 performed the original soundtrack of "Giallo" directed by Dario Argento.
Subject of the story is represented by the slogan of the short "Don't ask yourself what you'd do for love, ask yourself what you'd do for vengeance". Since the feeling of "vengeance" is carried away to the extreme same is therefore able to transform human soul far away until human beings are able to do unimaginable things not even by themself.

title: Mack Blaster - Die Welt im Fadenkreuz
title_en: Mack Blaster - The World in the Crosshairs
synopsis:
Sometime in a distant, apocalyptic future the brutal, inhuman bounty hunter Mack Blaster stumps through the bleak desert.
On a stonewall he discovers the “wanted poster” of the worst women slaughterer of all time: Ringo “The Butcher” Mack Man. Hunting down Ringo is a matter of honor for Mack Blaster.
His way leads him to the down-and-out capital city. A place where death and violence rule. 
After Mack Blaster slaughtered the biker gang Dead Falcons in the whorehouse “La Perla”, he meets Ringo‘s main whore Bianca who also falls victim to Mack Blasters misanthropic lunacy.
At last Mack Blaster catches Ringo Mack Man in the backyard of the whorehouse, but things change for the worse. After an extensive sawed off shotgun treatment Ringo turns out to be a bloodthirsty mutant, who by high-frequency screams suddenly calls for dozens of creepy, bizarre henchmen for help.
All of them only want one thing: The head of the Blaster, but Mack Blaster stands his ground with an arsenal of fire-spitting, death-bringing weapons.

title: Antes do Inverno
synopsis:
Documentary about traditional fishing of mullet and their fisher men, in a small city Bombinhas, in the south coast of Brazil.
The film depict the world of the fishermen an their old and culture activity, that went through generations in more than a century and survive with passion to this days.

title: La Verifica Notturna
synopsis:
It's night time and all is perfectly normal at Claudio's place. Another ordinary day - the umpteenth - has ended a short while ago and Claudio, an independent and mature man, is resting satisfied...satisfied about himself and his lifestyle, comfortable but not luxurious, built honestly with years of hard and passionate work.
Claudio is drifting off to a serene sleep absolutely certain that, as usual, a new day no different than the previous one is about to start. He has no reason to foresee a different course of events.
Suddenly though, an inexplicable visit by the neighbour and a series of alarming phone calls interrupt his rest announcing an imminent, unexpected and apparently incomprehensible event: a surprise house inspection conducted by an unknown police squad; a thorough inspection which threatens to bring serious consequences (violent abuse of power? an arrest?) and for which the unaware Claudio is totally unprepared, incapable of identifying the entity and the nature of the danger he's about to face...

title: Deshidratación
synopsis: Adriana dreams, her dreams overflows. She tries to sooth it, the pills always work. The water doesn’t stop, there are no more pills. She needs them, she’s going out despite the rain. Open the door and the past makes itself present. She tries to run away but it overflows, everything overflows.

title: Fishing Train
synopsis:
Two mercenaries go into a train-boat on the sea.
A giant fish appears in front of them. The man inside the cabin turned his rudder as the girl on the top of the train throws her hook on the fish. The man jumps out the cabin on the cable and run on it as a funambul. Then he jumps on the fish and he gives him a punch that kills it.

title: Sussurro
synopsis: Life is made of wishes and fears. A woman keeps the daily routine of her little daughter, Ingrid in an attempt to hide an aching void. At the same time, in between the household chores, she takes cares of a collection of cloth bags, religiously stored in the pantry. Together, mother and daughter roam in a journey in which, from small gestures, stories and whispers, they find strenght in the power of believing.

title: zostanie tylko pragnienie
title_en: All that will Remain is Longing
synopsis: In her apartment Room in the Warsaw suburbs Kinga opens her heart out to the camera when she starts talking about "Him". Various material things resonate around her as reminiscence of "Him". The Olfactory the Visual the Tactile the Auditory the Language and the Thinking have ceased to exist however through the five senses she delves into her memories.

title: VERSUS
synopsis:
VERSUS is a short film that depicts the diversity between life and death. An allegory you might say of things that may come to pass and others that may come to stay...
Tragedy or miracle , the opposite sides of life
director_awards: Accolade Award of Excellence for the feature documentary "the Journey" in the Accolade International Film Competition 2013 (US)

title: Greek Gods in Walthamstow
synopsis: Performed by children, the film is a meditation, from a Westerner's perspective, on global issues such as the longing for change, the need to redefine concepts such as 'happiness' or 'freedom' and the importance of focusing on the common struggles that affect us all, rather than on our differences.
other_credits: Executive Producer - Tariq Nasir

title: На пути к цели
title_en: On the way to the goal
synopsis: Фильм о влиянии программы вхождения в топ-100 на студентов НГУ.

title: "NO DESPIERTES"
synopsis: There are many rumors about the dangers of waking up a sleepwalker, so, whatever happens...¡Don´t wake up!

title: Pastorale
synopsis: In an unknown country, armed militia have imposed a reign of terror. Amra and Shije, two women who have never met, find themselves linked as they flee with their children through the backcountry.

title: Plein Soleil
synopsis: Under the leaden sky of a summer day, Eric is driving to his workplace to present an important project. But the stress makes him forget what matters the most…

title: L'accusato
synopsis: A man accused of pedophilia is confronted with his lawyer telling his version of what happened, but the lawyer has doubts and raises them to his client that a particular reaction.

title: Principiantes
synopsis: A teenage couple make a plan to lose their virginity; they buy champagne and spread rose petals over the bed. Nevertheless, all these elements will turned out to be a distraction of the real target: Be together.

title: EVA
synopsis: Eve on the garden.

title: Réflex
synopsis: A reflection on the image.

title: Salto al vacío
synopsis: A man jumps to the void.

title: El Hombre Sol
synopsis: In a surreal journey a man leaves the city going through inhospitable landscapes, meanwhile a mysterious girl-bird is awaits for him.

title: NADA S.A.
synopsis:
Dark comedy, surrealism and social criticism are mixed in NOTHING Co., a story that aims to show how much time we spend in this life working in jobs that don't fulfill us. NOTHING CO. is a tale, almost a caricature, about something very common in our society; many of us spend three quarters of our existence in jobs that we hate, but we cannot get out of them basically because of economic issues. Although time is money, money still wins. In this surrealist shoerfilm we will see how our protagonist is a victim of this system. 

Carlos has been years unemployed, he is desperate after failing every job interview he presents for. One day Carlos sees an ad for a company called NOTHING Co., they are looking for a candidate who wants to get paid for nothing. Carlos gets the job, but that day will change his life.

title: Палец
synopsis: Заводской токарь Кирилл, придя на работу  с жуткого похмелья, ищет способ опохмелиться. Предприятие не увенчавшееся успехом заканчивается тем, что Кирилл использует несчастный случай на производстве в свою пользу.
director_awards: дебютная работа

title: The Girl
synopsis: The Girl lives in an isolated mansion in the woods in the mountains of India, with a woman, the 'Mad Lady.' This woman is her caretaker and watches her all the time.  Their odd life is disrupted when the Mad Lady can see something she was previously oblivious to. Oblique, eerie and mysterious, 'The Girl' is about the violence and horror of childhood.

title: 黙殺
synopsis: Osaka. In a small, typical apartment live Keiko and Takashi, a young couple who are very much in love. Keiko is a teacher and Takashi works at home, as a housekeeper. The stability between the two ruptures when Takashi starts, out of the blue, to not speak anymore...

title: Sinestesia
synopsis: Video art that reducing an entire affair into a universal display of affection with a beginning and end.

title: Luciérnagas
synopsis: Documentary / Experimental made ​​from a real experience of hospital stay. Recorded with the only elements that were about at the time: mobile phone and objects from the hospital.

title: Legrado
synopsis: There are some places where they don't want to hear stories.

title: Anagnórisis
synopsis: A mother should never tell his daughter some news.

title: A história da noiva fantasma
synopsis: A woman remembers the waiting on her wedding day and what that caused her.

title: (Des)Encontros
synopsis:
Lara and Gael are perfect for each other. But they still haven’t met. How could destiny have put them so close to each other, so many times, and it hasn’t worked yet? I mean, it hadn’t. Because this time, something different happened. How many (mis)matches until you find the true love?
This is a love story about how our soul mate can be closer than we think, in the same city, same neighborhood or even by your side.

title: الزائر
synopsis: "The visitor" is a thriller/ horror film about the lengths a mother will go to  to bring up her son and protect him from the inquisitiveness of strangers when an unexpected visitor pays a visit at an inconvenient time.

title: Камыш
synopsis: This must be a strange occupation for an adult.

title: Peor que ayer, mejor que mañana
title_en: Worse than yesterday, better than tomorrow
synopsis: The crisis of the capitalist system is here. It seems like it is reinventing itself everyday. In Spain you can see more and more of its effects: the real estate bubble bursts, bankruptcy, unemployment, loss of rights. Different stories and opinions of inhabitant from different parts of Spain are mixed into a dialogue about the crisis. Peor que ayer, mejor que mañana. Worse than yesterday, better than tomorrow. A contemporary document about the Spanish people.

title: Villebråd
synopsis: Two hunters come to the forest to check on the feeding machine they use to lure the animals out of the forest. But they get a big surprise.
other_credits: Cast: Jens Olsson and Tom Shinke

title: Fridge
genre: Teen Movie; Art; Comedy; Melodrama; Silent Movie; Romantic; Video Art;
synopsis:
El ciclo de una relación de pareja visto desde el interior de un frigorífico.; Short synopsys:
The cycle of a relationship seen from the inside of a fridge

title: SCOR ALB
synopsis: As a football match paralyses Bucharest, an anxious business woman, Dana, boards young Alex's cab. Once in front of her building, despite their obvious differences, Dana asks Alex to stay with her for the night. At any price.

title: Vitraj
synopsis:
The movie ''Vitraj'' by Toni Koscina is analysing the endless theme of domestic violence. In spite of the media campaigns, the problem persists. 
From fear of getting hurt, we look the other way and pretend not to pry. 
We forget civility even when we are witness to brutal acts of violence in our nearest circle of friends or next door neighbours, because it is easier to ignore the problem then to confront it.

By changing the characters, scenes, bright colours, light, shadow, the author achieves an poetic effect of inexplicable fascination in a way like observing stained glass. 
The allure which we can not resist, and we can not change by acting alone. 
In a way we are part of the world, that we want but we can not, or we are afraid to leave. 
The movie follows the life of a young woman is subjected to violence on daily basses, losing herself between the fantasy and reality, 
seeking for help in her own psyche. Short sometimes vague, incomplete sentences spoken by the main characters and jarring scenes emphasize her personal torment in an attempt to express the deepest emotions, 
wanting for someone to listen and respond.

title: Echoes
synopsis: In a forgotten place in the time, a man lives with the echoes of what was once his life.

title: PARIATÁ URÚ PITIÁ
synopsis: Several nights each week, Mario runs through some "rodas de samba" in Rio de Janeiro. And he does it playing singular instruments that he himself designs and builds. Hard to limit on labels and definitions (architect, artist, percussionist musician, luthier), Mario brings us into plural and multiform universes, made of colors, sounds, shapes, textures, words, and more. Architect of sounds? Poet of shapes? Musician of colors? Mario builds and proposes, is for us to dive, explore and enjoy these worlds.

title: Fasl
synopsis:
Hamed and his friends are staying in a vacant house in order to have some fun and experience life outside boundaries of their families. The landlord, who lives abroad, has given Hamed’s father permission to sell the house on his behalf; Hamed has taken the key without letting his father know and is staying there with some friends.
One night when Hamed is out buying groceries, a man who claims to be the landlord comes to the door. Surprised by this unexpected return, Hamed’s friends lock him up in a closet! Hamed finds out about this situation, gets furious and decides to take him out, but his friends wouldn’t let him do that saying they are not sure if he is the person he claims to be and could be a criminal. This dispute goes on until there is no more voice coming out of the closet…

title: Home & Key

title: Exquisite Interval
synopsis: his single reel Super 8 film is my only evidence of a Doppelgänger-filmmaker, whose current whereabouts are completely unknown. title: State of Liberty
synopsis:
Today we live in the world where liberty is being taken away from us on every step of the

way. State of Liberty is questioning the mythization of liberty and the value it carries

today. It also questions how we perceive the freedom. The most well known presentation

of liberty globally, is The Statue of Liberty. The disappearance of the symbol, what it

represents and the global consequences of the lost state of liberty are being questioned

today. The freedom needs revaluation.

title: breaking the wall
synopsis: Fusing the lines between fiction and reality, the film takes an analytical approach to filmmaking whilst divulging a journey of the Director, both in story and in actual events. The story concentrates on a young man’s spiral into suicide, then weaves to show the actor out of character committing such an act, the reality focuses on Shko’s journey from his native Kurdistan to the UK. Breaking the Wall is a mature and intelligent approach to analysing the cinematic world around a person.

title: Trading Model
synopsis:
Many people travel for enjoyment, Dastin Kurdish traveled to Survived .
Escaping the tyranny of Iraq, he settled in London.  By day, Dastin worked in a steel foundry; by night, he can be spotted in his taxi waiting for the nightclubs to close. 
This way of life was normal for Dastin, the only thing missing was his family.

title: CountDown
synopsis:
Happy-go-lucky Maryam has had a very troubled upbringing. Her repressed childhood memories blocked out the war in Iraq and the distant memories of her family. 

A student reading for a B.A. in drama, Maryam had made her own destiny. She started seeing a young guy called Makwan, and the pair never looked back. Religious differences didn’t get in the way ( Maryam Christian;  Makwan Muslim) and the pair are inseparable. 
Maryam’s Mother, Jwanna plays Cupid, while hiding the fact from her daughter that she is terminally ill. Jwanna’s only mission is to make sure that Maryam is not alone when she passes away, as she has no other relatives.

title: CONFLICT
synopsis: The title speaks for itself. Elusive but captivating interplay of two silent figures brings questions about how you place yourself in contact with others and how others perceive you. The context of the conflict is withheld, allowing a viewer to face his/her own emotions and reasons. The setting acts as a hall of mirrors, so each person and movement exists across time and space in several places at once. This story tells that human identity with its perceptions and reflections, is a many-sided and fascinating phenomenon.

title: runtime error
synopsis: Video games are emergent systems with their own particular internal relationships. This animation mashes up and deconstructs game spaces taking on a multitude of forms, from scrolling on one axis to several separate screens. The blocky 2D grids plasticity is emphasized through a reduced color palette in order to favor formal representation of early video games against the photorealistic, logically consistent 3D game spaces of recent years.

title: Oneiria
synopsis: In our high-tech world, unpredictable behaviour from technology is often perceived as negative. These glitches however - ‘the ghost in the machine’ - can be a starting point to expand the possibilities of image production in the digital age. Oneiria uses datamoshing, a technique in which digital video images are deliberately made unstable, and found footage in different formats (digital HD, VHS, Super 8, …) is literally used as paint, smearing images to create painterly, abstract, dreamlike landscapes.

title: A Promised Rosegarden
synopsis: The Vietnamese Bien and Thien have illegally come to Berlin and have come into hiding at their older relatives Nga and Nam. They are willing to live in total submissiveness for work and apparent safety. While Bien takes care of Nga who is agitated from homesickness Nam forces Thien to sell cigarettes on the black market. Fierce fights about territories between the cigarette dealers and the erratic outbursts of Nga unsettle both their lives. Secretly they try to build up their own livelihood – but that inevitably leads to the escalation of the conflicts between both couples…

title: Пахан
synopsis: Максиму больше тридцати, он освободился из тюрьмы и узнал, что его восьмилетний сын не пользуется во дворе популярностью, более того имеет кличку «Сопля». Но не это беспокоит Максима: Кузьма называет отчима «папой». Максим решает показать всем — «кто тут настоящий папа», и обманом уводит сына в планетарий. Преодолевая преграды, герои в конце концов сходятся в одном точно — они близкие люди: Кузьма сын Максима, а Максим отец Кузьмы.

title: Он и она
synopsis:
Они встретились. Он и она. Он посмотрел на нее, она на него. Раз, два, три… 
          Через три секунды, его сердце будет принадлежать этой незнакомке, а она уже давно решила для себя подарить свое сердце первому встречному, много с тех пор прошло, как она не любила, много с тех пор прошло, как она не была любима. А вот и Он. Она полюбила его уже тогда, когда он появился на дороге, откуда ему было знать, что она теперь вся его.  Она увидела, скорее, почувствовала, что Он идет. Он шел медленно. Она много ждала, но когда увидела его, ей казалось что он идет слишком медленно. Порой ей казалось, что Он не хочет к ней идти, казалось, что он высокомерен, а все потому что, он шел медленно, мучительно медленно, даже черепаха шла бы быстрее, как же он идет мучительно медленно. Но все ей казалось… Она  успела за несколько минут полюбить, разлюбить, возненавидеть незнакомца, который шел очень медленно. 
         Они ничего не сказали. Прошли мимо. Раз, два три…
music: Использовано композиций как(Brien Eno-From the some hill, Muzzy Star - Into the Dust, Arvo Part-Fur Alina
other_credits: Актеры: Она- Шолпан Кассымова, ОН- Сергей Крюков, Помощник режиссера- Серик Бексултанулы

title: Подых балот
synopsis:
Документальный фильм «Подых балот» рассказывает о судьбе попавших в «чёрный» список предназначенных для осушения болот и его жителей, которые поделились своими историями жизни на болоте. Он знакомит зрителя с необычной природной средой болот, которые сохраняют для нас воду, смягчают климат, являются приютом не только для множества видов птиц и животных, но и старинных легенд.
Вместе с тем, в фильме затрагивается проблема изменения экосистемы болот, связанная с процессом торфодобычи. Зрители смогут услышать рассказы местных жителей о том, как поменялся их привычный образ жизни и родные места из-за осушения торфяников.

Длинный синопсис:
17 июня 2011 года Совет Министров Республики Беларусь принял постановление №794 «О некоторых вопросах добычи торфа и оптимизации системы особо охраняемых природных территорий», в котором сказано, что восемь болот, в том числе, находящиеся в заказниках будут осушаться. Документальный фильм «Подых балот» рассказывает о судьбе попавших в «чёрный» список болот и его жителей, которые получают право голоса и охотно рассказывают истории своей жизни на болоте.
Фильм знакомит зрителя со специфической природной средой, наполненной жизнью и играющей важную роль в сохранении и поддержании экологического равновесия и благоприятных условий для жизни человека, а также множества видов растений и животных. Вместе с тем, в фильме затрагивается проблема изменения экосистемы болот, связанная с процессом торфодобычи, что логически ставит перед нами вопрос о том, оправданы ли действия чиновников, расставляющих приоритеты в пользу добычи торфа. А свидетельства местных жителей, которые рассказывают о том, как осушение болот и изменение окружающего ландшафта меняет их повседневную жизнь, раскладывают на чаши весов все «за» и «против».

title: TSCHÜSS PAPA
synopsis: Young Benedict is very attached to his father's old set of medieval armor and it is the only thing that gives him any comfort. Trying to be a knight, he ends up getting into a fight at school with a long-time bully. His mother is forced to sell his suit of armor in an effort to help her son move on. Benedict must then go on a great adventure to get the armor back. Along the way, he learns what it is to be a true knight, with or without his armor.
film_awards: 11.05.2014   * 22nd DEUTSCHES KINDER-MEDIEN-FESTIVAL GOLDENER SPATZ (Competition Section: „Kurzspielfilm“, Germany)

title: Džiunglės
synopsis: Thirty-year old guy is assaulted on the street. Randomly, in the middle of a day. The emotional damage hurts him more than the punches taken. This is a new experience for him. The guy tries to sort things out between justice, revenge and a bit of shame. Meanwhile, on the opposite side of the story there are guys that did the beating. They practice first-punch knockouts. And they helpfully carry their mothers’ food bags in the evening.

title: СТАРИК В ПРИМОРСКОМ БУФЕТЕ
synopsis:
Human's dignity is something that does not depend on time, age or social status. It is inside.
Человеческое достоинство не зависит от времени, возраста или социального статуса. Оно внутри.

title: Для самых маленьких
synopsis:
Девять сказочных историй для очень больших и для самых маленьких. Этот сборник — дебют молодых мультипликаторов анимационной студии при Свято-Елисаветинском женском монастыре в г. Минске. 
…Успеть сказать другу о том, что ты его любишь. Плыть на айсберге в гости к бабушке, которая живет на другом конце земли. Набраться смелости и полететь, забыв, что ты простая прищепка. Вылезти из створки раковины, раскрыть глаза  и начать первое большое путешествие. Первым протянуть свое крыло, лапу, руку… У малышей такое чуткое сердце и так много всего впереди. Они умеют мечтать, и они способны совершать настоящие поступки.

title: Bhopal Diaries 2012
synopsis:
Bindu, a naïve immigrant woman in Bhopal, India makes videos of herself, narrating everyday incidents for her husband Mohan, an army man stationed at the country’s borders. She’s a victim of Bhopal Gas Tragedy of 1984, the worst industrial disaster of all times and as a consequence, suffers from chronic chest pains. The effects of the gas tragedy are so far reaching that her child Goku, born decades after the accident has health ailments due to it. But despite the poverty and the daily challenges of her life, Bindu tries to project a positive image through her videos and tries to find happiness in little routines.
However her joyous facade will soon collapse in the face of a greater tragedy that awaits them...

title: Полтаблетки Утром
title_en: The half a pill in the morning
synopsis: Полина, ученица старшей школы, после очередного конфликта в школе, теряет над собой контроль, начинает регулярно причинять себе боль (резать руки), чувствует, что реальность стала другой. Она обращается к психиатру, но постепенно понимает, что таблетки - это вовсе не помощь и что не все так просто… Полина обращается к воспоминаниям о шизофренике Гоголе, который жил во дворе, пытается анализировать свое состояние. После внезапной встречи с тем самым Гоголем, она находит в себе силы бороться с психическим расстройством без помощи препаратов.

title: А што ў лузе?
synopsis:
"А што ў лузе?"

Мультфільм ствараўся па матывах традыцыйнай песні, запісаннай падчас этнаграфічнай экспедыцыі краязнаўчай арганізацыі "Талака". Песню выконвае ансамбль "Сястрыцы", вёскі Дзебіч, Буда-Кашалёўскі раён, Гомельская вобласць. Мультфільм распавядае пра сустрэчу дзьвух сяброў, якая скончылася не так пазытыўна як пачыналася.

title: Miras-e-Man, Avaaz
synopsis:
Social Status of women has been unsteady and pendulous, throughout the different periods in Iranian history.
The prohibition of women singing in public after 1979 revolution is a recent and elucidative example which prevents them  from singing even in religious rituals such as Ta'zïye.
Bushehr port, having a history of around 5000 years, is the only exception as local women strive to preserve their old traditions of singing.
The movie, takes us to the old and almost untouched traditions of Boushehris and follows three women for whom singing is a really important part of life. They talk about their life, their enthusiasm for singing and why they are determined to be involved in their religious rites the way they always have been.
Despite all the efforts of the authorities for interdiction of women singing, Boushehr is the only city where women still take part in public religious rituals, and protect their old heritage of songs and music.

title: Берцы
synopsis: Действие фильма происходит в Украине. Сын обманывает маму, что пошел служить в армию и перевелся на заочную форму в университете. На самом деле он ведет беззаботный образ жизни. Мама работает за границей и высылает сыну деньги. Все длится прекрасно до последней экзаменационной сессии. Но одна Профессорша не поставила сыну очень важный экзамен и теперь его могут выгнать из Университета. Мама приезжает в Украину чтобы разобраться во всем сама. Она сделает все чтобы ее сын выбился в люди. Задача сына разыграть перед мамой целое военное шоу, чтобы она ни о чем не догадалась.

title: Притулок
synopsis:
At least 416 thousands of people from Donetsk and Lugansk regions left their homes, trying to escape from the war on Donbas. About 190 thousands of refugees moved to other regions of Ukraine. Now, over 13 thousands of refugees from Crimea and Donbas live in Kiev.
Most of them were left without any means of support. 
All over the country the camps for refugees were set up. Most of them are located in the buildings of former schools, resorts and different warehouses.
One of the refuges was set up in the resort “Dzherelo” in Kyiv. Many families with children from Donbas live there. But all these people faced one huge problem – there is still no certain owner of that building. Obviously, such a lovely place in Kyiv is a tidbit for many men of consequence. Hence, many strange things happen there: screams, shoots and even explosions. In such atmosphere, childhood ends very quickly and the refuge becomes a trap.

title: Выбор Маргариты
synopsis:
Ритм жизни героини, молодой девушки по имени Маргарита, полностью созвучен с ритмом городской дороги: три цвета - зеленый, желтый и красный - три чувства - три лица одного человека - три этапа одной жизни.
Маргарита проживает переломный этап в рамках истории: этап выбора. Пятнадцать минут, которые станут в ее судьбе ключевыми: она круто меняет свою жизнь - разрывает привычные отношения ради неизвестности. Рискует всем ради сомнительного джек-пота.
Маргарита ищет ответы на вечные вопросы - в чем смысл и предназначение любви? Она теряет возлюбленного и находит его вновь, но спасется ли она от одиночества и пустоты? И что есть смысл в мире, отрицающего всякий смысл?

title: Незабвение павших
synopsis: «Незабвение павших» Документальный фильм-память о пропавших без вести солдатах на фронтах Великой Отечественной войны. 70 лет прошло со дня победы, но «война так и не закончилась, пока не захоронен последний солдат» - известная фраза А.В.Суворова – к сожалению справедлива и сегодня. Множество поисковых отрядов сражаются на «полях боя» с забвением, но статистика безутешна – мало какие останки удаются опознать. А между тем дети и внуки тех солдат ищут, надеются и жду, что когда-нибудь смогут принести цветы на могилу своих близких, жизнь которых унесла Великая Отечественная Война.

title: Razing Up: a grassroots investigation of gentrification & displacement
title_en: Razing Up: a grassroots investigation of gentrification & displacement
synopsis: Gentrification is often seen as an alternative to urban decay, and it is this perspective that pollutes discourse on urban planning and inner city redevelopment. The limited qualitative research that has been done on the issue shows eviction, landlord violence, low-wage exploitation of workers, homelessness, demolition of culture, stigmatization of neighborhoods, and the disintegration of basic human rights. Gentrification is a political question, and one needs to ask FOR WHOM when analyzing the effects. Razing Up is a short documentary film investigating how displacement caused by gentrification is affecting quality of life, and for whom.

title: Игра света
synopsis: У каждого человека, множество субличностей, особенно у творческого. Беда нашего времени в том, что зачастую на чаше весов стоит выбор либо зарабатывать деньги либо заниматься творчеством. И лишь немногие могут совместить 2 в 1.... Трагедия человека в слабости духа, он как правило бывает подавлен социумом, финансовыми проблемами и зачастую, убивает в себе таланты данные природой.... Выбирая стабильный заработок на ненавистной работе, не имея возможности обрести внутреннюю гармонию и душевное счастье от того чем он занимается... 8 из 10 именно так и живут.... Днем работая на "дядю" и лишь ночью позволяя быть самим собой....
director_awards:
Абкарова Элина Артуровна
Родилась 6 августа 1988 года. 
В юном возрасте стала лауреатом во Всероссийском театральном фестивале «Мой Пушкин», номинации: «Художественное слово», «Юные актеры» - Гран-при в обеих номинациях 1999 и 2005 году так же Гран-при в обеих номинациях.

В 2008 году стала международным лауреатом со спектаклем "Рудольфио" в наминации "лучший спектакль года" на фестевале в Таллине "Театральная Осень"

В 2008 году окончила Ленинградский областной колледж культуры и искусства, актерский факультет (курс Т. М. Славина).

В 2014 окончила Санкт–Петербургский государственный Университет культуры и искусства, мастерская Б. Н. Преображенского (режиссерсий факультет).

С 2008 года театральный режиссер-постановщик.

title: CHILDREN OF CONFLICT
synopsis:
Children of Conflict is based on a true story which reflects the ground reality of the children residing unfortunately in or around the different conflict regions of the Globe.

This film answers how a child gets involved in the conflict willingly or unwillingly and how it affects one’s future?

Children of Conflict is dedicated to late Mr. Sameer Gaffar who died accidently in a mortar shell blast which Sameer and his cousin explored in a pile of rubble, not knowing what it is, they started playing with it and that is when it exploded.
May his soul rest in peace...

title: "Sha'aloa le'shloma"
synopsis:
It's Friday morning at Jerusalem.
Badihi, an old and religious man, is vigorously hanging notes that announces when the "Shabat" (Saturday) comes in.
Through his tough journey all over the city, we discover the inside of Jerusalem:
A city with a great gap between the symbolic and holy values to the people who are living their daily life in it.
The movie is based on footage that we captured while we were wandering from the entrance of Jerusalem up to the "Old City".

title: Верь мне
synopsis: На первый взгляд история рассказывает нам про обычную молодую пару, которая испытывает сложности в личных отношениях. Но погрузившись в предлагаемые обстоятельства, мы понимаем, насколько сильно главные герои привязаны друг к другу. Вера - тяжело больная молодая девушка, которая не хочет видеть, как Артур пытается бороться с ее болезнью и проигрывает. Поэтому она принимает решение разорвать их отношения. Артур - любящий молодой человек, который не понимает, почему Вера хочет все разорвать. Узнав о ее болезни, Артур решает обратиться к Богу.

title: Osiem dziewięć
synopsis: Eight nine is a short film about the generation of 1989: young adults who on the one hand have the privilege of enjoying ultimate freedom and on the other hand are limited by themselves because they do not know how to deal with it. They are wearing a mask of indifference which allows them to ignore any kind of possible deception. The people of this generation run away from their lives, nurturing coldness, distance and irony inside of them.

title: The Stomach
synopsis: Frank's had enough. A spirit medium whose unique and grotesque method of channeling the dead is putting his own life at risk. He wants out… but others, in this world and the next, have plans of their own. Part body horror, part crime thriller, part ghost story, The Stomach is a unique tale of Supernatural Noir.

Pamela is the only woman in the group and the only person who seems baffled by Javier proposals.

title: "Многолуние"
synopsis:
Многолуние.
        Молодой человек – Алексей – увлечен астрономией и космосом, но из-за своей болезни звезды он может наблюдать только в телескоп из окна. Алексей живет вместе с дедушкой, который не разделяет увлечения внука. Кроме того, он всеми силами старается донести до Алексея свой взгляд на мир, как на божественное творение. Внук же в свою очередь игнорирует все попытка деда наладить общение. 
       Алексей большую часть своего времени проводит в интернете. У него нет реальных друзей, только интернет знакомая, с которой он связывается по скайпу. Девушка разделяет увлечение Алексея космосом и наукой. Они вместе договариваются наблюдать редкое астрономическое явление – «Многолуние». К сожалению, увидеть его смогут только жители северного полушария, поэтому Алексей решает устроить для девушки онлайн-трансляцию.        Они договариваются связаться в семь часов вечера по местному времени, но в этот же день, в церкви, которую посещает дедушка Алексея, проводиться служба и благотворительный концерт с участием верующей молодежи.  Дедушка самолично решает, что для внука будет полезно посетить службу и пообщаться со сверстниками. Конфликт накаляется, когда Алексей отказывается ехать. К тому же дедушка узнает, что последние улучшения в самочувствие внука вызваны не его молитвами, а экспериментальными лекарствами которые Алексей покупает через интернет.
        В результате дедушка понимает, что его чрезмерное давление на внука лишь отдаляет их друг от друга.

title: Van Water De Druppels
synopsis:
"When Water turns into Drops"
In 1995 Johnny Beerens painted  The Oostburgse water tower in the idea of creating "eternity" with a mural, but the coating could not withstand the test of time.
Twenty years later, in the summer of 2014, the fine artist again ascends the scaffold to renovate his brainchild.

In order to be fully engaged in and to prepare for this former work, he feels the need to let go of his workshop and all it contains to utterly clear his head.
Only then the mural can again completely take possession of him and vice versa. Resulting in a new "Source of Life" on the Oostburgse water tower.

With "When Water turns into Drops" filmmaker  Jeannice Adriaansens again delivers a personal document, revolving around the unspoken.
Along with Johnny Beerens, she embarks this creative journey at lonely heights only to grasp the intangible - the complexity of what can not be put down in words.
A touch of emotion, a dash of ratio, powered by an extremely accurate sound design which does not shun silence but dares to embrace it and at times confronts the audience with his own vulnerability and bare existence.

title: curzio e marzio
synopsis: curzio and marzio are two picaroons who represent the same two sides of the same coin: the first one with moustaches, the second one with hats. unknowingly dead, the picaroons meet in the first act and, after the introductions, they understand they are both looking for sant'alessio. at whatever time curzio and marzio appear, they change moustaches and hats. in the second act the picaroons understand they are dead and meeting sant'alessio they will discover he has their same face. a fanfare, instead of a funeral march, will end the work and their existence.

title: Dialéctica
synopsis:
Sebastian is a young carpenter at a construction company who uses to play chess with his friend Julio during lunch time. The arriving of Fernando, the owner’s company, to the construction, motivates Sebastian to ask him to accept the pending chess match between both of them. Fernando argues to be short of time, but the provocative and insistent invitation of Sebastian convinces Fernando to face the challenge.

As a result of this, Sebastian and Fernando sit down face to face to play a chess match, in attentive and curious presence of the rest of the workers. A match which becomes progressively in a tense discussion about some working problems that revolve around work overload and poor salaries.

Different stances, resentments and a wood board of game which will reveal only one winner.

title: Hotel Bellevue
synopsis: A journey through time which leads us back into the early 60s: With interviews and poetic images the film portrays a family business between tradition and change: The Hotel Bellevue in Lauenburg, lovated at the former inner German border. Three generations of the Timm family have seen it all: Dances at tea time on Sundays, crowds of hungry or famous transit travelers, the border opening after the fall of the Berlin wall or the structural change of the local economy. The junior manager and his Brazilian wife do their best too keep up the traditional 60s style, but they also have to satisfy the increasing needs of their guests.

title: Глобальные проблемы
synopsis:
Две героини, Настя и Даша – лучшие подруги. Они «не такие, как все»: все детство и школу девочки провели вместе, смотря свысока на своих ровесников. 
Но незаметно для подруг к концу школы их дороги начали расходиться. 

Даша – целеустремленная девочка, готовая серьезно учиться, чтобы построить карьеру юриста , а Настя, погруженная в мир фантазий, взрослеть не торопится. Она ходит в детскую театральную студию, где играет роль кактуса в постановке и мечтает о романе со студентом актерского факультета, которому носит цветы на каждый его спектакль, но с которым боится заговорить. 

Пока Даша всегда смело берет дело в свои руки, Настя всё больше запутывается в диссонансе собственных фантазий, амбиций и инфантильности, окончательно теряя связь со всем, что было ей дорого.

title: Ein Raum mit Bildern von Provinzen
title_en: A Space With Images Of Provinces
synopsis: Eleven-year-old Yağmur Şimşek is telling imaginary/ fictitious fairy tales. Fragments of these stories become part of a chain of associations of found footage material and issues of narration in films. ‚The Library of Babel‘ by Jorge Luis Borges describe the reflection on storytelling and collecting. Just as every portrait is telling a story about its subject a film also creates a story about filmmaking itself.

synopsis: This short documentary tells the story of Marie Wilcox, the last fluent speaker of the Wukchumni language and the dictionary she created in an effort to keep her language alive.

title: Признание в любви
synopsis:
Тихий полицейский-подкаблучник вместе с напарником-раздолбаем расследуют рутинное дело о самоубийстве неопознанной девушки, спрыгнувшей с крыши многоэтажного дома. 
Найдя среди вещей самоубийцы телефон, главный герой понимает, что погибшая – его младшая сестра. 
Полицейские выясняют, что причиной самоубийства девушки стала ссора с ее парнем. 
Напарники преступают закон и собственные принципы, чтобы отомстить парню. 
Тем временем, ответив на звонок телефона, принадлежавшего сестре, полицейский слышит в трубке знакомый голос…

title: Kintsugi
synopsis:
Scars are links to the events that caused them.
Very often these events are traumatic.
Kintsugi, which means "golden joinery", is the japanese technique of mending broken ceramics with gold filled resin.
Every repaired ceramics has a unique and irreplicable pattern of golden lines due to randomness of the crushing.
This technique has its roots in the belief that the object is more valuable and beautiful with its history revealed.
Bodies also tell us their story. Some of them say it loud.

title: Pretos Novos
synopsis: In the neighborhood of Gamboa, port area of Rio's capital, the couple Merced and Petrucio start a renovation in their home. During the work, they are faced with pieces of bones, dentition and fragments of objects. Beneath his feet, there was one of the most important historical heritage of the African diaspora ever discovered: the Archaeological Cemetery of New Blacks.

title: Systo: Место для встреч
synopsis:
The film is about the independent music festival of ethno сultrure:  Systo
What is Systo? Everyone will answer something special, but in fact - he will tell you his own story. For one Systo's festival of high-quality interesting music, the other feels it like a place to open his talent and to share his inner beauty with congenial persons; it's nature's and element's awaking from a winter sleep; probably - life itself in concentrateе. 
Once founded as a little holyday for friends, now Systo is a huge troop of invisible front fighters. For 11 years Systo had grown a new generation of people, who introduced this World a piece of light and beauty.
In this movie we want to emphasize a purity and deepness of festival culture and also remind a few very important and easy things. Friends, remember, that transformation of the World has a beginning inside of your own heart. Learn and create, live on the top gear, make a good easy things and take care about your friends. Together we've done a lot but the target is still forward.

title: Точный адрес
synopsis: Когда семейная жизнь молодой  пары Лизы и Вадима заходит в тупик, когда им кажется, что семью сохранить уже нельзя, и она рушится на глазах, на пороге их квартиры появляется Глеб.  И все переворачивается с ног на голову.  Лиза воспринимает его приход, как подарок. Вадим, как страшное наказание. Но кто знает, может, это просто судьба?

title: Die Hälfte der Welt
synopsis: Nadir – father of an immigrant family – works night shifts as a cleaner in a Zurich office building. Despite having to work very hard he’s trying to integrate himself in Switzerland and enable his son Babak a better future. One night after work he notices that the son’s room is empty. In the trash he discovers a thrown away letter from university, in the drawers he finds a torn up picture of his girlfriend and a Koran. When Babak finally arrives home the father confronts him with his findings and realizes that his son has had a change of heart he never thought was possible.

title: Cinema: Future/Past
synopsis: An art video about the interplay between cinema’s past and future. Music and cinematic effects briefly transform a home video into a silent comedy short from the days of Charlie Chaplin and Mack Sennett. But its abrupt end is a reminder of how ease and availability of film making tools have also been accompanied by diminishing attention spans of the average film viewer. As websites like YouTube demonstrate, the next short film that captures the whole world’s imagination is more likely to be from an unknown person’s private moments rather than a  major film studio. But short attention span will ensure that viewers will be equally quick in deserting the film in their search for the next cinematic thrill.
film_awards: Not submitted to any awards yet.

title: BENEATH
synopsis:
Grace and Jake are retiring to Spain, but the night before departure their dream plan falls apart when she reveals a secret. Thirty years earlier Jake couldn’t bring himself to leave Grace.
 ́Beneath' explores how seemingly small decisions can define your future and the importance of having the courage to follow your heart.
other_credits: Cast: Sandra Duncan, Peter Nolan, Jessica Ellerby, Jack Maurice.

title: Skyline memory, desvanecidos en el aire
title_en: Skyline memory, vanish in thin air
synopsis:
This is a visual document that addresses the concepts of the city, modernity, urban planning and memory from a poetic perspective. Skyscrapers are portrayed as immense receptacles of memories, symbols of the power of cities: figuratively stepping inside these buildings, imagining the different forms of human existence, speculating on the virtues and miseries concealed in the privacy of each home. The piece is articulated by
narratives based on personal experiences, autobiographical details, real facts and cultural and social events, questioning and fictionalising time and life itself in the neverending process of construction and collapse.
film_awards:

Special Mention 
3rd Indian Cine Film Festival. India 2015

title: RUE DU BAZAR SAINT LAURENT
synopsis: Puducherry, India. Chandra and Prateek are in love. But Chandra�s brother, a local crime lord, has other plans for his sister as he has offered her hand to a business partner as part of a deal. As he threatens Prateek and tries to get rid of him, Prince and Sarah, two mysterious beings appearing to be angels, will take matters into their own hands for love to prevail.

synopsis: Заглянуть в чье-то окно - подобно тому, как заглянуть в чью-то душу. Какой-то хулиган уселся на бетонный забор, болтает ногами, небрежно пуская сигаретный дымок...И смотрит на один из домов напротив, смотрит в  окна, смотрит в души. Подшучивает над прохожей. Ничего не делает, просто ждет.

title: Foto de Familia
synopsis: A couple near to a break up. Their only child discovers a secret about her mother and turns it into a drama.

title: Norma
synopsis: Story of a young boy who tries to rebuild his life " desperately " to forget his previous relationship. He tries meeting girls through social networks. But its not going to be easy to achieve his goal , first at all because of the type of girl who he is going to met and secondly by his former partner, it seems that she refuses to disappear from his life.

title: TIE
synopsis: As a football match paralyses Bucharest, an anxious business woman, Dana, boards young Alex's cab. Once in front of her building, despite their obvious differences, Dana asks Alex to stay with her for the night. At any price.
film_awards: Villa Kult Award at Next International Film Festival

title: Red Fruits
synopsis: For the sake of material benefits, this female cat romances a fox, only to reveal her identity in the end

title: CUIDAR A RUTH
synopsis: Although three years have past since her husband passed away, Ruth has not got used to living alone, nor can she stand the carers that her daughter Clara has hired to look after her. One morning, Ruth sacks her carer: Clara is going to live with her for a while.

title: Missing one player
synopsis:
During a majong game a bad situation occurs. Everyone waits for the last player to show up. The three have no choice but to wait and sit there silently in tears. 
However, they do believe that the fourth player will come. They look up to they sky waiting for this miracle to happen.

title: Треугольники
synopsis:
Символическое вИденье деятельности современного художника/поэта: личное осмысление культурного бэкграунда, перфоманс-вброс продукта во внешний мир, поиск новых идей. 
В фильме использовано стихотворение Дмитрия Ерохина.
director_awards:

2014 фестиваль «Московские звезды» - «Колесо» победитель в категории «Музыкальное видео»

title: 5 segundos
synopsis: Carlos has a surprise in store for his wife. They had an argument a few days ago and now he wants to apologise.
film_awards:
01.	NotodoFilmFest. Madrid
	MejorDirector (David González) | Best Director

title: Самолет
synopsis: Между дагестанцем Хасаном и русским Колей вспыхивает конфликт прямо на борту летящего самолета. Несмотря на все усилия пассажиров, конфликт быстро перерастает в драку. Еле-еле драчунов удается разнять, но тут выясняется страшное обстоятельство - самолет неисправен…

title: UN ENCUENTRO
synopsis: Susana moved from León to Madrid and now she works in a consultancy. During her journeys to work by Metro, she gets to know a stranger.

synopsis: A real Story about a 20 years old Egyptian Girl wants to Making Movie but struggle with Traditions which look at her as Blood Stain should keep it to be respectable in her Macho society and she decided to Give up her virginty to achieve her Goal .

title: WHALE VALLEY
synopsis: The film shows a pure love story between two brothers who live in a remote Icelandic fjord with their parents.When the younger brother a little boy witnesses a life or death moment involving his big brother it sets in motion the possibility of either a great tragedy or a turning point to better times in the brothers' lives.

title: Богема. Жизнь
synopsis: Экспериментальный документально-игровой трагифарс-коллаж. В яркой, острой, порой авангардной, порой лиричной форме, авторы пытаются исследовать Феномен Жизни, как таковой. Сопряжение Жизни и Искусства… В фильме участвуют известные художники, актёры, режиссёры: Дмитрий Шагин, Юрий Мамин, Александр Баширов…

boy witnesses a life or death moment involving his big brother it sets in motion the possibility of either a great tragedy or a turning point to better
times in the brothers' lives.

title: I Said I Would Never Talk About Politics
title_en: I Said I Would Never Talk About Politics
synopsis: Don Mariano travels by aeroplane and goes to dine at a prestigious restaurant which specialises in natural, quality red meat that is low in fat and cholesterol.

title: Sigues Aquí
synopsis: "Still There" connects us to the intimate life of two characters whose reality has suddenly been challenged. Portraying the everyday Raul and Sofia, who are on the search of recognizing each other in the midsts of utterly different realities.
editor: Franz Zavala, Cristina Ramiro, Ana Pérez
other_credits: Cast: Verónica Ortiz Cisneros, Víctor Hugo Martín

title: Конечная
synopsis: На последнем поезде метро девушка едет домой, с ней в вагоне лишь один попутчик, который не сводит с нее глаз.
other_credits: Завьялова Кристина, Заволокин Дмитрий, Лаврентьев Митя

title: Unari-chitai
synopsis: Into a world where creatures live in peaceful idleness, a single rope drops down. The rope begins to attack them, occasionally pulling in passing a traveler, and arbitrarily toying with him.
director_awards: None
other_credits: Animation: Nijima Atsuko, Keiko Utagawa

title: dýchať síru
synopsis: The story begins with four characters wearing strange masks. They walk through a landscape surrounded by dead animal bones. After some time everything changes from black and white into colorful magical night. The main inspiration of this animation were shamanic drawings and primitive rituals.

title: ПАСХА ХРИСТОВА
synopsis: Каждый год на Пасху Церковь неминуемо встречает неиссякаемый людской поток. Многие приходят сюда только раз в году. Что ждут люди от этого праздника? На что надеются? Что ищут? Почему именно этот день так важен для них?

title: GOBLIK
synopsis: Метафоричная история о том, как человек взрослеет. Маленькая героиня переживает переход из детства во взрослую жизнь, и понимает,что отныне все будет совсем иначе.
other_credits: Северина София, Куан Туруспеков

title: Ненужное кредо
synopsis: АНДРЕЙ -ТАЛАНТЛИВЫЙ ХИРУРГ, ОН ПЫТАЕТСЯ ЖИТЬ «ПО СПРАВЕДЛИВОСТИ»,  ЧЕМ ВЫЗЫВАЕТ НЕПОНИМАНИЕ СО СТОРОНЫ КОЛЛЕГ. НЕБОЛЬШОЙ КОНФЛИКТ С МЕЛКИМ ВОРИШКОЙ ЗАСТАВЛЯЕТ, АНДРЕЯ ПЕРЕСМОТРЕТЬ ВСЕ СВОИ ЖИЗНЕННЫЕ ПРИОРИТЕТЫ.
other_credits:
Звукорежиссер - Сергей Антонов
Актеры - Андрей Чадов, Денис Косяков, Прохор Чеховской, Сергей Фишер, Максим Глотов, Виталий Гребенников, Карина Хидэкель

title: Нам лень
synopsis: Неотъемлемая часть нашей жизни, порок современность- лень. Она может настигнуть нас в любых ситуациях, и съемки фильма- не исключение.

title: Aller - Retour
synopsis:
Matt is dead for a year. Simon wants to redeem his debt. Charlotte is in love with another. Aunt Babs wants to keep her family together. Tom... Tom knows nothing. 
Farewell is an illusion.

title: EN EL FONDO DEL MAR
title_en: AT THE BOTTOM OF THE SEA
synopsis:
Un grupo de cineastas sin éxito elaboran un plan para ir en busca de la estatuilla del premio Goya que ganó Juan Antonio Bayona por Lo
Imposible, y que acabó en las profundidades del mar
film_awards:
MUESTRA DE CINE IBEROAMERICANO NICARAGUA (Nicaragua)

FESTIVAL INTERNACIONAL DE CINE DIGITAL EXPERIMENTAL DE ESPACIO ENTER CANARIAS (Spain)

title: La Ribera
synopsis: A remote village has run out of water and the villagers have abandoned their homes searching for a place to survive.  Fermín, a young miner, is hesitant about leaving Guanajuato with his family or making one last effort to fulfilling the legend: finding the water that his grandfather planted.
film_awards: 7 Rally Universitario del Guanajuato International Film Festival - Jury's Prize
other_credits:
Cast: Harold Torres: Fermín
Adriana Paz: Irene
Gabo Anguiano: Leonel

title: Баба, Ваня и коза
synopsis: Set in a small, typical Belarusian village - granny Sima's only concern is for the future of her alcoholic son, Vanya. Accompanied by her best friend, a white goat called Manya, she starts a war with her neighbor, Glasha, who happens to be the village Vodka producer...

title: MY ENEMY, MY BROTHER
synopsis: Zahed and Najah are two former enemies from the Iran-Iraq War who become blood brothers for life. 25 years after one saves the other�s life on the battlefield, they meet again by sheer chance in Canada. Considering the recent coverage of the Middle East this emotional documentary story of Najah and Zahed is a surprising affirmation of humanity that cuts across political borders.

title: A GRINGO HONEYMOON
synopsis: James Wallace is a young American. To him Mexico was just another adventure in a life lived without any grand plans. A place to go where nobody knew who you were and nobody cared. A chance to drop out and get by within Mexico's flourishing underground economy. When he finds himself working as a 'surgeon' in Carlos Melgarejos' burgeoning organ trafficking ring things start looking up. But that was before he met Rosalita, a prostitute at the amateur lucha libre whose profound beauty shakes his insouciance. Suddenly there's more to life than cutting out kidneys south of the border. James wants out and he wants to take Rosalita with him. For Carlos this is more than just another headache in a life filled with niggling trespasses, this is personal.

title: Luz a la deriva
synopsis: Iceland lives in darkness for much of the year. The good thing about night is that it's like a backdrop which erases the set and leaves you looking at the bare essentials, like looking at sheet of paper you have to draw on.

title: I AM SAMI
synopsis: Living in a war zone, 10 year old Sami is forced to take decisions beyond his understanding; decisions that could deprive him of his childhood and change his life forever.

title: Lupatva pri nas
synopsis: In Hruševec Kupljenski, a small village, which is about twenty miles northwest of Zagreb, operates folklore society of the same name, led by Stjepan Đurinski. Every year, the society nurtures and restores a special traditional custom – harvesting corn at one of the neighbour’s fields on Hruševec hills.
other_credits: Marica Đurinski Anka Lovrek

title: Надежда
synopsis:
Andrei is in love with Nadezhda (Hope), but is afraid to share his feelings. He helps her overcome her fear of carousels, and under the disguise of a joke he confesses his love. The surrounding chirm makes it difficult for her to hear his words, and she tries to figure out if it is him or the noise of the wind. She falls in love and tries to get to the truth.  Will it be easy for Andrei to overcome the fear of sharing his feelings and to sidestep the obstacles of the time they live in?
 A story based on Anton Pavlovich Chekhov’s short story “Joke”, about the courage to take the path of our dreams or to abandon the desired happiness .
director_awards: Student graduation film

title: IRINA IM WUNDERLAND
synopsis: Irina, a young immigrant from eastern Europe is happily married to handsome and successful Stefan. When he loses his job, she decides to take destiny in her hands by getting a job as a taxi driver. When she proudly presents her husband with the good news he reacts badly to it. He does not think that driving a taxi is a decent job for his wife. Irina remains undeterred, in fact the challenge only spurs her on. But then her first work day in multicultural Zurich turns into a nightmare…

title: Bang Utot
synopsis:
"Bang-utot, literally, 'attempting to get up and groaning...' Death occuring in the course of a nightmare… In Manila about twelve cases of death by Bang-utot are recorded each year. One man who recovered said that 'a little man' was sitting on his chest and strangling him.”
William Burroughs, Naked Lunch

title: Miles to Go Before I Sleep
title_en: Miles to Go Before I Sleep
synopsis:
A short documentary about rootlessness and a lost identity. 

The film tells the story of a Congolese girl and her nomadic life. As Achat was seven years old, her  parents  sent  her  away  from  Congo  to  be  adopted  in  France.  After  her  adoptive  mother’s death,  years  of  ordinary  life  in  Paris  turned  into  a  nightmare.  In  the  film  Achat  shares  her story  of  becoming  a  victim  of  abuse  and  child  trafficking.  Through  twists  and  turns  beyond belief, she is thrown into a whirlwind of drifting between continents.
other_credits:
Achat Gallute Hussein

title: Клапоцкi
synopsis:
Маленькі правінцыйны горад, правінцыйныя людзі. Мастацтва загнана ў вузкія рамкі ўспрымання сярэднестатыстычнага жыхара. Такі погляд на свет мае адзiн з гараджан - фатограф Валерыя. Яго шлях - асктетычны лад жыцця. Творчасць у шкоду грошай. Але ж выжываць у гэтым свеце яму дапамагае жанчына.

A small provincial town in Belarus, provincial people. Art is driven into the narrow framework of a typical citizen’s perception. This is the view of the town’s citizen – photographer Valery. His way is one of an ascetic  - creative work to the prejudice of money. The woman helps him to survive in this world.

title: HIJOS DE LA TIERRA
synopsis:
Children of Earth" is the testimony of people associated with nature who open their hearts to convey to mankind the wisdom that holds Mother Earth. This documentary wants to serve as a vehicle for transmitting these scholars knowledge and sensitize the viewer what being Son of the Earth.
Materialism and stress to which we subject our society keep us going in search of consciousness, leading to a shift away from nature. We live back to her without realizing that we are exploiting voraciously.
Our planet is a source of life and therefore needs preservation. Today more than ever we feel the cry of the Earth, which among all the noise and haste, almost never hear:
- "We are your children, not their owners. Earth is a living pharmacy that we must preserve. "
This documentary invites you to take a journey of initiation to grow spiritually and contact with nature, leading the viewer to reflect deeply about the health and preservation of the planet.

title: ABIADURA
synopsis:
Abiadura is a short film about the impact of speed in life experience, represented by a female passenger's view from a train as the vehicle starts up.
This short film is wholly made with waste materials, such as cardboard, fabric, paper or plastic.
The musical score, specially conceived for this piece, has also been composed with instruments made of recycled materials.
The aim of the film is to offer the audience a poetic view of the contemporary human condition.

title: Фатальность

title: N DIAWALDY BOULY
synopsis:
N´Diawaldi Bouly is a 600 people village located in south Mauritania. Their inhabitants farm and cattle raise for a living, but life is not easy at all as they have almost non resources to get things well done. Despite their poverty, people are very friendly,  pleasant, and supportive. They love their village and are proud of living there. 
We will now listen to several people that live in N´Diawaldi Bouly, and they will help us understand much better their way of life. We will experience their daily life feeling it as our own life, which will help us being more sensitive and enable us to grow a little-bit more as individuals.

title: Kontur
synopsis: (1997) Hayrunisa(3), Sheyma(6) and Muhammed(13) are three siblings. Hayrunisa is a leukemia patient, so she doesn't have hairs. She likes to play with her shadow on the wall projected by the gasolier, when the power goes out in evenings. One day her brother and sister make a decoration (contour) -shaped like hair and made of newspaper - and put on the wall. Then when it becomes dark, they wait for electricity to go out. But the power doesn't go out. Eventually her brother Muhammet turns off the braker. When Hayrunisa starts to play with her shadow on the wall, the contour on the wall is shown as her hair.
other_credits: Set: Mehmet Can Kara

title: Коллекционер
synopsis:
Фильм о вечном пороке - воровстве, через которое главные герой пытается найти освобождение и душевный покой. Он живет не в самом радужном в мире Достоевского ("Преступление и наказание" и в мире Брессона "Карманник"), и спустя несколько удачных греховных актов, он будто бы расцветает. Но можно ли оправдать достижения покоя, через грех или есть какой-то предел? Этот вопрос задает нам фильм.
 Хотелось бы отметить, что в фильме присутствует довольно парадоксальный прием, который обычно свойственен телевизионному фильму - в нем есть "ведущий". А куда он ведет и что ищет узнаем после просмотра. Благодарю за внимание.
