title: Three Dimensions of Time
synopsis:
Three moments in time are captured in three layers of coloured imagery shown simultaneously. Combined, the layers form normal full-colour images of the elements which persist through time.
Simultaneously transitory elements – animals, people, machines – move through these scenes in single colours, leaving only a brief trace, as if they're memories or ghosts who have left behind their past, present or future. Some people have lived for so long that they become as stable as their surroundings. With dignity they become archetypes of themselves, representatives of traditions which are as much a part of the landscape as the buildings.

'Three Dimensions of Time' is inspired by the photography of Sergey Prokudin-Gorskii and was filmed in Kansk, Siberia.

title: Kafal Pakyo
synopsis: The film is set in the countryside of Nepal during the civil war period, where most men were either abroad or displaced because of the war. A countryside where orient cuckoo bird (known locally as Kafal Pakyo ) tweets continuously. Sushmadevi, a mother of two sons whose husband is abroad, directs her sons to take their cow for fertilization. As the boys bring back the cow, worshiped as a mother and giver, they are faced with a new realization.

title: #Revolución

This group was led by the father of Vicky, he was responsible for carrying out protests and the most unsuccessful and more little sense of the city manifestations, was a group of young people gathered to take foreign sodas, smoking cigar, read Mao Zedong, the Che and all revolutionary names they could find (though they did not know what he really meant). Hernán and Leonardo, who are targeted letters Vicky, are the only members alive who belonged to the D.O.C.K.S., however, has been a long time since we were united and the group was only an adventure of youth. Hernán a thin, anxious and fearful man, now has a family, college professor and leads a boring life burdened by the mandates of his wife, Leonardo a little awkward and clumsy became the caretaker of a geriatric institute prisoner of the little emotion this work demands They have more than 40 years, under the delusion of Vicky, decide to attend the alleged meeting, arriving there in a proper cellar as a den of flaming most revolutionary ideology does not know that follow, the girl's attempts to convince that should revive the group of his father and give a final act, a final blow that immortalize the city. The reason for the strike is the resistance to the construction by Mariano Purasangre, a racetrack where is established the sacred place where they met over the years D.O.C.K.S. Under different pressures and taking the argument already have many 'likes' and followers on networks, by ignorance of Hernán and Leo in this topic, Leo accepts decided and he and Vicky fail to convince the last member but fearful that his wife aware of his adventures. The next day led by Vicky begin training in which little by little they are committing to the cause, increase likes, Hernán and Leo are increasingly more excited, the wife knows nothing of the first and second work is in background, things seem to be going well, are uniformed, have returned to their adventures, have become the D.O.C.K.S.! Finally comes the day of the plan, Vicky explains, at time of writing things start to go wrong, Hernán is locked in the house by his wife, Leo had to get into trouble getting to the point where it becomes useful, despite this, and the plan made a little different, just a little, very little (a lot actually) arrive at the desired site, the site of the last stroke, which ... are tied to the fence, this and already? yeah, Hernán and Leo brave and determined, although a little confused (So much training for that?) become one with the entrance gate of the square. Hours pass, Vicky has gone to eat, Hernán and Leo still tied, begin conflicts, hunger, the cries, the anguish, where are the likes? construction crews arrive, and panic increases, Vicky is not there, maybe it was not a good idea to revive the group.

title: BLEU BERLINE
synopsis:
Sitting at the wheel of a classic car that once belonged to his father, a young man in search of his own identity reaches back into the past to understand more about his family's history.
As he delves into his late mother's diary, a stream of pictures emerges to bolster what he remembers and also to lay bare family secrets buried with the death of his parents. 
His search leads him to discover the spell his father exercised over his mother, their passionate romance and what led to their break-up.
By putting a meaning on a jumble of pictures and words from a past life now available to him, will he be able to make sense of his own life?

In the way of your own ...

title: Gogo Boy
synopsis: Inspired by the short story "Twenty Cigarettes", the story presents moral issues in society today. The nature of a man dependent on sex and cigarette addictions, and that undergoes any type of situation to keep your real life and your outer world is told through the consumption of a cigarette portfolio.

title: УЧИТЕЛЬ
synopsis: Повседневной двух садоводов, приезжающих на работу в городской парк. Только один "проклятый" клумба создает много проблем для них-каждый день герои очистить его от мусора и посадить новые цветы на место сломанного. Но к следующему утру, клумба портится снова. Наконец, терпение молодого садовника, лопается и он начинает воспитании слов некультурных посетителей. Дядя Миша смеется над напарницей, но не верит в его успех. Кажется, проще его почистить клумбе, чем донести до прохожих. Молодой садовник корректируется решительно - если вандалы не понимают с первого раза, они будут объяснять еще раз. Посетители либо не обращать внимания на его увещевания и стал грубить в ответ. Герой в отчаянии обращается к небесам. Прямо там, в парке есть замечательные изменения - люди бросают мусор только в урны. Идеальная картинка, идеальный парк с идеальными гражданами! Но идиллия быстро заканчивается - прибыл пустая банка пива падает на голову молодой садовник и возвращает его к реальности. Что банка пива пришел из компании пьяных парней за кустов. Молодой садовник пытается увещевать этой шумной компании. Хулиганы начала угрожающе подход на героев. Следующее утро два абсолютно счастливых садоводов в ушибы и ссадины смотреть на абсолютно весь «проклятый кровать". Это настоящее чудо! Наконец-то она сбылась! Однако, в воспоминаниях, мы узнаем, что дядя Миша был создатель этого "чуда". Он хотел спасти молодого друга от разочарования в людях и восстановил испорченную кровать ночью.

title: Espagnol niveau 1
synopsis: Victor, a young Belgian-Uruguayan, returns to Belgium after finishing his secondary education in Uruguay. He wishes to enroll in the Academy of Fine Arts, but registration is six months away. In the meantime he is forced to study anything in order to be eligible for welfare and he will have no other choice but to sign up for a Spanish Level 1 course for which he has to pretend he does not know a single word of Spanish, his mother tongue. While there, he falls in love with Manon. Will he be able to maintain his lie?

title: MatreM
synopsis:
Ida is a disturbed woman. The lost of her family has made her ill to the point of losing the sense of the reality. She waits every day, unsuccessfully, the arrival of her husband at eleven.

 One night, after another disappointment she finds 10  years old Abel on the street. As she notes  he's homeless, offers him lodging and meals at her place.

Everything seems normal at the beginning, but Ida will soon initiate a profound journey to madness. She will try to keep the child by force making  use of torture, in order to replace her dead son, Arturito.

Abel will try to scape the bizarre situation, however, the only exit he will find, is death.

title: DUST - La vita che vorrei
synopsis:
DUST is the adventure of eight physically and mentally disabled persons who have been living in the Cottolengo Institute of Turin for over fifty years. This is neither a script nor an attempt to tell their discomfort.Through a creative artistic path revolving around theatre, these characters in search of an author stage themselves and the life that they would like to lead. This study resulted in a theatrical trilogy precisely entitled Polvere (Dust.)

“I regard this small group of actors as survivors. Survivors of an old age, who perform the play of life, – the desired life instead of the real one – through the theatre. And then they look like the heroes of this dream, a Ulysses in love with his Penelope, a minnesinger disguised as a sailor peering at other places, other races and other feelings with his binoculars, a buffoon dressed as the Pink Panther mocking an entire Parliament which focuses on the eternal battle on the cry of “Vote for me!”, a dumb actor who has fun with silent movies playing the part of Charlot and a Snow White, who does not know her age and is secretly in love with the seven dwarfs.”

title: Dins La Fosca
synopsis:
Frederic lives in his own skin the metaphor of the phoenix, which is embodied in this fantastic story set in rural Catalonia in the late nineteenth century, when people still maintained all connections with their earthly origins. There was a time where people were moved by a very powerful beliefs and fears. And when someone goes into these fears, theres only one path to find: the darkness.
"Inside the Dark" is a fable about life, death and resurrection, a narrative full of fantastic elements of the collective imagination to exemplify the constant struggle of every person to follow through on our way despite the ravages of life.

title: Not in Italy
synopsis:
Italy is, among the EU co-founding countries, the only one still without any regulation on civil unions and gay marriage. 
A group of friends, an extended family, follows Corrado and Lubos till New York, where they will fulfil their love dream. 
On their way back, they will tell their story in a way that is both moving and funny at the same time. 
Corrado and Lubos’s story begins, as with many gay couples, through the internet, where they cautiously lived the distance that separated them as a secure space. 
Getting to know each other, their love grew, and Lubos moved to Corrado’s town and began living with him. After a few years the big question: ”Do you want to marry me?”. It is said that it was all smartly planned. 
Unfortunately, Italy does not allow it, and one must go abroad: the United States, New York. Their friends and family, which witnessed the birth and growth of this love, leave with them, willing to be present at the crowning of this love. 
They await the big day as any couple would, between preparations and beauty masks. A cheerful party crosses the Brooklyn bridge to reach the marriage officiant with a deep baritone voice in front of whom the couple promises love and reciprocal support. 
New York grants them the right to be themselves. 
And then there’s Victoria’s Secret….

title: Springtij
synopsis:
Today Helene is a feisty, elderly woman of 67. Her husband and herself have a good health, a good social life and no financial worries. Nevertheless she is overwhelmed with a feeling of emptiness.  
Today is the day her  only son was killed in an accident some years ago.  Ever since Helene and her husband began to grew apart. Maurice was starting to live more and more in his own world. All emotions concerning their loss were banned from their lives. Today more than ever she feels trapped in the relationship.  The usual  chat with the girlfriends doesn’t help either; the conversations are shallow and are just irritating her. These things are merely reminders of the fact that she will never have grandchildren.  She works it off on the people surrounding her.
By coincidence she stumbles on Arne, not yet in his twenties and aimlessly wondering around. His mother is overwhelmed with her own personal worries  and  he rather avoids his friends today.
Helene tends to help him, take him under her wings. The boy gives her an opportunity to fill her emptiness. They hang out together and spend a night at the sea. The emptiness and a  longing for tenderness are things that they share and brings them together. That one night brings them  for a short moment very close. Helene cherishes the thought that Arne could maybe be her grandchild she never had. Arne enjoys the comforting attention he is lacking so much. 
Only when they return home, it becomes clear how much of a change one night can bring forth. Just enough to keep on going and maybe look at a different way to their loved ones.

title: KALEIDOSCOPE
synopsis:
Tireless flaneur Telemach Wiesinger extends his repertoire of cinematic travelogues with another poetic collage of interconnected spaces and places gathered on numerous journeys across Europe and North America. Shot, as always, on 16mm, Wiesinger’s images have a singular feel that emerges from a confident mastery of materials and a precise sense of timing. The panoply of in-camera effects transforms he outside world into a wondrous and frequently otherworldly spectacle that hovers between realism and surrealism.

Forms of travel and sites of passing trough are a constant feature, as are the steel structures and moving bridges that frequently appear in Wiesinger’s oeuvre and allow him to weave complex formal arrangements within the frame. The filmmaker engages in a playful exchange with the spectator, creating anticipation and surprise in equal measure. This is brought about particularly through the musical soundscape , the result of a close collaboration with composer and audio engineer Alexander Grebtschenko . A varied combination of contemporary pieces of music – from Adrian Belew, Hayden Chisholm, Laurent de Wilde / Otisto 23, Andreas Gogol, Jojo Mayer, Gert-Jan Prins, Tobias Schwab and Gregory Taylor – rises and falls with a kaleidoscopic choreography of images.

Dr. Kim Knowles (curator Edinburgh International Film Festival & Professor University of Wales)
director_awards: With Andreas GOGOL he received the TEAM-WORK-AWARD 2007  for the film and music live performance  LANDED TAKES & SOUND TIMES  at Filmwinter, Int. Festival for Expanded Media Stuttgart.  BEST CAMERA AWARD for MOTOR XXXVI Semana Cortometraje San Roque 2014

title: Chaver

Two boys are trained in martial art for a suicidal mission to avenge their country by killing the enemy king in an open challenge. Things change when one of them starts asking questions.

title: Wut
synopsis: Wut is a courageous rottweiler trained to obey his master’s orders. What Wut does not know is that his master is one of the Nazi soldiers assigned to occupied France during World War II.

title: Ocupado

title: Кактус
synopsis:
Семья празднует день рождения маленького Максима. 
На празднике появляется нежданный гость, которого все пытаются выпроводить 
"пока ничего не случилось". 
Неизвестный знакомится с Максимкой и дарит ему кактус. 
Встреча с этим человеком запомнится мальчику на всю жизнь.

title: Número 2: Si yo fuera Marylin
synopsis: Clari is going out tonight and she's on a mission: Her girlfriend is about to stand up a guy she met on the internet and Clari has every intention to hook up with him. They'll spend the night together and he'll want to see her again, he could very well be the man of her dreams and the envy of her friends. Too good to be true and for Clari not to spoil it.

title: Raconte-moi ... Le Petit Prince
title_en: Tell me the story of ... The Little Prince
synopsis:
« Draw me a sheep ! » Between dream and reality, the silhouette of a child appears suddenly from the sky. This Little Prince, lost in a world not his own, becomes for a short while the only companion of the aviator.

“Tell me the story of … The Little Prince“, a mini series in three chapters, where diverse audiovisual styles are employed, offering a unique reading of the famous tale by Saint-Exupéry.

title: El trajecito

title: La talega

title: Uno menos

title: Одержимость
synopsis: Молодая пара в поисках экстремального отдыха решает провести уикэнд на необитаемом острове, в результате ряда поворотов  сюжета, молодожёны узнают друг друга с неожиданных сторон. Им придётся заново пересмотреть свои отношения,  скорректировать жизненные ценности, духовно переродиться... Как Вы уже догадываетесь, остров оказался не таким уж необитаемым...
director: Аникин Алексей Алексеевич, Нестерова Ольга Юрьевна
other_credits: В ролях (исполнитель и роль):  Aлена Спивак, Сергей Змичеревский, Эльдар Лебедев

title: Stövlarna
synopsis: A film about awkward situations, grief and a pair of boots.

title: Nice Song
synopsis: 2015, any given evening in a lovely corner of Spain. A song talks to us about how wonderful life is. Nevertheless, that idyllic view changes as we look at the reality with the eyes of the artist who is singing…

title: Nadie
synopsis: A date in a cafe. Or two. Or three. Of course the girl did not want be alone. And in the 21st century everything seems easier. Or not...

title: Érase una vez.
synopsis: Javi, a 7 year old boy, visits his local Toy store in search of a modern gun shot but the last one has been sold. The owner offers him an old Super 8 mm projector  and a handfull of movies as a temporary comfort. Among the reels Javi discovers and intriguing spaghetti western that may set up his love for cinema.

title: Жить после...
synopsis: Изо дня в день человек существует в одних и тех же декорациях, обстоятельствах, отношениях. Так проходит почти вся его жизнь. Глобальные процессы и явления звучат в его жизни как фон, как старое радио на кухне. Разные радиостанции, разное время...

title: Raconte-moi ... Le Petit Prince
title_en: Tell me the story of ... The Little Prince
synopsis:
« Draw me a sheep ! » Between dream and reality, appears suddenly the silhouette of a child, as if he came from the sky. This Little Prince, lost in a foreign world, becomes for a while the unique companion of the aviator.
 
“Tell me the story of … The Little Prince“, a small series in three chapters, where several audiovisual processes are deployed, offering a new reading of the famous tale by Saint-Exupéry.

title: Journey
synopsis: The man in the boat fights with storm. Reaches the desert coast. He finds body kneeling before the monument, continues his journey through the mountains and plains. When he reaches the forest he finds pyramid. At the top of it he finds his purpose, the monument of his destiny.
film_awards: Grand Prix for Best Animation at 6. Festiwal Krytyków Sztuki Filmowej "Kamera Akcja" in Łódź
director_awards: Grand Prix for Best Animation at 6. Festiwal Krytyków Sztuki Filmowej "Kamera Akcja" in Łódź
other_credits: Sound effects: Oliwia Sadowska

title: Линч
synopsis: Андрей, житель маленькой квартиры в пятиэтажке, после загадочного звонка начинает терять связь с реальностью. Пытаясь вернуть жизнь в привычное русло, он начинает поиск ответов.

title: TRES
synopsis:
Aurora, a 23-year-old woman rescues Camilo (a man of about 32 years) from the river coast. He has a head injury and doesn´t remember who he is or where does he come from. Adelina, 27 years old, looks suspiciously how her sister takes care of the rescued man.
The sisters have managed to survive alone in the absence of their parents on the island were they were born. The arrival of this interloper pierces the daily grind of the two.
Aurora sees her sexual arousal in Camilo, the male figure that until now was unknown.
Adelina looks how her sister slips away from her hands. But the two share a secret. A secret that binds them in fire and blood. They know the story of Camilo.

title: Яма
synopsis: В Болгарии есть традиция сообщать об уходе человека из жизни с помощью специального объявления. Обычно его вывешивают в каком-нибудь публичном месте - на остановке, на заборе или входной двери дома. Такой листок называют болгарским уличным некрологом.  амера оказывается в болгарской деревне и проводит один день с семьей, переживающей траур.
other_credits: Ярослава Кирюхина переводчик

title: Paftuar  (Uninvited )
synopsis:
During the political turmoil of Albania in the 1990's many escaped to Greece to only find they fell into a darker hell with no way out but to die. A story of two men trying to find something and somewhere safe only to find insanity and death.

Alex – With no future Alex looks to the near by border with Greece as a way to wealth and success that he can not find in Albania. A place of hope, an old flame and new dreams of success just a few miles away. 

Sgt. Palacos – A passionate Greek patriot who feels the immigrant wave into Greece of new Albanians as a new threat to his idea of Greece. Is internal process of dealing with the problem is to promote ritual abuse of the men he holds prisoner. 

Petros – A young Greek Soldier that doesn't feel connected to the harsh reality of unspoken policy
about Albanian immigrants.
 
Vasilio – An Albanian trying to reinvent himself in Greece. He will do what ever he can do to be a Greek.

title: Земляк
synopsis: Трогательный портрет Франсуа Дембеле, темнокожего уроженца Мали, с детства мечтавшего жить в Советском Союзе. Золотая медаль в школе, экзамены по русскому языку — и мечта сбылась. Теперь Франсуа — гражданин России. Биолог-физиолог по образованию, утром он водит трамвай, а вечером выходит в эфир иркутского телеканала с прогнозом погоды.

title: Доктор
synopsis:
Первая Чеченская война. Мирные жители покидают город. Михаил, врач-хирург, один из немногих русских оставшихся в Грозном. Друг Михаила, чеченец, пытается убедить его уехать к семье. Жена и дочь доктора, покинули город после начала войны. Михаил соглашается.  Но ночью в его дом вламываются боевики с раненым. А рано утром подъезжает уазик с федералами. 
Фильм основан на реальных событиях.

title: Esquizofrenia
synopsis: A man who is sitting on a bench is disturbed by some flies.  Later, he is annoyed by a series of background noises who make him loose his mind.

title: Boomerang
synopsis: A cleaning man finds somebody's wallet full of money. Now he needs to decide - to take money and to go against his conscience or to return the wallet to it's owner...

title: ¿Qué mierda es esta?
synopsis:
She is a dangerous criminal who has committed a horrible crime. Why he does it?

That's what counts in this interrogation after interrogation. His life was very complicated and ... this is the story of his life.

title: Pelos Olhos do Besouro
title_en: Through the Eyes of the Beetle
synopsis:
Elisa & Jim, a beautiful young wild couple, enjoy the absence of Elisa’s parents to have a decadent time in the family's luxurious mansion. Intense and fragile, their relationship is threatened by the presence of a mysterious flying drone constantly watching them. They decide to steal the family jewels and run away to the Green Coast of Rio de Janeiro.

The spy, Julia, a 12 year old girl with sad eyes, is wrapped in a world of solitude. She hears the sound of children playing by her window and she dreams of going to the beach with her absentee father.

Fascinated by the limitless freedom of the irreverent couple, she plans her own kidnapping, in order to escape with them.

title: Enemies
synopsis: Irina's neighbor accidentally kills her dog. Now she has to find someone to help her burry it, and her new mortal enemy is the only one available.

title: Armat Jakawinaka - Vidas Ausentes
synopsis: Rose is a Bolivian immigrant who works at a sewing workshop in São Paulo. When faced with an unwanted pregnancy, she realizes she can not keep living in Brazil and decides to abort the baby.

title: Монтулетти против!
synopsis: Любовь победит

title: Преступление
synopsis: Произошло преступление, и время остановилось. Чтобы продолжить путь, преступник должен нести свой кровавый груз.
other_credits: Василиса Попова, Куандык Туруспеков, Дмитрий Голубов, Сергей Лагодин.

title: TRADICIÓN FAMILIAR
synopsis: Jaime a parent makes a peculiar feast for his wife and daughter , which consists of human flesh , a tradition that for generations has been part of his family, but this breaks down when his daughter Sarah decides to put an end to this tradition by time to change the life of his father by an unknown tied up in a basement, which was part of this cannibal menu.

title: Семья Offline
synopsis: Безобидная поездка на природу с ребенком  может обернуться трагедией. Во время того как с ребенком происходят неожиданные ситуации, родители обсуждают разность подходов к воспитанию ребенка. В фильме сталкиваются философии воспитания родителей, у отца мальчика способ воспитания, предоставить ребенка самому себе, а желание матери обезопасить сына от всех опасностей. Но, оба подхода лишены искренности и любви. Родители вместо того, что бы просто любить ребенка, пытаются неумело играть роль родителей, но нельзя скрыть фальшивую любовь, а по факту ребенок предоставлен самому себе.

title: Ни-ко-МУ
synopsis: Одна мечтательная корова близко подружилась с щавелем. Однако их любовь была невозможна - слишком много преград и препятствий оказалось на их пути.

title: Консьерж
synopsis: Недовольный поведением консьержа, жилец многоквартирного дома приходит на приём в ЖЭС. Оказывается, вопрос выбора консьержа решается голосованием жильцов. Но выбрать другого консьержа им что-то мешает.
director_awards: За отвагу под Ватерлоо
other_credits: Ян Лосенков, Андрей Мельников, Людмила Мортикова, Ольга Пранович, Марина Чучман, Лиза Красикова

title: Pulsión
synopsis: Alejandra is a socially committed journalist that works for one of the most important newspapers of dominant ideas in the country. But her values and vision of the world become a threat as the ideological differences between her and her editor become irreconcilable and her stories begin to be censured. When a dismissal becomes imminent, Alejandra finds in an impulsive act a form of liberation.

title: Bob
synopsis: Bob is an artist in great demand. Despite this, he often feels misunderstood, as an air of  gloom surrounds the unveiling of his art, and the funeral procession is never too far behind. An attempt at a filmic portrait..

title: Casi Héroes
synopsis: After years hiding it, the popular spanish actress and singer Gisela talks in front of a camera to let people know her secret: She has a superpower

title: Inferno
synopsis:
The apocalypse comes closer and closer; it gets louder and louder and Erik is
forced to face up to his very personal inferno.

title: The House in the Envelope
synopsis:
One year after the death of Leyla’s father, she decides to visit her family in Istanbul, asking the same
questions as her father did 30 years before. But her grandmother refuses to talk about family problems and her grandfather is not at home. A talkative taxi driver helps her not just to find the grandfather, but also shares a quiet moment with her.

title: L'ambre et la lumière
synopsis: Franck’s wife has just left him. His daughter is spending a few days at his parents’ house while he is trying to sort things out. He is starting to feel lonely in his small flat. He is convinced that Sarah will come back, it’s just a question of waiting. But all the while he’s tormented by memories of how things used to be, like the day he gave her a beautiful amber ring that she so cherished...

title: Avant le repas
synopsis: They speak a lot about Vietnam, but the past seems so far away. However, this weekend again, they all meet at Hoang's, as to pretend to still be welded. But today, Hoang makes an announcement : he is going to leave France.

title: Двулапый друг
synopsis:
Никто не знает как рыжая собака по кличке "Лойд" потеряла две лапы: переднюю и заднюю. Возможно, он попал под поезд или стал жертвой живодёра. Спустя неделю Лойда заметили на окраине Минска (Беларусь) и сообщили зоозащитникам. Во время тяжёлой четырёхчасовой операции ему удалили остатки раздробленных лап и хвоста.
Я следил за судьбой Лойда в течение полугода после аварии и был свидетелем происходящего с ним: длительная терапия, сбор средств на продукты питания и медикаменты, переезды от одних хозяев к другим, мужество добровольцев и столкновение с жестокой реакцией общества.
В Беларуси нет государственных программ по поиску новых хозяев для выброшенных животных, нет и программ по контролю за численностью популяций. Волонтёры дают единственный шанс на спасение раненым или бездомных домашним животным. В областных городах животных убивают прямо на улицах муниципальные службы, в лучшем случае - несколько дней спустя в государственных санитарных станциях. За жестокое обращение с животными в Беларуси предусмотрена только административная ответственность.
film_awards:
Piter Foto Festival 2015 - 1st place (Russia)
International Photofestival PHOTOVISA 2014 - 2nd place (Russia)
director_awards:
"Belarus Press Photo" 2015 contest, Grand-Prix (Belarus)
"Vilnius Photo Circle" 2014, international photo festival, finalist in section for young photographers (Lithuania)

title: Чёрное солнце
synopsis: Фрагменты повседневной жизни молодого человека по имени Манас. В отличие от героя одноименного эпоса Манас живет малоинтересной жизнью, наполненной лишь жарой, проблемами с ментальным здоровьем и непониманием окружающего мира.
director_awards: Нет
other_credits: Звукорежиссер - Татьяна Булычева.

title: ПАРОХОД "ДОСТОЕВСКИЙ" … А напоследок я скажу…
synopsis: Колёсный пароход «Достоевский» поведает историю своей «жизни» от первого лица. Он ходил по рекам, был дoмом отдыха, и даже снялся в фильме "Жестокий романс". Брошенный на берегу, разломанный и разграбленный ржавый  корпус – вот всё, что осталось от красавца-парохода.
film_awards:
Приз в номинации короткометражное кино  кинофестиваля Святой Владимир (Россия) 2015
Специальная награда на 9-м международном фестивале  документальных фильмов Jahorina Film Festival (Босния и Герцеговина) 2015
director_awards: Диплом кинофестиваля "Меридиан надежды" (Россия) 2015

title: Langue de bois
synopsis: A big boss is recording a video to reassure his employees about the future of the company when a stubborn cough makes the performance difficult.

title: Tv de Cachorro
synopsis: After losing his family in an accident José Francisco went mad and went to live on the streets. His life changes suddenly when he finds an object that will place him in front of different possibilities in the future.

title: Ama
synopsis:
1950-е: Американка посещает деревушку на 
побережье Японии вместе со своим мужем-военным и группой друзей. Оторвавшись от группы,
она встречает Намико, молодую ныряльщицу, которых по-традиции называют ама.
director: Emilie Almaida,  Liang Huang,  Mansoureh Kamari,  Julie Robert, Juliette Peuportier, Tony Unser

title: Vila i frid
synopsis: Five kids gather to honor a recently departed friend. Each one of them have memories to share, but only of them dare to tell the truth.

title: "Последний пункт"
synopsis:
История о том, как встреча с таинственным Незнакомцем перевернула жизнь самого обычного человека. Кто этот загадочный человек, который пункт за пунктом задает свои каверзные вопросы? Можно ли уйти от ответов?
Все ли он решает? И от кого зависит судьба нашего героя?
 
Пытаясь разгадать жизненную головоломку, Сергей – мужчина средних лет,  отвечает на вопросы Незнакомца, шаг за шагом приближаясь к трагической развязке.
film_awards:
- Конкурс Международного детского кинофестиваля «Алые Паруса» в «Артеке» - получен приз «Самое доброе кино»
- Конкурс XII Международного благотворительного кинофестиваля "Лучезарный ангел" – получен приз в номинации “Лучшее игровое короткометражное кино”
director_awards:
Победитель фестиваля социальной рекламы «Остров МИР» при государственной поддержке Президента РФ, в номинации «Сохранение культурного наследия» - 3-место за фильм «Рукописи не горят». 

Участвовала в конкурсе Арткино 2013 года на лучшую экранизацию эпизода пьесы «Варшавская мелодия» Л.Зорина. Фильм «Справка об освобождении» занял 2-е место и был показан на премьере в кинотеатре «Мир кино» и на финальном показе в кинотеатре «Звезда».

Победитель кинофестиваля  Кшиштофа Занусси (ВКСР) в марте 2014 года -  приз зрительских симпатий и особое упоминание жюри  за однокадровый фильм «Шуба».

Победитель  XII Международного благотворительного кинофестиваля "Лучезарный ангел" – получен приз в номинации “Лучшее игровое короткометражное кино” (фильм «Последний пункт») - ноябрь 2015
other_credits:
Исполнительные продюсеры: Дмитрий Добужинский, Людмила Полунина
Линейные продюсеры: Анна Агина, Ольга Максимова
Художник-постановщик: Антон Поликарпов
Актеры: Андрей Мерзликин, Борис Щербаков, Владимир Грамматиков, Илья Барбарицкий, Анастасия Панина, Александр Шувалов

title: Ícaro
synopsis: Icarus addresses a young boy’s concerns of growing up: His fear of the dark, evidenced in his inability to simply go to the bathroom at night; Bullying, showcased by the rejection at school from his classmates; and a complicated relationship with his stern father, who tends to neglect and ignore him.  ICARUS portrays how the simplest things can leave a scar for the rest of your life

title: Golconda
synopsis:
The clock always strikes two times
The first time it strikes; the second time it strikes, too.

title: PASAPALABRA
synopsis:
Ahmed is an islamic kid of ten years old who came to live in Europe with his family.
His difficulty start when he discover that his classmates are making jokes about his culture.
The teacher try to explain to the students that racism is not the solution, but finally when the lesson is finish and the boys are playing a game, they don‘t stop to have prejudice against Ahmed.

title: Phantasms of the Living
synopsis: During an afternoon at the swimming pool, a young girl will live her first flirtation. An unexpected sharing of senses that will forever remain etched on her lips.

title: Quiero saber por qué me dejaste
title_en: I’d like to know why you dumped me
synopsis: Matias and Luciana are boyfriends and they have a solid relationship; or at least that’s what Matias believes. Everything falls apart when Luciana, without any explanation, decides to break up with him. After the brake up, Matias enters in a circle of assumptions and guesses about why did she dumped him. Everything will change after the unusual, but revealing theory that gives his good friend Julian, who defines himself as an expert and amateur philosopher of human relationships.

title: Anatomic
synopsis: Anatomic – A continuous journey into the human machine
other_credits: Animation: Henning M. Lederer

title: La última cena
synopsis:
A tramp walks the streets looking for food, with no success. It's the middle of the night and he is as hopeless as his curses God.
Some tipsy girls try to go back home after a party, while a couple watches the night go by.
The tramp, defeated by alcohol, lives through a divine intervention which seems to answer his prayers, when three versions of the same story come together.

title: Este tipo se ha muerto y no se ha enterado
title_en: This Guy Has Died and Has Not Even Noticed
synopsis: While waiting for a taxi on the street, two guys suddenly see a man floating and they will try to convince him that his capacity to float is the result of a tragic event.

title: Die Verwandlung
synopsis: One casual morning, the daily life of Gregor Samsa takes a strange turn when he is transformed into a gigantic bug and he is forced to endure the disparaging attitude of his family and society towards him. 'The Metamorphosis' by Pencho is a movie, which adheres rigidly to the original novella and equally powerfully shows us how a sudden change is perceived as a monstrous metamorphosis - a story with both literal and allegorical interpretation.

title: Amor de purpurina
synopsis: A party, a room, boy meets girl. But wait a second... Something's wrong.

title: Espera
synopsis: Regina Bastos live on a desert island in southern Brazil. Her life has become quiet and lonely since the departure of her great love Beto Bruel. For over twenty years Regina will the beach every afternoon looking at sea waiting for him to bring her love back.

title: Червоний м'яч
synopsis: Каждое утро уборщик подметает площадь Рынок в центре города Львов и больше, казалось бы, ни о чем не мечтает. Так  обыденно и однообразно проходит его жизнь. Но однажды на площади появляется странный красный мяч.

title_en: It`s all the fault of Brie

title: Brenda
synopsis: An Irish story about tragic final day of a young mother addicted to heroin, seen through the idealistic eyes of her eight year old daughter. Brenda idolises her Mammy and would do anything to protect her. For Brenda, the biggest threat to her mother's well-being is her violent, unpredictable Daddy. Consumed by addiction, Daddy is loud, aggressive and has lost his way in life. But Daddy wasn't always like that. Brenda misses the day's they would spend together and do something fun. Instead, she spends her day's hoping he won't beat up Mammy. But now Brenda wishes her Mammy had a new boyfriend so then Daddy wouldn't hurt her anymore. But until that day, Brenda will literally do anything to protect her Mammy and that includes lying to her father. Mammy has been on a methadone treatment program the past four y ears. Not long after beginning the program she separated from Daddy as their relationship deteriorated. Fast forward three years and life is tough for Mammy, especially with no support in her life. Every time she gets close to a new partner, Daddy ends up scaring him away. Daddy introduced Mammy to heroin when they were teenagers. Even after the birth of Brenda they continued to use. Daddy has been clean ever since he went on the methadone programme. He didn't want to separate from Mammy but knew it was the right decision. But Daddy has been hearing rumours that Mammy is mixing with the wrong crowd again. He has a feeling she not taking her methadone and is back on heroin. Daddy would love nothing better than to have custody of Brenda. He knows he needs to catch Mammy in the act. Brenda shows the disastrous effects of a family torn apart from drug addiction.

title: Anywhere
synopsis: TWO people go out jogging: SHE does it on a regular basis as a hobby; HE does it for other reasons. Everything happens in a normal day, in broad daylight, in a place that could be anywhere. A coincidence makes them engage in a brief conversation that will change the course of things... before everybody else’s eyes.

title: Promise Me
synopsis: Four-time Best Screenplay winner, Promise Me paints a touching, intimate portrait of one dying woman’s final day on Earth and her plight to right the wrongs of her past while attempting to convince her recently reconciled son not to follow in her footsteps. It broaches the topic of Death with Dignity in an environment where the practice is not legal, but shows the reality of a situation that happens in America on a daily basis.

title: Не забывайте о Мори
synopsis: Истории смерти по имени Мори, решившей найти свое место в жизни.

title: Los Gedelovskys
synopsis: A home recordings illustrate my family history, which it's nothing more than an amount of rubbish I never thought launch out. The family as a cell, members of the "unity" as characters through the word contour descriptions.

title: I've just had a dream
synopsis: Irene is eight years old and she just had a nightmare. In the dream she becomes a girl of another race, with a very difficult reality, full of responsibilities and problems. Is it just a dream?

title: Vibrime në Mesnatë
synopsis: Thinking his wife is dead he calls best friend to help. Panicking he mistakes a number and calls a wrong guy.This will be enough to involve in unthinkable trouble two more couples, police and a prosecutor. Jealousy, friendship, fight and infidelity - all in one night, caused of a misunderstanding.

title: Isis
synopsis: Life on Earth is extinct. Aided by an artificial intelligence, the only survivors, a man and a woman, must fight against madness, guilt and loneliness inside a spaceship so the human race can continue existing.

title: 보통날
synopsis: On an ordinary day, not different from just another normal day, Sang jeon prepares dinner...

title: Licor de Avellana
synopsis: Pure doubts knowing the path, I must switch myself off to start shining again; I must make a date with my friend sadness for a romantic evening where we’ll share common vices. Her sex tastes of Hazelnut Liqueur.

title: Huésped
synopsis: A young guy came to the city looking for a job. Day after day he can't find an opportunity. But somenthing is growning inside of him. Something that lives of him: a new way of living, a tepeworm.

title: Łańcuchy Pokarmowe Terenów Zalesionych
title_en: Food Chain Complexity in Afforested Grounds
synopsis:
Shady interests, scores, revenge – away from the hustle and bustle of the city you will find its brutal finale in the quiet heart of a pine forest. Each of the heroes of this bloody confrontation soon discovers his place in the food chain.

Filmg85, Dusty Roads, Studio Studnia in co-production with Jarosław and Maria Gajewski, Studio Ted and Izabela Gwizdak present Sławomir Orzechowski, Jacek Beler, Antoni Królikowski and Sebastian Konrad in Maciej Gajewski's movie "Food Chain Complexity in Afforested Grounds" based on the comic book by Bartosz Sztybor and Karol Barski.

title: Maika mi calling
synopsis: The faiths of two brothers, incapable of talking about the problems in their family, their drunkard father unhappy of the choices he's made in his life, a drug dealer with an atrophied sense of truth and a taxi driver, fighting for the remains of his humanity are connected in one night in the city of Sofia, Bulgaria.

title: En Nombre del Canguro
synopsis: Laura and Carmen were traveling in a bus on Christmas Eve, heading towards home. It’s Laura’s ninth birthday, and she anxiously questions her mother about both gifts that are owed to her and she expects to receive. The denied fantasy of the Christmas wishes of a young girl come to light in the eyes of her mother, and the explanations about the origin of love radically change author. It’s in the name of kangaroo that each one learns how to jump by itself.

title: "Последний пункт"
synopsis:
История о том, как встреча с таинственным Незнакомцем перевернула жизнь самого обычного человека. Кто этот загадочный человек, который пункт за пунктом задает свои каверзные вопросы? Можно ли уйти от ответов?
Все ли он решает? И от кого зависит судьба нашего героя?
 
Пытаясь разгадать жизненную головоломку, Сергей – мужчина средних лет,  отвечает на вопросы Незнакомца, шаг за шагом приближаясь к трагической развязке.

title: Ёлка
synopsis:
Фильм «Ёлка» - про отношения современных молодых людей к памяти о Великой Отечественной Войне.

Предновогодний вечер. Влюбленная пара наряжает елку. Мысли самые романтические. Но неожиданно прошлое врывается в их жизнь через старую военную фотографию, выпавшую с антресолей. Героиня читает стихотворение, написанное на фотографии, и молодые люди постепенно погружаются в такой же предновогодний день, но только военный (во время Великой Отечественной Войны). Герой пугается своих чувств и пытается вернуть новогоднее настроение - он включает телевизор. Но и тут ему не удается убежать от военной темы - в новостях рассказывают про осквернение памятников ВОВ.  Герой благодарит героиню за память о войне. И они вместе находят место фотографии из прошлого в своем современном доме (жизни).

title: В поисках друга
synopsis:
"Ты не знаешь, на что способен твой пёс!" 
Весёлая комедия для детей и взрослых. Это история об отважной собаке, не смирившейся с тем, что её маленькую хозяйку увезла машина с красным крестом. Собака отправляется на поиски своего друга! Какие приключения ждут пса? Сможет ли он найти свою маленькую хозяйку?
Сценарий к фильму "В поисках друга" был написан маленькими пациентами РДКБ, страдающими первичным иммунодефицитом. Дети работали над созданием фильм как полноценные члены съёмочной группы, бок о бок с профессионалами

title: Лучшие рекламные ролики 2374
synopsis:
А какой противогаз выберешь ты? Розовый или со стразами?
Чем будешь чистить свой генератор воздуха? В какой неведомый виртуальный мир прошлого ты отправишься? Может быть, в зелёный лес? Или на берег чистого озера?
Три ролика - три пародии на коммерческую рекламу продуктов повседневного спроса  из нашего будущего. Будущего, которое нас ждёт, если мы не будем беречь природу. Реклама из 2374 года.
Фильм снят с детьми в рамках учебной программы «Зелёная Киношкола»

synopsis: Eight-year-old Elisa lives alone with her mother Jeanne, in a small isolated village of the French Alps. title: Опустынивание
synopsis: Фильм-очерк «Опустынивание»  - это проба рассказать и показать быт людей, жизнь которых ещё совсем недавно кипела и бурлила.  Герои фильма есть воплощение самой деревни. Она родилась вместе с ними, вместе с ними росла и развивалась, прошла все этапы от школы до замужества и рождения детей, а потом внуков и правнуков. Возможно, они пытались порвать эти отношения, но у них ничего не вышло, кроме как состариться вместе и наблюдать закат эпохи. Когда уйдут они, канет в Лету и она.

synopsis: Короткий документальный ролик из цикла "Голос Горда", который является прологом, в серии фильмов, посвященным поиску героя настоящего времени и места. Нетрадиционный взгляд на беларуские реалии, полностью отвлеченный от политических и исторических тем, которые так часто используют в качестве идентификации беларусов. title: I Camminatori. Resoconto audiovisivo per isole erranti
synopsis:
Halfway between imaginative dimension and sound, between documentary and time-lapse, frames and sounds that inhabit the pictures of "I camminatori" (The walkers) bring into resonance the words of Testa's poems, framing each verse in a kind of instant sound. 
Conceived as a musical score, the film-installation is characterized by the double dialectic between sound and image: from one hand, the audio text alternates readings to actual soundtracks acousmatic poem, the image, from the other hand the visual part is played on the contrast between static and plasticity; slow movements of the machine that linger on landscapes where there is an absence of man, alternate with sequences in time-lapse and characterized by a frenetic pace and tight. 
A collage of stories and improvisations sequence where image and sound come together in a poietic and abstract dimension, while the rhythm, punctuated by the alternation of film shot and time-lapse, characterizes the formal symmetry. 
One possible reading of an archetype as widespread as mythological: the journey, the journey undertaken by hikers, explorers, the dreamers, the emigrants, to all those that move like real islands wandering between water and land borders in the world , 
A trip, then, driven by the desire to explore the world that lies beyond the veil of everyday life behind and which are gathered and amplified anxieties, instincts and psychology that belongs to the man of every time and every place.

title: Mar de Fons
synopsis:
In Sant Carles de la Ràpita and one of the most important ports in Catalonia, trawling fishing is still widely practiced. One of the boats moored in the harbor is Tere Arbó. It's crew are young people who do not exceed 30 years from la Ràpita.
Through the stories of the crew of the boat, we show how humans throw into their work. Everyday, they go out to sea and contemplate its natural beauty. Although the reality of business is disastrous, fishermen leave the harbor every day to perform a hard and little paid work, hoping for an uncertain future. What is the bond between the man and the sea?

title: Fragments of Peace
synopsis: Using a mixture of interviews (with local residents in an idyllic location in the Scottish Borders) and fictional narrative (inspired by an old Chinese tale), this film considers the questions of what constitutes peace and whether peace is attainable, particularly in relation to the idealized notion of rural living. The images and the interweaving audio clips highlight the fragmentary, selective and illusory nature of our perception and understanding of reality. While the content of the film draws heavily on interviews with individuals, the interpretation and re-presentation of the interview material is highly subjective, and is therefore inseparable from the film-maker’s personal experience.

title: The Confluence
synopsis:
“Embrace the new. But don’t forget the old.” Do we really care for the old? One fine day, we all are going to get there.

“The Confluence” is a social short film about elderly care.

Moreover, the self-explanatory title also suggests the need and urgency of an amalgamation of two or more different thought processes or worlds or communities or dimensions, etc; necessary to prosper and have a content way of dwelling. 

“The Confluence” features two characters – The Youth and The Old Man. 

The Old Man is coming home from his day at work while The Youth is leaving home for his day at work. One is with some physical weakness, climbing up the stairway. The other is full of energy, fresh to take on a new day, is walking down the stairway at his pace. 

The two cross each other’s path in a poorly lit stairway. They do not interact but carry on with their respective journey. It is only when The Youth has reached at the bottom; the realization sinks in that he should help The Old Man. The Youth, hence, climbs up the stairway towards The Old Man and offers him help.

The two then walk to the next level that is lit brightly.

Here, The Youth represents a new wave, a new opportunity or a second chance that should be embraced and welcomed and should be seen as a fresh beginning. The Old Man represents experience, an experience that should be learnt from to take upon new challenges.
director_awards: None.

synopsis: The stairway of a building is under maintenance. A man climbing up the stairs, paves his way through the rubble. "Climbing Up The Stairs: The Director's Cut" is a metaphorical picture that talks about the rampant corruption in the bureaucracies of the world and the exploitation of the commons.

title: Graffiti
synopsis:
An apocalyptic world. A devastated city. One last survivor.

Edgar has learned to survive on his own avoiding contaminated areas by the "incident" that destroyed life as we knew it. 

But Edgar's routine is suddenly disrupted by the discovery of a wall with a graffiti by his bed. Just one word reveals the presence of another survivor:  "Anna"
film_awards: Best Short Film at SItges Fantastic Int Film Festival and Mèlies d'Argent
director_awards: Lluís Quílez was born in Barcelona and graduated in filmmaking at ESCAC. He earned more than 100 awards with his previous short-films “EL SIGUIENTE”, “AVATAR” and “YANINDARA” (Melies d’Or, Oscar short-listed). He made his feature film debut on Participant Media’s "OUT OF THE DARK", a Colombian-set ghost story, produced by Apaches Ent, Dynamo Capital and Participant Media, starring Julia Stiles, Scott Speedman and Stephen Rea. Lluís Quílez combines his film career with commercials alongside teaching: delivering lectures on film direction at the prestigious film school ESCAC.

title: Hace falta una Flor
synopsis:
Inspired by true events, this is the story of Ismari, a creative Cuban girl, who will help her little sick friend feel better when he is about to run out of medication due to the economic blockade imposed on his country.
	
Metaphorically and in the middle of a musical atmosphere, Ismari will give away flowers through various actions; in order to help her friend and in an effort to solve the injustice suffered by children in Cuba.

Landing, an African immigrant who survives from selling cardboard collected from the streets of Barcelona, ​​involuntarily thwarts Jan’s plan. Their paths intersect without them realizing it and trigger an outcome that reveals the true value of art.

title: Kontur
synopsis: (1997) Nisa(3), Şeyma(6) and Muhammed(13) are three siblings. Nisa is a leukemia patient, so she doesn’t have hairs. She likes to play with her shadow on the wall projected by the gasolier, when the power goes out in evenings. One day her brother and sister make a decoration (contour) -shaped like hair and made of newspaper – and put on the wall. Then when it becomes dark, they wait for electricity to go out. But the power doesn’t go out. Eventually her brother Muhammet turns off the braker. When Nisa starts to play with her shadow on the wall, the contour on the wall is shown as her hair.

title: 末日之城
synopsis:
In 2061, the city presents a heap of rubble. Human beings vote down all achievements they have ever created before, and destroy them to create a wasteland city. To elude the chaos, Zhai creates his new home of fire balloon to live over the city.
In the day-by-day ordinary life, Zhai finds a damaged robot, and get it standing up again by maintenance and reconstruction. Finally, it becomes the only friend of Zhai in the world. The beautiful moment cannot last too long, because the dominators of the Doom City find the existence of robot, and make ambush towards them...

The butcher, Mr. Yang, takes butchering pigs as his occupation, and intends to marry her daughter to Su San...
After setting up his family, Su san’s life also changes. For seeking peace and quiet, after writing, he often trances himself over those flotages in the river...
Day after day, year after year, the life is tranquil.

title: Sparrow Duet
synopsis: A series of animated abstract shapes and textures dance together in patterns, suggesting hopping and flying action of birds. The images developed from pastel sketches and visual studies of crows and sparrows, interacting with each other and hopping across the streets, sometimes in pairs. This movement suggested a kind of ballet to me; the birds seemed as if they had rehearsed some sort of formal dance and were performing ritualistically with the others. My animation was inspired by this kind of ballet Pas de Deux structure, with pairs of shapes moving together playfully, then developing into more complex themes and variations. The original music score was composed and performed by Gary Chang.

genre: Documentary, Experimental, Fiction; Art, Drama, Environmental, Ethnographic
synopsis: To paint a portrait is to paint life, a fragile life that contains in its splendor the mechanics of its fall. To paint a portrait is to paint somebody dying.  To paint a portrait is also to knowing that the painting telling this life will exist after the disappearance of it, knowing that this depiction, tiny witness of a life, will later take the place of life. Designed in a lightning haughtiness, the portrait will often be contemplated only in its anecdotic living. Countdown, the merciful portrait, the film that won�t condemn the one to death during its own life, could be the one that will not cease slowing down, from which each layer of colors will question the previous one, a painting that will auto destruct itself as far as it paints and look at itself, in order to not jeopardize the life it suggests to paint. A man had to do a film, a portrait on men in canoes But already he is afraid of leaving, of drowning. He had before all, to slow down the year, slow down the year in order to not choose between the stars of the river and the sparkling china of the sink. To eventually decide to go, not stopping The speed invents the story of the river, they say. So, it will be the story of a film, a film in canoe, made with the rowers cadavers.
film_awards: Best short fiction, #TOFF (the Online Film Festival), february, 2014

title: Virgile dort, 6 esquisses pour un film
title_en: Virgile sleeps, 6 Sketches for a film
synopsis: Virgile Novarina conducts for more than 20 years a survey on sleeping. His research lead him to produce some night writings and drawings during micro-awaking to sleep in a Bremen laboratory in order to researchers to analyze his sleep different forms and also to produce an image of the sleep in public places all around the world: the one from Virgile sleeping.  The week of 21st to 26th January 2013 from 9 am to 6 pm he slept during the day in the Inlassable Gallery window 18 Dauphine street in Paris. For each of these days Jean Seban proposes a film as a vision of this performance.
film_awards: Southampton international Film Festival UK 2014 Best Short Documentary

title: UN PEZ FUERA DEL AGUA
synopsis: In my house the sea has set a rhythm of life very near to nature. Days and nights marked by dawns and dusks, by the sea waves, by the wind and not by the hours of the clock. While telling the story of my family, I collect thoughts and emotions that have been piling up since I was a child. I define my place in the world, tracing a path leading into and out of it.

title: WHEN WATER TURNS INTO DROPS
synopsis: In 1995 Johnny Beerens painted The Oostburgse water tower in the idea of creating eternity with a mural, but the coating could not withstand the test of time. Twenty years later, in the summer of 2014, the fine artist again ascends the scaffold to renovate his brainchild. In order to be fully engaged in and to prepare for this former work, he feels the need to let go of his workshop and all it contains to utterly clear his head. Only then the mural can again completely take possession of him and vice versa.
film_awards: SHORT OF THE YEAR (Spain) ONLINE AUDIENCE AWARD PREMIO ONLINE DEL P�BLICO

title: Gesucht: Lebenscode
synopsis: Sinus  oscillations of a drop water with poppy-oil originated a structure. It looks like a worm, which moves and grows.  It is able to annex a separated drop.  The structure organizes by itself and is depending on the beginning terms and the frequency of the oscillation. As soon as the oscillations are interrupted, the phenomenon disappears. After the stop the drop organizes with the same conditions and the same frequency of the oscillation again exactly like before. The worm moves again from new one.

title: Brainwash DC
synopsis: The narrator tells an acid story about strange manifestations from the edge of sanity. The viewer needs to use his/her imagination to connect the story to the image.

title: Brothers
synopsis: Loneliness, loss, sorrow - they are all familiar to us. Time. Children experience it differently. For them a small moment can be eternity.

title: Hybris
genre: Animation, Experimental, Fiction; Art, Comedy, Science, Science Fiction
synopsis: In a 1960�s talk show a scientist discusses the future possibility of indefinite human life. In the meantime we see his memories of a short love affair.

title: Next Man
genre: Animation, Experimental, Fiction; Children, Comedy, Family, Science, Science Fiction
synopsis: And what if the next phase in our evolution turns out to be a lazy bum?  In the early 1970s, the pollution has become so serious that a group of scientists decides to lock themselves in a research bunker. They are working on the creation of our evolutionary successors, which must help us make the earth habitable again. The first two specimens seem to need some tweaking in the work ethics department...

title: Suomi F. European
genre: Documentary, Experimental; Ethnographic, History, Human Rights, Politics
synopsis: In the short documentary film an old, lonely and estranged Sami man blames Finland and its laws and orders for all the injustice that happened to him and his people. The text is a provocative monologue and it ends in a kind of healing spell. In the images we see roads into the darkness, a man in the sauna, old eugenics photos, Finnish politicians in the Parliament and so on.  The Sami people are almost the only indigenous people in Europe. Now that their culture is almost extinct, Finland and the other Nordic countries have begun to revive it after centuries of oppression and terror.

title: CLITORISSIMA
synopsis: CLITORISSIMA A global initiative about CLITORIS AWARENESS Made with the mission to normalize & facilitate, the first mother / daughter conversation about Clitoris & Clitoris Awareness - Through women stories & animated art.
screenwriter: Giovanna Carla Gia Balestra AKA Vulvah van Klitt

title: Van Water De Druppels
synopsis: When Water turns into Drops In 1995 Johnny Beerens painted  The Oostburgse water tower in the idea of creating eternity with a mural, but the coating could not withstand the test of time. Twenty years later, in the summer of 2014, the fine artist again ascends the scaffold to renovate his brainchild.  In order to be fully engaged in and to prepare for this former work, he feels the need to let go of his workshop and all it contains to utterly clear his head. Only then the mural can again completely take possession of him and vice versa. Resulting in a new Source of Life on the Oostburgse water tower.  With When Water turns into Drops filmmaker  Jeannice Adriaansens again delivers a personal document, revolving around the unspoken. Along with Johnny Beerens, she embarks this creative journey at lonely heights only to grasp the intangible - the complexity of what can not be put down in words. A touch of emotion, a dash of ratio, powered by an extremely accurate sound design which does not shun silence but dares to embrace it and at times confronts the audience with his own vulnerability and bare existence.
film_awards: AUDIENCE AWARD - SUMMER Corto del Ano 2015 (ES)

title: Verzamelen is een Ziekte
synopsis: After a career of building a significant transport and animal food company Geert Verbeke and his wife Carla Verbeke-Lens decide they want to give life a twist. They sell all but the buildings and terrain of their highway bound company in Kemzeke, Belgium. Geert Verbeke has been a frantic art collector and so they decide to start their own art site: The Verbeke Foundation. No halfway measures to create one of the most surreal art sites of Europe. Art and animals, nature and installations, life and death are brought together.

title: Pep�n Bello, el hombre que nunca hizo nada
title_en: Pep�n Bello, the man who never did anything
synopsis: At the end of 2005, we were lucky enough to get to know Jose Pepin Bello, the last living voice of the Generation of '27. Intimate friend of Salvador Dal�, Luis Bu�uel and Federico Garc�a Lorca among others, Pepin modestly, had influenced both the work and lives of tens of renowned artists. Excited by his lucidity, enormous humanity and vast memory (since he was 101 years old), we wanted to make a statement of these encounters with an improvised audiovisual recording, urgently, enlisting a small group of friends and professionals from this field. The results could not have been better. Even so, by misfortunes of life, these images could never see the light� Until now

title: metrobus
synopsis: Lahore metro bus service is a metaphor of growing mechanization of life in this huge and swarming city. This documentary also tries to juxtapose the traditional means of transportation and modern organized system which overlap each other in harmonized as well as disrupting ways. This documentary also a short and symbolic study of social change in the wake of modernity by exploring the elements of change and transformation. These factors engrave new feature on all classes and strata of society, both mechanically and psychologically.

synopsis: A student is supervised by a retainer of the most feared high school teachers. Gradually the punishment will turn against the teacher ...

Like the sun we live in a circle: hidden behind one horizon, we appear from the next. Which game the Universe is playing with us.

title: Suicide suite

title: Why is the universe speeding up? [30m] September 2015 Ch.1 The Cosmic Surveys & The Laws of Physics
title_en: Why is the universe speeding up?[30m] September 2015 Ch.1 The Cosmic Surveys & The Laws of Physics
synopsis: The Universe is expanding but why is it accelerating? For thousands of years we've believed that the entire universe unfolded from its light. However the real truth about the cosmos lies not in what meets the eye but in the darkness. A mysterious new reality is emerging. A strange dark matter somehow binds stars and galaxies. And an even more enigmatic dark energy is causing the expansion of the universe to speed up. Combined dark matter and dark energy make up 95% of the universe. But their actual nature remains a mystery. This discovery challenges our understanding of the fundamental laws of nature. As far as we know now the only way to really attack this problem is by mapping the universe through galaxy surveys. People always have created maps as essential tools to help them define explain and navigate their way around the world. People always have created maps as essential tools to help them define explain and navigate their way around the world. That's the analogue purpose of the next generation maps of the universe like DES or PAU: solving the riddle of the accelerating universe. This is the story of a brilliant group of scientist whose are the next big step in untangling the enigma. The tale of how the most powerful camera ever built was fitted to a giant telescope to carry out the next greater map of the universe. This highly ambicious endevour to discover why is the universe speeding up brings in the era of giant cosmic maps.

title: Botswana sauvage une journ�e ordinaire
synopsis: Since 1971 Yves Lanceau has traveled around the world photographing wildlife: insects and big mammals with passion respect and curiosity.  With this quiet amazing film Nathalie Truchet and he show us that there are still countries where we can be next to wild animals without them being afraid of man.  The meanders of the delta of Okavango river in the area of the desert create in Botswana the natural territories for a great diversity of animals and plants which are becoming rare.  This beautiful wild nature is shared with us in the course of an ordinary day.  This majestic spectacle is a combination of the beauty the diversity and the protected African wildlife.  Realized during an Objectif Nature safari �Wild Botswana� between Maune and Chobe november 2013 (and 2008 for some pictures)

title: Disney
synopsis: JORGE (30) is practicing a speech in front of a mirror, the one he is going to use to leave his girlfriend Sonia after more than four years together. That speech, full of cliches, sounds very convincing when said by Jorge who seems to have every little detail under control, every nuance, every pause.  After letting his lover know of his decision he goes to Sonia�s house in order to tell her the news.  Once he gets there all his strong convictions start to fade away when he realizes that Sonia might be in a similar situation. Little things make him suspect that something is going on and then he hears the dreaded words �Jorge, we have to talk�. He will react in a unexpected way when he hears that well known speech from his girlfriend.

When all seems lost, Lara will find her own original solution� will she win her little battle?

title: Looking for Bill Viola
synopsis: Videocreaci�n elaborada con la colaboraci�n de los alumnos del instituto de Celanova (Ourense) durante el curso 2014-2015, gracias a un proyecto educativo del profesos Jos� Rivela alrededor de la obra del genial artista estadounidense Bill Viola.

title: 2330, Una historia cautiva (vr)
synopsis: When Mourtada Seck was put in the Aluche�s IDC (Immigrantion Detention Centre), he was deprived from his right to keep his own identity, amongst other rights. He was assigned a number, as the rest of the imprisoned population in the centre, and this was the way he was handled and addressed to there. Samuel, who came to Spain in search of a better life with the economic help of his family, was also confined in two of these centres while awaiting for expulsion to come. Peggy, whose husband was expelled 8 days before the birth of their daughter and then suffered ill treatment from the agents who deported him, had her life project broken the day Austin was arrested.  These three stories will unfold throughout the film bringing up the most controversial and significant issues concerning the immigration enforcement system, focusing particularly on the Immigration Detention Centres.

synopsis: Aaron Leonart Bhutia, who lives in Namchi, Sikkim, traveled all the way to Pune to pursue his passion for art, exploring and creating. It's up to you whether you let your fears affect you in a negative way or use it to push yourself forward. It's not your current situation that matters, but your core motives that keeps you working tirelessly.

title: A GRINGO HONEYMOON
synopsis: James Wallace is a young American. To him Mexico was just another adventure in a life lived without any grand plans. A place to go where nobody knew who you were and nobody cared. A chance to drop out and get by within Mexico's flourishing underground economy. When he finds himself working as a 'surgeon' in Carlos Melgarejos' burgeoning organ trafficking ring things start looking up. But that was before he met Rosalita, a prostitute at the amateur lucha libre whose profound beauty shakes his insouciance. Suddenly there's more to life than cutting out kidneys south of the border. James wants out and he wants to take Rosalita with him. For Carlos this is more than just another headache in a life filled with niggling trespasses, this is personal.

title: Смальяны: па кавалках
synopsis: "Смальяны: па кавалках” - дакументальны фільм пра зруйнаваную, здзічэлую, аўтэнчычную прыгажосць. Багаццем на цуды і цікавосткі, фрыкаў і легенды гэта маленькая веска, пра якую амаль ніхто не ведае, можа пацягацца з Мірам, Полацкам і Гервятамі. Тут жыве модны 80-гадовы шэры капальнік, чыя саперная лапатка адрыла нямала старадаўніх рэчаў ля замка князеў Сангушак. На мясцовых могілках – панскае пахаванне, дзе не адзін год шукаюць золата мясцовыя абарыгены. Бабулькі тут не саромеюцца моцных слоўцаў і спяваюць надта смелыя песні пра гарэлку часоў сухога закона. У цэнтры вескі - пляцоўка для адпачынку – велізарны касцел без даха, чый аварыйны стан прыцягвае нефармальную моладзь і гісторыкаў-аматараў. Смальяны – месца кавалкаў. На кавалкі распадаецца багацце архітэктурных здабыткаў: палац, царква, пахавальная капліца і кляштарны комплекс. Кожны з партрэтаў жыхароў – кавалак адзінай карціны пад назвай “тыпічная беларускае веска”. З кавалкаў-дзеянняў - збіраецца ў адно карціна валанцерскага летніка. Па кавалках аўтар фільма разам з неабыякавымі гісторыкамі, архітэктарамі, студэнтамі збіраюць маляўнічы Смальянскі краявід. Яго калісьці адлюстроўваў на паперы сам Напалеон Орда і славіў у тэкстах філамат Тамаш Зан, які спачывае тут жа, у цені мясцовых бяроз. З кавалкаў ідэяў збіраецца праект выратавання і адраджэння аднаго з найпрыгажэйшых беларусскіх мястэчак.
other_credits:

title: PNEUMA (triptyque)
genre: Animation, Experimental; Similarly Karma 1, presented at the Venice Biennale 2011, Pneuma (breath) investigates the threshold between immobility and transformation, highlighting the slow mutation of an ancient olive tree, represented in the detail of the trunk as opposed to analog face an old farmer. The variety of forms of the bark of the olive is, perhaps more than any other plant species, a tree that is an almost instinctive anthropomorphic equivalence, in the face of a wrinkled old farmer. The morphing of the face and the winding wooden formations are a metaphor for the constant sacrifice that the two forms of life ( man-tree) bring into being. Organic forms of powerful symbolic value, absorbed into the relentless cycle of nature, where everything changes and nothing is destroyed.

synopsis:
1982 no es un año, es una cifra. Es el número de masacres cometidas en pequeñas y apartadas poblaciones de Colombia en las últimas tres décadas.  Usando imágenes producidas por Hollywood en 1919 en las que se representa la gran masacre contra el pueblo armenio de principios del siglo XX,  1982 recorre los hechos distintivos de la violencia rutinaria e invisible de Colombia de la mano de las voces de algunas de sus víctimas. 
Un retrato de pueblos e individuos remotos y a la vez vigentes y cercanos, una mirada sobre el gesto que sobrevive a pesar de la luz ciega que proyecta sobre ellos el tiempo, la rutina y la indolencia.; Short synopsys:

title: Ochen' dolgaja plastinka
genre: Art; Comedy; Dance; Human Rights; Musical; Video Art;
synopsis:
Всякая человеческая жизнь проходит под аккомпанемент едва различимых мелодий, приходящих неизвестно откуда. И мелодий этих совсем немного – все они могли бы поместиться на одной стороне обычной стереофонической пластинки…
Пифагор рассматривал Вселенную как громаднейшую струну,натянутую между небом и землей, а  всякую земную музыку, звучащую в человеческом сознании, считал лишь слабым отголоском музыки небесной, которую образуют стремительно вращающиеся планеты при трении о космический эфир.  Каждая из этих гигантских сфер, мчась через бесконечное пространст¬во,  полагал он, издает звук опреде¬ленного тона, который возникает за счет непрерывного смещения эфир¬ной пыли, а все вместе они образуют чудесную симфонию мира, непрерывно звучащую во Вселенной.
Музыка мира сопровождает каждого из нас в течение всей жизни, и поэтому чаще всего люди не слышат ее мелодий так же, как человек, живущий на берегу океана, не слышит шума прибоя.
Но звездный хор поет все-таки не зря, и время от времени его голоса достигают человеческого сознания.
Во все времена люди старались заглушить  эти звуки, полные божественной гармонии шаманскими бубнами, духовыми оркестрами и черными тарелками громкоговорителей.
Вот и сейчас над крышами российских городов повисла мешанина замысловатых шумов, обрывков музыкальных фраз и дикторского текста.
; Short synopsys:
At all times people tried to shout down sounds of divine harmony with the Shaman’s drums or wind bands. 
As well as now, there is a mess of squeaks, catches of tunes and fragments of the spokesman’s text above the Russian cities.

title: NAZARETH english
synopsis:
"Eu comecei a viver aos 70 anos depois que descobri a dança". 
Este é o depoimento emocionado de Nazareth, uma senhora que, após 46 anos de um casamento monótono e infeliz, ficou viúva e resgatou a alegria de viver realizando um antigo sonho, dançar. Reprimida, desde pequena, no seu maior desejo, hoje, através da dança, Nazareth reencontrou a menina perdida em si mesma. 
"Eu acho que daqui a pouco vou estar engatinhando, de tanto que estou rejuvenescendo". 
Ela esqueceu as doenças e dores, conquistou uma nova família recheada de amigos e hoje rodopia com prazer pelos salões. De baile em baile, ela enfrenta o trânsito na garupa de uma moto para não perder nem um acorde da orquestra. Tantas novas emoções vieram de braço dado com a descoberta da vaidade.
"Pra mim, uma calça comprida, um moleton e um tenisinho era tudo de bom. Hoje não, eu compro vestidos, eu me enfeito, pinto os olhos, passo um batom. Acredita que eu não tinha orelha furada?" 
Esse resgate da auto estima, do encontro com a Nazareth que estava adormecida ao longo de 70 anos, será contado através de imagens da nossa Dama nos bailes de dança de salão que frequenta, de entrevistas com ela e com amigos que a viram desabrochar, além de imagens de arquivo. 
Para coroar o renascimento, vamos acompanhar Nazareth no baile “Noite dos Sonhos”, onde ela, aos 73 anos, vai debutar pela primeira vez. São imagens lindas de sua preparação para um momento tão significante. 
"Espero que seja uma noite linda, o baile para comemorar meus 15 anos, já que eu não o tive."
É a vida explodindo sem medo na terceira idade.
“Antes dos 100 anos, eu não subo. A vida me dá uns trancos, mas eu não subo. Não vou. Não vou. Eu estou com 73, ainda tenho muita dança pela frente.”
; Short synopsys:
At 70, Nazareth became a widow and realized a childhood dream, to dance. Dancing is a turning point in her life and recovered her self-esteem. For the first time, she´s happy.

title: O Balé da Chuva
synopsis:
Em uma casa de madeira construída por imigrantes russos vivem Eugênia e sua filha Lalá, de seis anos.
A criança tem pesadelos em uma noite de temporal. Sonha que é levada pelo vento, que tem seu quarto inundado de água. É quando Lalá sonha com seu falecido pai que sua mãe - até então ocupada em conter as goteiras e janelas que se abrem -  finalmente entende que a filha precisa de sua atenção.
Em um improviso, Eugênia compara as gotas de água da chuva com bailarinos e então recorda-se do marido, que foi bailarino na juventude. Ambos dançam o Balé da Chuva.
Confortada pela a mãe, finalmente Lalá dorme em seu colo e sonha com os dois dançando na chuva.; Short synopsys:

title: Designio de la Luz
genre: Art; Crime; Human Rights; Psychological; Reality Recorder;
synopsis:
Mi nombre es Agustín Pérez Vilchis, soy un pintor  de México. Sufro de una enfermedad mental; una cosa terrible para mi fue encontrarme con esta enfermedad,  se llama demencia maniaco depresiva. ¿Qué es la esquizofrenia para mi? Es estarse jodiendo con cosas que te dicen las voces. La esquizofrenia te impide que tú seas libre, te esclaviza a una soledad terrible, a una soledad terriblemente indeseable. Fue terrible, decía yo: Si pinto tan bonito ¿Porqué no me quieren? qué tienen en contra de mí, porqué no me aman. Mis metas en la vida son, casarme, tener unos niñitos, y tener amigos, porque existe una necesidad sincera y tremenda de amistades, es que es todo, un hombre sin amigos no puede vivir en este mundo. A veces… A veces quería sentir un poco de amor. Otra vez intenté suicidarme, amarrándome una cuerda aquí en el cuello y apretándole con todas mis fuerzas. A veces me siento tan mal de esa cosas, que me dan ganas de dormirme y olvidarme de la situación. Lo que me gustaría es que Dios me ayudara, lo que estoy esperando es que me libere de esta enfermedad, yo ya no quiero estar enfermo, no quiero tener enfermedades. Dios mío pues, si tú me amas tanto como yo siento que me amas, por favor...; Short synopsys:
Through the eyes of schizophrenia. Augustín Pérez Vilchis is a painter who has suffered from manic-depressive illness "schizophrenia". He tried to overcomes his illness and return to paint; until for psychopath impulse ends up in the jail.
